[03] ^b^ākāsaṭṭhā^eb^ti ākāse vimānādīsu ṭhitā, eseva nayo bhūmaṭṭhesupi. ^b^tiṇapanthanivāsino^eb^ti ^a^P0.0040^ea^ tiṇaggesu ceva panthesu ca nivāsino. ^b^puññavanto^eb^ti mahāpuññā. ^b^mahiddhikā^eb^ti mahānubhāvā. ^b^saṅgītiyo pavattentī^eb^ti devanāṭakasaṅgītiyo pavattenti, tathāgataṃ pūjanatthāya payujjantīti attho. ^b^ambare^eb^ti ākāse. ^b^anilañjase^eb^ti anilapathe, ambarassa anekatthattā ^a^V0.0051^ea^ ``anilañjase''ti vuttaṃ, purimasseva vevacanaṃ. ^b^cammanaddhānī^eb^ti cammavinaddhāni. ayameva vā pāṭho, devadundubhiyoti attho. ^b^vādentī^eb^ti vādayanti devatā.

[01] ^b^saṅkhā^eb^ti dhamanasaṅkhā. ^b^paṇavā^eb^ti tanumajjhaturiyavisesā. ^b^ḍiṇḍimā^eb^ti tiṇavākhuddakabheriyo vuccanti. ^b^vajjantī^eb^ti vādayanti. ^b^abbhuto vata no^eb^ti acchariyo vata nu. ^b^uppajjī^eb^ti uppanno. ^b^lomahaṃsano^eb^ti lomahaṃsanakaro. ^b^dhuva^eb^nti yasmā pana abbhuto ayaṃ satthā loke uppanno, tasmā dhuvaṃ avassaṃ atthasiddhiṃ labhāmāti adhippāyo. ^b^labhāmā^eb^ti labhissāma. ^b^khaṇo^eb^ti aṭṭhakkhaṇavirahito navamo khaṇoti attho. ^b^no^eb^ti amhākaṃ. ^b^paṭipādito^eb^ti paṭiladdho.

[03] ^b^buddhoti tesaṃ sutvānā^eb^ti buddhoti idaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā tesaṃ devānaṃ pañcavaṇṇā pīti udapādīti attho. ^b^tāvade^eb^ti tasmiṃ kāle. ^b^hiṅkārā^eb^ti hiṅkārasaddā, hiṃhinti yakkhādayo pahaṭṭhakāle karonti. ^b^sādhukārā^eb^ti sādhukārasaddā ca pavattanti. ^b^ukkuṭṭhī^eb^ti ukkuṭṭhisaddo ca unnādasaddo cāti attho. ^b^pajā^eb^ti devādayo adhippetā. keci ``paṭākā vividhā gagane vattantī''ti paṭhanti. ^b^gāyantī^eb^ti buddhaguṇapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ gītaṃ gāyanti.

[03] ^b^seḷentī^eb^ti ^a^M0.0059^ea^ mukhena seḷitasaddaṃ karonti. ^b^vādayantī^eb^ti ^a^P0.0041^ea^ mahatī vipañcikāmakaramukhādayo vīṇā ca turiyāni ca tathāgatassa pūjanatthāya vādenti payojenti. ^b^bhujāni pothentī^eb^ti bhuje apphoṭenti. liṅgavipariyāso daṭṭhabbo. ^b^naccanti cā^eb^ti aññe ca naccāpenti sayañca naccanti.

[03] ^b^yathā tuyhaṃ mahāvīra, pādesu cakkalakkhaṇa^eb^nti ettha yena pakārena ^b^yathā^eb^. mahāvīriyena yogato ^b^mahāvīro. pādesu cakkalakkhaṇa^eb^nti tava ubhosu pādatalesu sahassāraṃ sanemikaṃ sanābhikaṃ sabbākāraparipūraṃ cakkalakkhaṇaṃ sobhatīti attho. ^b^cakka^eb^-saddo panāyaṃ sampattirathaṅgairiyāpathadānaratanadhammakhuracakkalakkhaṇādīsu dissati. ``cattārimāni, bhikkhave, cakkāni yehi samannāgatānaṃ devamanussāna''ntiādīsu (a0 ni0 4.31) sampattiyaṃ dissati. ``cakkaṃva vahato pada''ntiādīsu (dha0 pa0 1) rathaṅge. ``catucakkaṃ navadvāra''ntiādīsu (saṃ0 ni0 1.29) iriyāpathe. ``dadaṃ bhuñja ca mā ca pamādo, cakkaṃ vattaya sabbapāṇina''nti (jā0 1.7.149) ettha dāne. ``dibbaṃ cakkaratanaṃ pātubhūta''nti (dī0 ni0 2.243; 3.85; ma0 ni0 3.256) ettha ratanacakke. ``mayā pavattitaṃ cakka''nti (su0 ni0 562; bu0 vaṃ0 28.17) ettha pana dhammacakke. ``icchāhatassa ^a^V0.0052^ea^ posassa, cakkaṃ bhamati matthake''ti (jā0 1.1.104; 1.5.103) ettha khuracakke, paharaṇacakketi attho. ``pādatalesu cakkāni jātānī''ti (dī0 ni0 2.35; 3.200, 204; ma0 ni0 2.386) ettha lakkhaṇe. idhāpi lakkhaṇacakke daṭṭhabbo (ma0 ni0 aṭṭha0 1.148; a0 ni0 aṭṭha0 1.1.187; 2.4.8; paṭi0 ma0 aṭṭha0 2.2.44). ^b^dhajavajirapaṭākā, vaḍḍhamānaṅkusācita^eb^nti dhajena ca vajirena ca paṭākāya ca vaḍḍhamānena ca aṅkusena ca ācitaṃ alaṅkataṃ parivāritaṃ pādesu cakkalakkhaṇanti attho. cakkalakkhaṇe pana gahite sesalakkhaṇāni gahitāneva honti. tathā asīti anubyañjanāni byāmappabhā ca. tasmā tehi dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇāsītianubyañjanabyāmappabhāhi samalaṅkato bhagavato kāyo sabbaphāliphullo viya pāricchattako vikasitapadumaṃ viya kamalavanaṃ vividharatanavicittaṃ viya navakanakatoraṇaṃ tārāmarīcivirājitamiva gaganatalaṃ ito cito ca vidhāvamānā vipphandamānā chabbaṇṇabuddharasmiyo muñcamāno ativiya sobhati.
[22] vimuttiyā asamasamo, dhammacakkappavattane''ti.. -- ayaṃ gāthā vuttā.

[03] tattha ^b^rūpe^eb^ti ayaṃ ^b^rūpa^eb^-saddo khandhabhavanimittapaccayasarīravaṇṇasaṇṭhānādīsu ^a^P0.0042^ea^ dissati. yathāha -- ``yaṃ kiñci rūpaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppanna''nti (ma0 ni0 1.361; 3.86, 89; vibha0 2; mahāva0 22) ettha rūpakkhandhe dissati. ``rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāvetī''ti (dha0 sa0 160-161; vibha0 624) ettha rūpabhave. ``ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī bahiddhā rūpāni passatī''ti (dī0 ni0 3.338; ma0 ni0 2.249; a0 ni0 1.435-442; dha0 sa0 204-205) ettha kasiṇanimitte. ``sarūpā, bhikkhave, uppajjanti pāpakā akusalā dhammā no arūpā''ti (a0 ni0 2.83) ettha paccaye. ``ākāso parivārito rūpantveva saṅkhaṃ gacchatī''ti (ma0 ni0 1.306) ettha sarīre. ``cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇa''nti (ma0 ni0 1.204, 400; 3.421, 425-426; saṃ0 ni0 4.60; kathā0 465) ettha vaṇṇe. ``rūpappamāṇo rūpappasanno''ti (a0 ni0 4.65) ettha saṇṭhāne. idhāpi saṇṭhāne daṭṭhabbo (a0 ni0 aṭṭha0 1.1.1 rūpādivaggavaṇṇanā). ^b^sīle^eb^ti catubbidhe sīle. ^b^samādhimhī^eb^ti tividhepi samādhimhi. ^b^paññāyā^eb^ti lokiyalokuttarāya paññāya. ^b^asādiso^eb^ti asadiso anupamo. ^b^vimuttiyā^eb^ti phalavimuttiyā ^a^V0.0053^ea^. ^b^asamasamo^eb^ti asamā atītā buddhā tehi asamehi buddhehi sīlādīhi samoti asamasamo. ettāvatā bhagavato rūpakāyasampatti dassitā.
[03] tattha ^b^dasanāgabala^eb^nti dasachaddantanāgabalaṃ. duvidhañhi tathāgatassa balaṃ -- kāyabalaṃ, ñāṇabalañcāti. tattha kāyabalaṃ hatthikulānusārena veditabbaṃ. kathaṃ?

[22] gandhamaṅgalahemañca, uposathachaddantime dasā''ti..(ma0 ni0 aṭṭha0 1.148; saṃ0 ni0 aṭṭha0 2.2.22; a0 ni0 aṭṭha0 3.10.21; dī0 ni0 aṭṭha0 2.198; vibha0 aṭṭha0 760; udā0 aṭṭha0 75; cūḷani0 aṭṭha0 81; paṭi0 ma0 aṭṭha0 2.2.44) --

[25] imāni dasa hatthikulāni veditabbāni. kāḷāvakoti pakatihatthikulaṃ. yaṃ dasannaṃ purisānaṃ kāyabalaṃ, taṃ ekassa kāḷāvakassa hatthino balaṃ. yaṃ dasannaṃ kāḷāvakānaṃ balaṃ, taṃ ekassa gaṅgeyyassāti eteneva upāyena yāva chaddantabalaṃ netabbanti. yaṃ dasannaṃ chaddantānaṃ balaṃ, taṃ ekassa ^b^tathāgatassa balaṃ,^eb^ nārāyanabalaṃ vajirabalanti idameva vuccati. tadetaṃ pakatihatthigaṇanāya hatthikoṭisahassānaṃ balaṃ, purisagaṇanāya dasannaṃ ^a^P0.0043^ea^ purisakoṭisahassānaṃ balaṃ hoti. idaṃ tāva tathāgatassa pakatikāyabalaṃ, ñāṇabalaṃ pana appameyyaṃ dasabalañāṇaṃ catuvesārajjañāṇaṃ aṭṭhasu parisāsu akampanañāṇaṃ catuyoniparicchedakañāṇaṃ pañcagatiparicchedakañāṇaṃ cuddasa buddhañāṇānīti evamādikaṃ ñāṇabalaṃ. idha pana kāyabalaṃ adhippetaṃ. ^b^kāye, tuyhaṃ pākatikaṃ bala^eb^nti tañca pana tava kāye pākatikabalanti attho. tasmā ``dasanāgabala''nti dasachaddantanāgabalanti attho.

[03] idāni ñāṇabalaṃ dassento ^b^``iddhibalena asamo, dhammacakkappavattane''^eb^ti āha. tattha ^b^iddhibalena asamo^eb^ti vikubbanādhiṭṭhānādinā iddhibalena ^a^V0.0054^ea^ asamo asadiso anupamo. ^b^dhammacakkappavattane^eb^ti desanāñāṇepi asamoti attho.
[03] idāni ``yo evamādiguṇasamannāgato satthā, so sabbalokekanāyako, taṃ satthāraṃ namassathā''ti tathāgatassa paṇāmane niyogadassanatthaṃ --

[03] tattha ^b^eva^eb^nti vuttappakāranidassane nipāto. ^b^sabbaguṇūpeta^eb^nti ettha ^b^sabbo^eb^ti ayaṃ niravasesavācī. ^b^guṇo^eb^ti ayaṃ ^b^guṇa^eb^-saddo anekesu atthesu ^a^M0.0062^ea^ dissati. tathā hesa -- ``anujānāmi, bhikkhave, ahatānaṃ vatthānaṃ diguṇaṃ saṅghāṭi''nti (dī0 ni0 aṭṭha0 1.546; mahāva0 348) ettha paṭalatthe dissati. ``accenti kālā tarayanti rattiyo, vayoguṇā anupubbaṃ jahantī''ti (saṃ0 ni0 1.4) ettha rāsatthe. ``sataguṇā dakkhiṇā pāṭikaṅkhitabbā''ti (ma0 ni0 3.379) ettha ānisaṃsatthe. ``antaṃ antaguṇaṃ'' (dī0 ni0 2.377; ma0 ni0 1.110, 302; 2.114; 3.154, 349; khu0 pā0 3ḍvattiṃsākāra) ``kayirā mālāguṇe bahū''ti (dha0 pa0 53) ettha bandhanatthe. ``aṭṭhaguṇasamupetaṃ, abhiññābalamāhari''nti (bu0 vaṃ0 2.29) ettha sampattiatthe. idhāpi sampattiatthe daṭṭhabbo (dī0 ni0 aṭṭha0 1.546; ma0 ni0 aṭṭha0 1.166; cūḷani0 aṭṭha0 136). tasmā sabbehi lokiyalokuttarehi guṇehi sabbasampattīhi upetaṃ samannāgatanti attho. ^b^sabbaṅgasamupāgata^eb^nti sabbehi buddhaguṇehi guṇaṅgehi vā samupāgataṃ samannāgataṃ. ^b^mahāmuni^eb^nti aññehi paccekabuddhādīhi munīhi adhikabhāvato mahanto munīti vuccati mahāmuni. ^b^kāruṇika^eb^nti ^a^P0.0044^ea^ karuṇāguṇayogato kāruṇikaṃ. ^b^lokanātha^eb^nti sabbalokekanāthaṃ, sabbalokehi ``ayaṃ no dukkhopatāpassa āhantā sametā''ti evamāsīsīyatīti attho.
[21] ``ye ^a^V0.0055^ea^ keci loke vandaneyyā, vandanaṃ arahanti ye.
[22] sabbaseṭṭho mahāvīra, sadiso te na vijjatī''ti.. -- vuttaṃ.

[03] tattha ^b^abhivādana^eb^nti aññehi attano abhivādanakārāpanaṃ. ^b^thomana^eb^nti parammukhato thuti. ^b^vandana^eb^nti paṇāmanaṃ. ^b^pasaṃsana^eb^nti sammukhato pasaṃsanaṃ. ^b^namassana^eb^nti añjalikaraṇaṃ, manasā namassanaṃ vā. ^b^pūjana^eb^nti mālāgandhavilepanādīhi pūjanañca. ^b^sabba^eb^nti sabbampi taṃ vuttappakāraṃ sakkāravisesaṃ tuvaṃ arahasi yuttoti attho. ^b^ye keci loke vandaneyyā^eb^ti ye keci loke vanditabbā vandanīyā vandanaṃ arahanti. ^b^ye^eb^ti ye pana loke ^a^M0.0063^ea^ vandanaṃ arahanti. idaṃ pana purimapadasseva vevacanaṃ. ^b^sabbaseṭṭho^eb^ti sabbesaṃ tesaṃ seṭṭho uttamo, tvaṃ mahāvīra sadiso te loke koci na vijjatīti attho.

[03] atha bhagavati yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ dassetvā ratanacaṅkamaṃ māpetvā tatra caṅkamamāne āyasmā sāriputto rājagahe viharati gijjhakūṭe pabbate pañcahi parivārabhikkhusatehi. atha thero bhagavantaṃ olokento addasa kapilapure ākāse ratanacaṅkame caṅkamamānaṃ. tena vuttaṃ --

[03] tattha ^b^sāriputto^eb^ti rūpasāriyā nāma brāhmaṇiyā puttoti sāriputto. ^b^mahāpañño^eb^ti mahatiyā soḷasavidhāya paññāya samannāgatoti mahāpañño. ^b^samādhijjhānakovido^eb^ti ettha ^b^samādhī^eb^ti cittaṃ samaṃ ādahati ārammaṇe ṭhapetīti samādhi. so tividho hoti savitakkasavicāro avitakkavicāramatto avitakkāvicāro samādhīti. ^b^jhāna^eb^nti paṭhamajjhānaṃ dutiyajjhānaṃ tatiyajjhānaṃ catutthajjhānanti ^a^P0.0045^ea^ imehi paṭhamajjhānādīhi mettājhānādīnipi saṅgahitāneva honti, jhānampi duvidhaṃ hoti lakkhaṇūpanijjhānaṃ ārammaṇūpanijjhānanti. tattha aniccādilakkhaṇaṃ upanijjhāyatīti vipassanāñāṇaṃ ``lakkhaṇūpanijjhāna''nti vuccati. paṭhamajjhānādikaṃ pana ārammaṇūpanijjhānato paccanīkajhāpanato vā jhānanti vuccati. samādhīsu ca jhānesu ca kovidoti samādhijjhānakovido, samādhijjhānakusaloti attho. ^b^gijjhakūṭe^eb^ti evaṃnāmake pabbate ṭhitoyeva ^b^passatī^eb^ti passi.

[03] 44^b^.^eb^ ^b^suphullaṃ^eb^ ^a^V0.0056^ea^ ^b^sālarājaṃ vā^eb^ti samavaṭṭakkhandhaṃ samuggatavipulakomalaphalapallavaṅkurasamalaṅkatasākhaṃ sabbaphāliphullaṃ sālarājaṃ viya sīlamūlaṃ samādhikkhandhaṃ paññāsākhaṃ abhiññāpupphaṃ vimuttiphalaṃ dasabalasālarājaṃ ^b^olokesī^eb^ti evaṃ olokapadena sambandho. ^b^candaṃva gagane yathā^eb^ti abbhāhimadhūmarajorāhupasaggavinimuttaṃ tāragaṇaparivutaṃ saradasamaye paripuṇṇaṃ viya ^a^M0.0064^ea^ rajanikaraṃ sabbakilesatimiravidhamanakaraṃ veneyyajanakumudavanavikasanakaraṃ munivararajanikaraṃ oloketīti attho. ^b^yathā^eb^ti nipātamattaṃ. ^b^majjhanhikeva sūriya^eb^nti majjhanhikasamaye siriyā paṭutarakiraṇamālinaṃ aṃsumālinamiva virocamānaṃ. ^b^narāsabha^eb^nti naravasabhaṃ.

[03] 45^b^.^eb^ ^b^jalanta^eb^nti daddaḷhamānaṃ, saradasamayaṃ paripuṇṇacandasassirikacāruvadanasobhaṃ lakkhaṇānubyañjanasamalaṅkatavarasarīraṃ paramāya buddhasiriyā virocamānanti attho. ^b^dīparukkhaṃ vā^eb^ti āropitadīpaṃ dīparukkhamiva. ^b^taruṇasūriyaṃva uggata^eb^nti abhinavoditādiccamiva, sommabhāvena jalantanti attho. sūriyassa taruṇabhāvo pana udayaṃ paṭicca vuccati. na hi candassa viya hānivuddhiyo atthi. ^b^byāmappabhānurañjita^eb^nti byāmappabhāya anurañjitaṃ. ^b^dhīraṃ passati lokanāyaka^eb^nti sabbalokekadhīraṃ passati nāyakanti attho.

[03] athāyasmā dhammasenāpati atisītalasaliladharanikaraparicumbitakūṭe nānāvidhasurabhitarukusumavāsitakūṭe paramaruciracittakūṭe gijjhakūṭe pabbate ṭhatvāva dasahi cakkavāḷasahassehi āgatehi devabrahmagaṇehi parivutaṃ bhagavantaṃ anuttarāya buddhasiriyā anopamāya ^a^P0.0046^ea^ buddhalīḷāya sabbaratanamaye caṅkame caṅkamamānaṃ disvā -- ``handāhaṃ bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā buddhaguṇaparidīpanaṃ buddhavaṃsadesanaṃ yāceyya''nti cintetvā attanā saddhiṃ vasamānāni pañca bhikkhusatāni sannipātesi. tena vuttaṃ --

[03] tattha ^b^pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatāna^eb^nti pañca bhikkhusatāni, upayogatthe sāmivacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^katakiccāna^eb^nti catūsu saccesu catūhi maggehi pariññāpahānasacchikiriyabhāvanāvasena pariniṭṭhitasoḷasakiccānanti attho. ^b^khīṇāsavāna^eb^nti parikkhīṇacaturāsavānaṃ. ^b^vimalāna^eb^nti vigatamalānaṃ ^a^V0.0057^ea^, khīṇāsavattā vā vimalānaṃ paramaparisuddhacittasantānānanti attho. ^b^khaṇenā^eb^ti khaṇeyeva. ^b^sannipātayī^eb^ti sannipātesi.
[03] idāni ^a^M0.0065^ea^ tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sannipāte gamane ca kāraṇaṃ dassanatthaṃ --
[22] amhepi tattha gantvāna, vandissāma mayaṃ jinaṃ..
[22] kaṅkhaṃ vinodayissāma, passitvā lokanāyaka''nti.. -- imā gāthāyo vuttā.

[03] tattha ^b^lokappasādanaṃ nāmā^eb^ti lokassa pasādakaraṇato lokappasādanaṃ pāṭihīraṃ vuccati. ``ullokappasādanaṃ nāmātipi pāṭho, tassa lokavivaraṇapāṭihāriyanti attho. taṃ pana uddhaṃ akaniṭṭhabhavanato heṭṭhā yāva avīci etthantare ekālokaṃ katvā etthantare sabbesampi sattānaṃ aññamaññaṃ dassanakaraṇādhiṭṭhānanti vuccati. ^b^nidassayī^eb^ti dassesi. ^b^amhepī^eb^ti mayampi. ^b^tatthā^eb^ti yattha bhagavā, tattha gantvānāti attho. ^b^vandissāmā^eb^ti mayaṃ bhagavato pāde sirasā vandissāma. ettha pana amhepi, mayanti imesaṃ dvinnaṃ saddānaṃ purimassa gamanakiriyāya sambandho daṭṭhabbo, pacchimassa vandanakiriyāya. itarathā hi punaruttidosato na muccati.

[01] ^b^ethā^eb^ti āgacchatha. ^b^kaṅkhaṃ^eb^ ^a^P0.0047^ea^ ^b^vinodayissāmā^eb^ti etthāha -- khīṇāsavānaṃ pana kaṅkhā nāma kācipi natthi, kasmā thero evamāhāti? saccamevetaṃ, paṭhamamaggeneva samucchedaṃ gatā. yathāha --

[03] ``katame dhammā dassanena pahātabbāti? cattāro diṭṭhigatasampayuttacittuppādā vicikicchāsahagato cittuppādo apāyagamanīyo lobho doso moho māno tadekaṭṭhā ca kilesā''ti (dha0 sa0 1405 thokaṃ visadisaṃ).

[03] na panesā vicikicchāsaṅkhātā kaṅkhāti, kintu paññattiajānanaṃ nāma. thero pana bhagavantaṃ buddhavaṃsaṃ pucchitukāmo, so pana buddhānaṃyeva visayo, na paccekabuddhabuddhasāvakānaṃ, tasmā thero avisayattā evamāhāti veditabbaṃ. ^b^vinodayissāmā^eb^ti vinodessāma.

[03] atha ^a^M0.0066^ea^ ^a^V0.0058^ea^ kho te bhikkhū therassa vacanaṃ sutvā attano attano pattacīvaramādāya suvammitā viya mahānāgā pabhinnakilesā chinnabandhanā appicchā santuṭṭhā pavivittā asaṃsaṭṭhā sīlasamādhipaññāvimuttivimuttiñāṇadassanasampannā taramānā sannipattiṃsu. tena vuttaṃ --

[03] tattha ^b^sādhū^eb^ti ayaṃ ^b^sādhu^eb^-saddo āyācanasampaṭicchanasampahaṃsanasundarādīsu dissati. tathā hesa -- ``sādhu me, bhante bhagavā, saṃkhittena dhammaṃ desetū''tiādīsu (saṃ0 ni0 4.95; 5.382; a0 ni0 4.257) āyācane dissati. ``sādhu, bhanteti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinanditvā anumoditvā''tiādīsu (ma0 ni0 3.86) sampaṭicchane. ``sādhu sādhu, sāriputtā''tiādīsu (dī0 ni0 3.349) sampahaṃsane.

[25] ādīsu (jā0 2.18.101) sundare. idha sampaṭicchane. tasmā sādhu suṭṭhūti therassa vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvāti attho (dī0 ni0 aṭṭha0 1.189; ma0 ni0 aṭṭha0 1.1 suttanikkhepavaṇṇanā; saṃ0 ni0 aṭṭha0 1.115 aggikabhāradvājasuttavaṇṇanā). ^b^nipakā^eb^ti paṇḍitā paññavantā. ^b^saṃvutindriyā^eb^ti indriyesu guttadvārā, indriyasaṃvarasamannāgatāti attho. ^b^taramānā^eb^ti turitā. ^b^upāgamu^eb^nti theraṃ upasaṅkamiṃsu.

[03] 50-1^b^.^eb^ idāni ^a^P0.0048^ea^ dhammasenāpatissa pavattiṃ dassentehi saṅgītikārakehi ^b^``khīṇāsavehi vimalehī''^eb^tiādigāthāyo vuttā tattha ^b^dantehī^eb^ti kāyena ca cittena ca dantehi. ^b^uttame dame^eb^ti arahatte, nimittatthe bhummaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^tehi bhikkhūhī^eb^ti pañcahi bhikkhusatehi. ^b^mahāgaṇī^eb^ti sīlādīhi ca saṅkhyāvasena ca mahanto gaṇo assa atthīti mahāgaṇī, nānāpadavasena vā sīlādīhi guṇehi mahanto gaṇoti mahāgaṇo, mahāgaṇo assa atthīti mahāgaṇī. ^b^laḷanto devova gagane^eb^ti iddhivilāsena vilāsento devo viya gaganatale bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamīti attho.

[03] 52^b^.^eb^ idāni ^a^M0.0067^ea^ ``te itthambhūtā upasaṅkamiṃsū''ti upasaṅkamavidhānadassanatthaṃ ^b^``ukkāsitañca khipita''^eb^ntiādi ^a^V0.0059^ea^ āraddhaṃ. tattha ^b^ukkāsitañcā^eb^ti ukkāsitasaddañca. ^b^khipita^eb^nti khipitasaddañca. ^b^ajjhupekkhiyā^eb^ti upekkhitvā, taṃ ubhayaṃ akatvāti adhippāyo. ^b^subbatā^eb^ti suvimaladhutaguṇā. ^b^sappatissā^eb^ti sahapatissayā, nīcavuttinoti attho.

[03] 53^b^.^eb^ ^b^sayambhu^eb^nti sayameva aññāpadesaṃ vinā pāramiyo pūretvā adhigatabuddhabhāvanti attho. ^b^accuggata^eb^nti abhinavoditaṃ. ^b^candaṃ vā^eb^ti candaṃ viya, nabhe jalantaṃ bhagavantaṃ gagane candaṃ viya passantīti evaṃ padasambandho daṭṭhabbo. idhāpi ^b^yathā^eb^-saddo nipātamattova.

[03] 54^b^.^eb^ ^b^vijjuṃ vā^eb^ti vijjughanaṃ viya. yadi ciraṭṭhitikā acirappabhā assa tādisanti attho. ^b^gagane yathā^eb^ti ākāse yathā, idhāpi ^b^yathā^eb^-saddo nipātamattova. ito parampi īdisesu ṭhānesu yathā-saddo nipātamattoti daṭṭhabbo.

[03] 55^b^.^eb^ ^b^rahadamiva vippasanna^eb^nti atigambhīravitthataṃ mahārahadaṃ viya anāvilaṃ vippasannaṃ salilaṃ. ^b^suphullaṃ padumaṃ yathā^eb^ti suvikasitapadumavanaṃ rahadamivāti attho daṭṭhabbo. ``suphullaṃ kamalaṃ yathā''tipi pāṭho, tassa kamanīyabhāvena suphullaṃ kamalavanamivāti attho.

[03] 56^b^.^eb^ atha te bhikkhū dhammasenāpatippamukhā añjaliṃ sirasi katvā dasabalassa cakkālaṅkatatalesu pādesu nipatiṃsūti attho. tena vuttaṃ -- ^b^``añjaliṃ paggahetvāna, tuṭṭhahaṭṭhā pamoditā''^eb^tiādi. tattha ^b^nipatantī^eb^ti nipatiṃsu, vandiṃsūti attho. ^b^cakkalakkhaṇe^eb^ti ^a^P0.0049^ea^ cakkaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ yasmiṃ pāde so pādo cakkalakkhaṇo, tasmiṃ cakkalakkhaṇe. jātivasena ``pāde''ti vuttaṃ, satthuno cakkālaṅkatatalesu pādesu nipatiṃsūti attho.

[03] 57^b^.^eb^ idāni tesaṃ kesañci therānaṃ nāmaṃ dassentehi ^b^``sāriputto mahāpañño, koraṇḍasamasādiso''^eb^tiādi gāthāyo vuttā. tattha ^b^koraṇḍasamasādiso^eb^ti koraṇḍakusumasadisavaṇṇo, yadi evaṃ ``koraṇḍasamo''ti vā, ``koraṇḍasadiso''ti vā vattabbaṃ, kiṃ dvikkhattuṃ ^a^M0.0068^ea^ ``samasādiso''ti vuttanti ce? nāyaṃ doso, tādiso koraṇḍasamattā koraṇḍasadisabhāveneva koraṇḍasamasādiso. na panādhikavacanavasenāti adhippāyo. ^b^samādhijjhānakusalo^eb^ti ettha ayaṃ ^b^kusala^eb^-saddo tāva arogyānavajjachekasukhavipākādīsu dissati. ayañhi ``kacci nu bhoto kusalaṃ, kacci bhoto anāmaya''ntiādīsu (jā0 1.15.146; 2.20.129) ārogye dissati. ``katamo pana, bhante, kāyasamācāro kusalo ^a^V0.0060^ea^? yo kho, mahārāja, kāyasamācāro anavajjo''ti (ma0 ni0 2.361) evamādīsu anavajje. ``kusalo tvaṃ rathassa aṅgapaccaṅgāna''ntiādīsu (ma0 ni0 2.87) cheke. ``kusalassa kammassa katattā upacitattā''tiādīsu (dha0 sa0 431 ādayo) sukhavipāke. idha pana cheke daṭṭhabbo. ^b^vandate^eb^ti vandittha.

[03] 58^b^.^eb^ ^b^gajjitā^eb^ti gajjantīti gajjitā. ^b^kālamegho vā^eb^ti nīlasaliladharo viya gajjitā iddhivisayeti adhippāyo. ^b^nīluppalasamasādiso^eb^ti nīlakuvalayasadisavaṇṇo. heṭṭhā vuttanayenevetthāpi attho veditabbo. ^b^moggallāno^eb^ti evaṃ gottavasena laddhanāmo kolito.

[03] 59^b^.^eb^ ^b^mahākassapopi cā^eb^ti uruvelakassapanadīkassapagayākassapakumārakassape khuddānukhuddake there upādāya ayaṃ mahā, tasmā ``mahākassapo''ti vutto. ^b^pi cā^eb^ti sambhāvanasampiṇḍanattho. ^b^uttattakanakasannibho^eb^ti santattasuvaṇṇasadisachavivaṇṇo. ^b^dhutaguṇe^eb^ti ettha kilesadhunanato dhammo dhuto nāma, dhutaguṇo nāma dhutadhammo. katamo pana dhutadhammo nāma? appicchatā, santuṭṭhitā, sallekhatā, pavivekatā, idamaṭṭhikatāti ime dhutaṅgacetanāya parivārabhūtā pañca dhammā ``appicchaṃyeva nissāyā''tiādivacanato dhutadhammā nāma. atha vā kilese dhunanato ñāṇaṃ dhutaṃ nāma, tasmiṃ dhutaguṇe. ^b^agganikkhitto^eb^ti ^a^P0.0050^ea^ aggo seṭṭho koṭibhūtoti ṭhapito. ``etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dhutavādānaṃ yadidaṃ mahākassapo''ti (a0 ni0 1.188, 191) ṭhānantare ṭhapitoti attho. ayaṃ pana ^b^agga^eb^-saddo ādikoṭikoṭṭhāsaseṭṭhādīsu dissati. tathā hesa -- ``ajjatagge, samma dovārika ^a^M0.0069^ea^, āvarāmi dāraṃ nigaṇṭhānaṃ nigaṇṭhīna''ntiādīsu (ma0 ni0 2.70) ādimhi dissati. ``teneva aṅgulaggena taṃ aṅgulaggaṃ parāmaseyya'' (kathā0 441), ``ucchaggaṃ veḷagga''ntiādīsu koṭiyaṃ. ``ambilaggaṃ vā madhuraggaṃ vā'' (saṃ0 ni0 5.374) ``anujānāmi, bhikkhave, vihāraggena vā pariveṇaggena vā bhājetu''ntiādīsu (cūḷava0 318) koṭṭhāse. ``yāvatā, bhikkhave, sattā apadā vā dvipadā vā...pe0... tathāgato tesaṃ aggamakkhāyatī''tiādīsu (a0 ni0 4.34) seṭṭhe. svāyamidha seṭṭhe daṭṭhabbo. koṭiyampi vattati. thero attano ṭhāne seṭṭho ceva koṭibhūto ca. tena vuttaṃ -- ``agganikkhitto''ti, aggo seṭṭho koṭibhūtoti attho (dī0 ni0 aṭṭha0 1.250 saraṇagamanakathā; pārā0 aṭṭha0 1.15). ^b^thomito^eb^ti pasaṃsito devamanussādīhi. ^b^satthu vaṇṇito^eb^ti satthārā vaṇṇito thuto, ``kassapo, bhikkhave, candūpamo kulāni upasaṅkamati apakasseva ^a^V0.0061^ea^ kāyaṃ apakassa cittaṃ niccanavako kulesu appagabbho''ti evamādīhi anekehi suttanayehi (saṃ0 ni0 2.146) vaṇṇito pasattho, sopi bhagavantaṃ vandatīti attho.

[03] 60^b^.^eb^ ^b^dibbacakkhūna^eb^nti dibbaṃ cakkhu yesaṃ atthi te dibbacakkhū, tesaṃ dibbacakkhūnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ^b^aggo^eb^ seṭṭhoti attho. yathāha -- ``etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dibbacakkhukānaṃ yadidaṃ anuruddho''ti (a0 ni0 1.188, 192). anuruddhatthero bhagavato cūḷapituno amitodanassa nāma sakkassa putto mahānāmassa kaniṭṭhabhātā mahāpuñño paramasukhumālo, so attasattamo nikkhamitvā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajito, tassa pabbajjānukkamo ^b^saṅghabhedakakkhandhake^eb^ (cūḷava0 330 ādayo) āgatova. ^b^avidūre vā^eb^ti bhagavato santikeyeva.

[03] 61^b^.^eb^ ^b^āpattianāpattiyā^eb^ti āpattiyañca anāpattiyañca kovido. ^b^satekicchāyā^eb^ti sappaṭikammāyapi appaṭikammāyapi cāti attho. tattha sappaṭikammā sā chabbidhā hoti, appaṭikammā sā pārājikāpatti. ``āpattianāpattiyā, satekicchāya kovido''tipi pāṭho, soyeva attho. ^b^vinaye^eb^ti ^a^P0.0051^ea^ vinayapiṭake. ^b^agganikkhitto^eb^ti ``etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave ^a^M0.0070^ea^, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vinayadharānaṃ yadidaṃ, upālī''ti (a0 ni0 1.219, 228) etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapitoti attho. ^b^upālī^eb^ti upālitthero. ^b^satthu vaṇṇito^eb^ti satthārā vaṇṇito pasattho. thero kira tathāgatasseva santike vinayapiṭakaṃ uggaṇhitvā bhārukacchakavatthuṃ (pārā0 78), ajjukavatthuṃ (pārā0 158), kumārakassapavatthunti (ma0 ni0 1.249) imāni tīṇi vatthūni sabbaññutaññāṇena saddhiṃ saṃsanditvā kathesi. tasmā thero vinayadharānaṃ aggoti evamādinā nayena satthārā vaṇṇitoti vutto.

[03] 62^b^.^eb^ ^b^sukhumanipuṇatthapaṭividdho^eb^ti paṭividdhasukhumanipuṇattho, paṭividdhaduddasanipuṇatthoti attho. ^b^kathikānaṃ pavaro^eb^ti dhammakathikānaṃ seṭṭho. ``etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dhammakathikānaṃ yadidaṃ puṇṇo mantāṇiputto''ti (a0 ni0 1.188, 196) etadaggapāḷiyaṃ āropito. tena vuttaṃ ``kathikānaṃ pavaro''ti. ^b^gaṇī^eb^ti sasaṅgho. therassa kira santike pabbajitā kulaputtā pañcasatā ahesuṃ. sabbepi te dasabalassa jātabhūmikā jātaraṭṭhavāsino sabbeva khīṇāsavā sabbeva dasakathāvatthulābhino. tena vuttaṃ ``gaṇī''ti. ^b^isī^eb^ti esati gavesati kusale dhammeti isi. ^b^mantāṇiyā putto^eb^ti mantāṇiyā nāma brāhmaṇiyā putto. ^b^puṇṇo^eb^ti tassa nāmaṃ. ^b^vissuto^eb^ti attano appicchatādīhi guṇehi vissuto.

[03] ^b^aññāsikoṇḍaññatthero^eb^ ^a^V0.0062^ea^ pana satthari abhisambodhiṃ patvā pavattitavaradhammacakke anupubbena āgantvā rājagahaṃ upanissāya viharante kapilavatthuṃ āgantvā attano bhāgineyyaṃ puṇṇaṃ nāma māṇavaṃ pabbājetvā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā āpucchitvā nivāsatthāya sayaṃ chaddantadahaṃ gato. puṇṇo pana bhagavantaṃ dassanāya therena saddhiṃ āgantvā -- ``mayhaṃ pabbajitakiccaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvāva dasabalassa santikaṃ gamissāmī''ti kapilapureyeva ohīno, so yonisomanasikāraṃ karonto nacirasseva arahattaṃ patvā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkami. ettha pana ^b^anuruddhatthero^eb^ ca ^b^upālitthero^eb^ ca ime dve therā bhagavato kapilavatthupuraṃ pavisitvā ñātisamāgamadivase pabbajitā viya dassitā, taṃ pana khandhakapāḷiyā aṭṭhakathāya ca na sameti. vīmaṃsitvā gahetabbaṃ.
[03] atha ^a^M0.0071^ea^ satthā sāriputtattherādīnaṃ ^a^P0.0052^ea^ pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ cittācāramaññāya attano guṇe kathetumārabhi. tena vuttaṃ --
[03] idāni te attano guṇe kathesi, te dassetuṃ --
[21] ``cattāro te asaṅkhyeyyā, koṭi yesaṃ na nāyati.
[22] buddhañāṇaṃ appameyyaṃ, na sakkā ete vijānitu''nti.. -- vuttaṃ.

[03] tattha ^b^cattāro^eb^ti gaṇanaparicchedo. ^b^ete^eb^ti idāni vattabbe atthe nidasseti. ^b^asaṅkhyeyyā^eb^ti saṅkhyātumasakkuṇeyyattā asaṅkhyeyyā, gaṇanapathaṃ vītivattāti attho. ^b^koṭī^eb^tiādi vā anto vā mariyādā. ^b^yesa^eb^nti yesaṃ catunnaṃ asaṅkhyeyyānaṃ. ^b^na nāyatī^eb^ti na paññāyati. idāni te vuttappakāre cattāro asaṅkhyeyye dassetuṃ ^b^``sattakāyo''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^sattakāyo^eb^ti sattasamūho, sattakāyo ananto aparimāṇo appameyyo. tathā ^b^ākāso^eb^ ākāsassāpi anto natthi. tathā ^b^cakkavāḷāni^eb^ anantāni eva. buddhañāṇaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ appameyyaṃ. ^b^na sakkā ete vijānitu^eb^nti yasmā panete anantā, tasmā na sakkā vijānituṃ.

[03] 65^b^.^eb^ idāni ^a^V0.0063^ea^ satthā attano iddhivikubbane sañjātacchariyabbhutānaṃ devamanussādīnaṃ kinnāmetaṃ acchariyaṃ, itopi visiṭṭhataraṃ acchariyaṃ abbhutaṃ atthi, mama taṃ suṇāthāti dhammadesanaṃ vaḍḍhento --
[22] aññe bahū acchariyā, abbhutā lomahaṃsanā''ti.. -- ādimāha.

[03] tattha ^a^M0.0072^ea^ ^b^ki^eb^nti paṭikkhepavacanaṃ.^b^eta^eb^nti idaṃ iddhivikubbanaṃ sandhāyāha. ^b^ya^eb^nti ayaṃ ^b^yaṃ^eb^-saddo ``yaṃ taṃ apucchimha akittayī no, aññaṃ taṃ pucchāma tadiṅgha brūhī''tiādīsu (su0 ni0 1058; mahāni0 110; cūḷani0 mettagūmāṇavapucchā 77) upayogavacane dissati ^a^P0.0053^ea^. ``aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso; yaṃ ekissā lokadhātuyā dve arahanto sammāsambuddhā''ti (a0 ni0 1.277; vibha0 809; mi0 pa0 5.1.1) ettha kāraṇavacane. ``yaṃ vipassī bhagavā kappe udapādī''ti (dī0 ni0 2.4) ettha bhumme. ``yaṃ kho me, bhante, devānaṃ tāvatiṃsānaṃ sammukhā sutaṃ sammukhā paṭiggahitaṃ, ārocemi taṃ bhagavato''tiādīsu (dī0 ni0 2.293) paccattavacane. idhāpi paccattavacane daṭṭhabbo (dī0 ni0 aṭṭha0 2.4). aññe bahū mama acchariyā abbhutavisesā santīti dīpeti.
[22] dasasahassī samāgamma, yācanti pañjalī mama''nti.. -- ādimāha.

[03] tattha ^b^yadā^eb^ti yasmiṃ kāle. ^b^aha^eb^nti attānaṃ niddisati. ^b^tusite kāye^eb^ti tusitasaṅkhāte devanikāye. yadā panāhaṃ samattiṃsapāramiyo pūretvā pañcamahāpariccāge pariccajitvā ñātatthacariyalokatthacariyabuddhatthacariyānaṃ koṭiṃ patvā sattasatakamahādānāni datvā sattakkhattuṃ pathaviṃ kampetvā vessantarattabhāvato cavitvā dutiye cittavāre tusitabhavane nibbatto tadāpi santusito nāma devarājā ahosiṃ. ^b^dasasahassī samāgammā^eb^ti dasasahassacakkavāḷesu devatā sannipatitvāti attho. ^b^yācanti pañjalī mama^eb^nti maṃ upasaṅkamitvā, ``mārisa, tayā dasa pāramiyo pūrentena na sakkasampattiṃ na māra na brahma na cakkavattisampattiṃ patthentena pūritā, lokanittharaṇatthāya pana buddhattaṃ patthayamānena pūritā, so tava kālo, mārisa, buddhattāya samayo ^a^V0.0064^ea^, mārisa, buddhattāyā''ti (jā0 aṭṭha0 1ṇidānakathā, avidūrenidānakathā) yācanti mamanti. tena vuttaṃ --

[03] tattha ^a^M0.0073^ea^ ^b^kālo te^eb^ti kālo tava, ayameva vā pāṭho. ^b^uppajjā^eb^ti paṭisandhiṃ gaṇha, ``okkamā''tipi pāṭho. ^b^sadevaka^eb^nti sadevakaṃ lokanti attho. ^b^tārayanto^eb^ti ettha pāramiyo pūrentopi tārayati nāma, pāramiyo matthakaṃ pāpentopi tārayati nāma, vessantarattabhāvato cavitvā ^a^P0.0054^ea^ tusitapure paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā saṭṭhivassasatasahassādhikāni sattapaṇṇāsavassakoṭiyo tattha tiṭṭhantopi tārayati nāma, devatāhi yācito pañcavidhaṃ mahāvilokitaṃ viloketvā mahāmāyādeviyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhantopi dasamāse gabbhavāsaṃ vasantopi tārayati nāma, ekūnatiṃsa vassāni agāramajjhe tiṭṭhantopi tārayati nāma. rāhulabhaddassa jātadivase channasahāyo kaṇḍakaṃ āruyha nikkhamantopi tīṇi rajjāni atikkamitvā anomāya nāma nadiyā tīre pabbajantopi tārayati nāma, chabbassāni padhānaṃ karontopi visākhapuṇṇamāyaṃ mahābodhimaṇḍaṃ āruyha mārabalaṃ vidhamitvā paṭhamayāme pubbenivāsaṃ anussaritvā majjhimayāme dibbacakkhuṃ visodhetvā pacchimayāme dvādasaṅgaṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṃ anulomapaṭilomato sammasitvā sotāpattimaggaṃ paṭivijjhantopi tārayati nāma, sotāpattiphalakkhaṇepi, sakadāgāmimaggakkhaṇepi, sakadāgāmiphalakkhaṇepi, anāgāmimaggakkhaṇepi, anāgāmiphalakkhaṇepi, arahattamaggakkhaṇepi, arahattaphalakkhaṇepi tārayati nāma, yadā aṭṭhārasadevatākoṭisahassehi pañcavaggiyānaṃ amatapānaṃ adāsi, tato paṭṭhāya tārayi nāmāti vuccati. tena vuttaṃ --

[03] atha mahāsatto devatāhi yāciyamānopi devatānaṃ paṭiññaṃ adatvāva kāladīpadesakulajanettiāyuparicchedavasena pañcavidhaṃ mahāvilokanaṃ nāma vilokesi. tattha ``kālo nu kho, na kālo''ti paṭhamaṃ kālaṃ vilokesi. tattha vassasatasahassato uddhaṃ āyukālo kālo nāma na hoti. kasmā? jātijarāmaraṇādīnaṃ apākaṭattā, buddhānañca dhammadesanā nāma tilakkhaṇamuttā nāma natthi, tesaṃ aniccaṃ dukkhamanattāti kathentānaṃ ``kinnāmete kathentī''ti na saddahanti, tato abhisamayo na hoti, tasmiṃ asati aniyyānikaṃ ^a^V0.0065^ea^ sāsanaṃ hoti ^a^M0.0074^ea^. tasmā so akālo. vassasatato ūno āyukālopi kālo na hoti. kasmā? tadā sattā ussannakilesā honti, ussannakilesānañca dinno ovādo ovādaṭṭhāne na tiṭṭhati, tasmā sopi akālo. vassasatasahassato paṭṭhāya heṭṭhā vassasatato paṭṭhāya uddhaṃ āyukālo ^b^kālo^eb^ nāma. idāni vassasatāyukā manussāti atha bodhisatto ``nibbattitabbakālo''ti addasa.

[03] tato dīpaṃ olokento ``jambudīpeyeva buddhā nibbattantī''ti ^b^dīpaṃ^eb^ passi. tato jambudīpo nāma mahā dasayojanasahassaparimāṇo, katarasmiṃ nu kho padese buddhā nibbattantī''ti desaṃ vilokento majjhima^b^desaṃ^eb^ passi. tato kulaṃ vilokento ``buddhā nāma lokasammate kule nibbattanti, idāni khattiyakulaṃ lokasammataṃ, tattha nibbattissāmi, ^b^suddhodano^eb^ nāma me rājā pitā bhavissatī''ti ^b^kulaṃ^eb^ addasa. tato ^b^mātaraṃ^eb^ vilokento ``buddhamātā nāma lolā surādhuttā na hoti, akhaṇḍapañcasīlāti ayañca ^b^mahāmāyā^eb^ nāma devī edisā, ayaṃ me mātā bhavissatīti kittakaṃ assā ^b^āyū''^eb^ti āvajjento dasannaṃ māsānaṃ upari sattadivasāni passi. iti imaṃ pañcavidhavilokanaṃ viloketvā -- ``kālo me, mārisa, buddhabhāvāyā''ti devatānaṃ paṭiññaṃ datvā tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā tato cavitvā sakyarājakule ^a^P0.0055^ea^ māyādeviyā kucchiyaṃ paṭisandhiṃ aggahesi (jā0 aṭṭha0 1ṇidānakathā, avidūrenidānakathā; apa0 aṭṭha0 1ṇidānakathā, avidūrenidānakathā). tena vuttaṃ --

[03] tattha ^b^okkamī^eb^ti okkamiṃ pāvisiṃ. ^b^kucchiya^eb^nti mātukucchimhi. ^b^dasasahassīlokadhātu, kampitthā^eb^ti sato sampajāno pana bodhisatto mātukucchiṃ okkamanto ekūnavīsatiyā paṭisandhicittesu mettāpubbabhāgassa somanassasahagatañāṇasampayuttāsaṅkhārikakusalacittassa sadisa mahāvipākacittena āsāḷhipuṇṇamāyaṃ uttarāsāḷhanakkhatteneva paṭisandhiṃ aggahesi. tadā dasasahassīlokadhātu sakalāpi ^a^M0.0075^ea^ kampi saṅkampi sampakampīti attho. ^b^dharaṇī^eb^ti dhāreti sabbe thāvarajaṅgameti dharaṇī, pathavī.

[03] 69^b^.^eb^ ^b^sampajānova nikkhami^eb^nti ettha yadā panāhaṃ sato sampajānova mātukucchito dhammāsanato otaranto dhammakathiko viya nisseṇito otaranto puriso viya ca dve hatthe ca pāde ^a^V0.0066^ea^ ca pasāretvā ṭhitakova mātukucchisambhavena kenaci asucinā amakkhitova nikkhamiṃ. ^b^sādhukāraṃ pavattentī^eb^ti sādhukāraṃ pavattayanti, sādhukāraṃ dentīti attho. ^b^pakampitthā^eb^ti kampittha, okkamanepi mātukucchito nikkhamanepi dasasahassī pakampitthāti attho.

[03] 70^b^.^eb^ atha bhagavā gabbhokkantiādīsu attanā samasamaṃ adisvā gabbhokkantiādīsu attano acchariyadassanatthaṃ ^b^``okkanti me samo natthī''^eb^ti imaṃ gāthamāha. tattha ^b^okkantī^eb^ti gabbhokkantiyaṃ, bhummatthe paccattavacanaṃ, paṭisandhiggahaṇeti attho. ^b^me^eb^ti mayā. ^b^samo^eb^ti sadiso natthi. ^b^jātito^eb^ti ettha jāyati etāya mātuyāti mātā ``jātī''ti vuccati, tato jātito mātuyāti attho. ^b^abhinikkhame^eb^ti mātukucchito abhinikkhamane pasave satīti attho. ^b^sambodhiya^eb^nti ettha pasatthā sundarā bodhi sambodhi. ayaṃ pana ^b^bodhi^eb^-saddo rukkhamagganibbānasabbaññutaññāṇādīsu dissati -- ``bodhirukkhamūle paṭhamābhisambuddho''ti (mahāva0 1; udā0 1) ca, ``antarā ca gayaṃ antarā ca bodhi''nti (ma0 ni0 1.285; 2.341; mahāva0 11) ca āgataṭṭhāne hi rukkho bodhīti vuccati. ``bodhi ^a^P0.0056^ea^ vuccati catūsu maggesu ñāṇa''nti (cūḷani0 khaggavisāṇasuttaniddesa 121) āgataṭṭhāne maggo. ``patvāna bodhiṃ amataṃ asaṅkhata''nti āgataṭṭhāne nibbānaṃ. ``pappoti bodhiṃ varabhūrimedhaso''ti (dī0 ni0 3.217) āgataṭṭhāne sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ. idha pana bhagavato arahattamaggañāṇaṃ adhippetaṃ (ma0 ni0 aṭṭha0 1.13; pārā0 aṭṭha0 1.11; udā0 aṭṭha0 20; cariyā0 aṭṭha0 nidānakathā). apare ``sabbaññutaññāṇa''ntipi vadanti, tassaṃ sambodhiyaṃ ahaṃ seṭṭhoti attho.

[03] kasmā pana bhagavā sambodhiṃ paṭicca attānaṃ pasaṃsatīti? sabbaguṇadāyakattā. bhagavato hi sambodhi sabbaguṇadāyikā sabbepi niravasese buddhaguṇe ^a^M0.0076^ea^ dadāti, na pana aññesaṃ. aññesaṃ pana kassaci arahattamaggo arahattaphalameva deti, kassaci tisso vijjā, kassaci cha abhiññā, kassaci catasso paṭisambhidā, kassaci sāvakapāramiñāṇaṃ, paccekabuddhānaṃ paccekabodhiñāṇameva deti. buddhānaṃ pana sabbaguṇasampattiṃ deti. tasmā bhagavā sabbaguṇadāyakattā ``sambodhiyaṃ ahaṃ seṭṭho''ti attānaṃ pasaṃsati. api ca bhūmiṃ cāletvā sambodhiṃ pāpuṇi, tasmā ``sambodhiyaṃ ahaṃ seṭṭho''ti vadati. ^b^dhammacakkappavattane^eb^ti ettha dhammacakkaṃ pana duvidhaṃ hoti -- paṭivedhañāṇañca desanāñāṇañcāti. tattha paññāpabhāvitaṃ attano ariyaphalāvahaṃ paṭivedhañāṇaṃ, karuṇāpabhāvitaṃ sāvakānaṃ ariyaphalāvahaṃ desanāñāṇaṃ. paṭivedhañāṇaṃ lokuttaraṃ kusalaṃ upekkhāsahagataṃ avitakkāvicāraṃ, desanāñāṇaṃ lokiyaṃ abyākataṃ ^a^V0.0067^ea^, ubhayampi panetaṃ aññehi asādhāraṇaṃ. idha pana desanāñāṇaṃ adhippetaṃ (paṭi0 ma0 aṭṭha0 2.2.44).

[03] 71^b^.^eb^ idāni bhagavato gabbhokkamaneva pathavikampanādikaṃ pavattiṃ sutvā ^b^``aho acchariyaṃ loke''^eb^ti devatāhi ayaṃ gāthā vuttā. tattha ^b^buddhānaṃ guṇamahantatā^eb^ti aho buddhānaṃ guṇamahantabhāvo, aho buddhānaṃ mahānubhāvoti attho ^b^dasasahassīlokadhātu, chappakāraṃ pakampathā^eb^ti dasasu cakkavāḷasahassesu mahāpathavī chappakāraṃ pakampittha calittha. kathaṃ? puratthimato unnamati pacchimato onamati, pacchimato unnamati puratthimato onamati, uttarato unnamati dakkhiṇato onamati, dakkhiṇato unnamati uttarato onamati, majjhimato unnamati pariyantato onamati, pariyantato unnamati majjhimato onamatīti evaṃ chappakāraṃ anilabalacalitajalataraṅgabhaṅgasaṅghaṭṭitā viya nāvā catunahutādhikadviyojanasatasahassabahalā pathavisandhārakajalapariyantā acetanāpi samānā sacetanā viya ayaṃ mahāpathavī pītiyā naccantī viya akampitthāti attho. ^b^obhāso^eb^ ^a^P0.0057^ea^ ^b^ca mahā āsī^eb^ti atikkammeva devānaṃ devānubhāvaṃ uḷāro obhāso ahosīti attho. ^b^accheraṃ lomahaṃsana^eb^nti accherañca lomahaṃsanañca ahosīti attho.

[03] 72^b^.^eb^ idāni pathavikampanālokapātubhāvādīsu acchariyesu vattamānesu bhagavato pavattidassanatthaṃ ^b^``bhagavā tamhi samaye''^eb^tiādigāthāyo vuttā. tattha ^b^lokajeṭṭho^eb^ti lokaseṭṭho. ^b^sadevaka^eb^nti ^a^M0.0077^ea^ sadevakassa lokassa, sāmiatthe upayogavacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^dassayanto^eb^ti pāṭihāriyaṃ dassento.

[03] 73^b^.^eb^ ^b^caṅkamantovā^eb^ti dasalokadhātusahassāni ajjhottharitvā ṭhite tasmiṃ ratanamaye caṅkame caṅkamamānova kathesi. ^b^lokanāyako^eb^ti atha satthā manosilātale sīhanādaṃ nadanto sīho viya gajjanto pāvussakamegho viya ca ākāsagaṅgaṃ otārento viya ca aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgatena (dī0 ni0 2.285, 301) savanīyena kamanīyena brahmassarena nānānayavicittaṃ catusaccapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ tilakkhaṇāhataṃ madhuradhammakathaṃ kathesīti attho.

[01] ^b^antarā na nivatteti, catuhatthe caṅkame yathā^eb^ti ettha satthārā pana nimmitassa tassa caṅkamassa ekā koṭi pācīnacakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ ekā pacchimacakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ evaṃ ṭhite tasmiṃ ratanacaṅkame caṅkamamāno satthā ubho koṭiyo patvāva nivattati, antarā ubho koṭiyo apatvā na nivattati. yathā catuhatthappamāṇe caṅkame caṅkamamāno ubho koṭiyo sīghameva patvā nivattati, evaṃ antarā na nivattatīti attho. kiṃ pana bhagavā dasasahassayojanappamāṇāyāmaṃ caṅkamaṃ rassamakāsi ^a^V0.0068^ea^, tāvamahantaṃ vā attabhāvaṃ nimminīti? na panevamakāsi. acinteyyo buddhānaṃ buddhānubhāvo. akaniṭṭhabhavanato paṭṭhāya yāva avīci, tāva ekaṅgaṇā ahosi. tiriyato ca dasacakkavāḷasahassāni ekaṅgaṇāni ahesuṃ. devā manusse passanti, manussāpi deve passanti. yathā sabbe devamanussā pakatiyā caṅkamamānaṃ passanti, evaṃ bhagavantaṃ caṅkamamānaṃ passiṃsūti. bhagavā pana caṅkamantova dhammaṃ deseti antarāsamāpattiñca samāpajjati.

[03] atha āyasmā sāriputto aparimitasamayasamupacitakusalabalajanitadvattiṃsavaralakkhaṇopasobhitaṃ asītānubyañjanavirājitaṃ varasarīraṃ saradasamaye paripuṇṇaṃ viya rajanikaraṃ sabbaphāliphullaṃ viya ca yojanasatubbedhaṃ pāricchattakaṃ aṭṭhārasaratanubbedhaṃ byāmappabhāparikkhepasassirikaṃ varakanakagirimiva jaṅgamaṃ anopamāya buddhalīḷāya anopamena buddhasirivilāsena caṅkamantaṃ dasasahassidevagaṇaparivutaṃ bhagavantaṃ addasa. disvāna ayaṃ ^a^M0.0078^ea^ pana sakalāpi dasasahassī lokadhātu sannipatitā, mahatiyā panettha dhammadesanāya bhavitabbaṃ, buddhavaṃsadesanā pana bahūpakārā bhagavati pasādāvahā, yaṃnūnāhaṃ dasabalassa abhinīhārato ^a^P0.0058^ea^ paṭṭhāya buddhavaṃsaṃ paripuccheyya''nti cintetvā ekaṃsaṃ cīvaraṃ katvā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā dasanakhasamujjalaṃ jalajāmalāvikala-kamala-makulasadisaṃ añjaliṃ sirasi katvā bhagavantaṃ ^b^``kīdiso te mahāvīrā''^eb^tiādikaṃ paripucchi. tena vuttaṃ --
[22] kamhi kāle tayā dhīra, patthitā bodhimuttamā''ti.. --

[25] ādi. kā nāmāyaṃ anusandhīti? pucchānusandhi nāma. tisso hi anusandhiyo -- pucchānusandhi ajjhāsayānusandhi yathānusandhīti. tattha ``evaṃ vutte aññataro bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca -- ``kiṃ nu kho, bhante, orimaṃ tīraṃ kiṃ pārimaṃ tīra''nti (saṃ0 ni0 4.241) evaṃ pucchantānaṃ bhagavatā vissajjitasuttavasena ^b^pucchānusandhi^eb^ veditabbā.

[03] ``atha kho aññatarassa bhikkhuno evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi `iti kira, bho, rūpaṃ anattā, vedanā anattā, saññā anattā, saṅkhārā anattā, viññāṇaṃ anattā, anattakatāni ^a^V0.0069^ea^ kammāni kamattānaṃ phusissantī'ti. atha kho bhagavā tassa bhikkhuno cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya bhikkhū āmantesi -- ṭhānaṃ kho panetaṃ, bhikkhave, vijjati, yaṃ idhekacco moghapuriso avidvā avijjāgato taṇhādhipateyyena cetasā satthusāsanaṃ atidhāvitabbaṃ maññeyya `iti kira, bho, rūpaṃ anattā, vedanā anattā, saññā anattā, saṅkhārā anattā, viññāṇaṃ anattā, anattakatāni kammāni kamattānaṃ phusissantī'ti...pe0... taṃ kiṃ maññatha, bhikkhave, rūpaṃ niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vā''ti (ma0 ni0 3.90) evaṃ paresaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ viditvā bhagavatā vuttavasena ^b^ajjhāsayānusandhi^eb^ veditabbā.

[03] yena ^a^M0.0079^ea^ pana dhammena ādimhi desanā uṭṭhitā, tassa dhammassa anurūpadhammavasena vā paṭikkhepavasena vā yesu suttesu uparidesanā āgacchati, tesaṃ vasena ^b^yathānusandhi^eb^ veditabbā. tena vuttaṃ ``pucchānusandhī''ti.

[03] tattha ^b^paññāya pāramippatto^eb^ti sāvakapāramiñāṇassa matthakaṃ patto. ^b^pucchatī^eb^ti apucchi. tattha pucchā nāma adiṭṭhajotanāpucchā, diṭṭhasaṃsandanāpucchā, vimaticchedanāpucchā, anumatipucchā, kathetukamyatāpucchāti pañcavidhā hoti. tatthāyaṃ therassa katamā pucchāti ce? yasmā panāyaṃ buddhavaṃso kappasatasahassādhikāsaṅkhyeyyopacitapuññasambhārānaṃ paccekabuddhānaṃ ^a^P0.0059^ea^ kappasatasahassādhikāsaṅkhyeyyopacitapuññasambhārānaṃ dvinnaṃ aggasāvakānañca kappasatasahassopacitapuññasambhārānaṃ sesamahāsāvakānaṃ vā avisayo, sabbaññubuddhānaṃyeva visayo, tasmā therassa adiṭṭhajotanā pucchāti veditabbā.

[03] ^b^kīdiso^eb^ti pucchanākāro, kiṃpakāroti attho. ^b^te^eb^ti tava. ^b^abhinīhāro^eb^ti abhinīhāro nāma buddhabhāvatthaṃ mānasaṃ bandhitvā ``buddhabyākaraṇaṃ aladdhā na uṭṭhahissāmī''ti vīriyamadhiṭṭhāya nipajjanaṃ. tena vuttaṃ --

[03] ^b^kamhi kāle^eb^ti tasmiṃ kāle. ^b^patthitā^eb^ti icchitā abhikaṅkhitā, ``buddho bodheyyaṃ mutto moceyya''ntiādinā nayena buddhabhāvāya paṇidhānaṃ kadā katanti apucchi. ^b^bodhī^eb^ti sammāsambodhi, arahattamaggañāṇassa ca sabbaññutaññāṇassa cetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. ^b^uttamā^eb^ti sāvakabodhipaccekabodhīhi seṭṭhattā uttamāti vuttā. ubhinnamantarā ^b^ma^eb^-kāro padasandhikaro.
[22] kathaṃ upapāramī puṇṇā, paramatthapāramī katha''nti.. -- āha.

[01] tattha ^a^M0.0080^ea^ dānapāramiyaṃ tāva bāhirabhaṇḍapariccāgo ^b^pāramī^eb^ nāma, aṅgapariccāgo ^b^upapāramī^eb^ nāma, jīvitapariccāgo ^b^paramatthapāramī^eb^ nāmāti. esa nayo sesapāramīsupi. evaṃ dasa pāramiyo dasa upapāramiyo dasa paramatthapāramiyoti samattiṃsa pāramiyo honti. tattha bodhisattassa dānapāramitāya pūritattabhāvānaṃ parimāṇaṃ nāma natthi. ekantena panassa ^b^sasapaṇḍitajātake^eb^ --
[22] dānena me samo natthi, esā me dānapāramī''ti.. (cariyā0 1.143 tassuddānaṃ) --
[25] evaṃ paraṃ jīvitapariccāgaṃ karontassa ^b^dānapāramī^eb^ paramatthapāramī nāma jātā.
[03] tathā sīlapāramitāya pūritattabhāvānaṃ parimāṇaṃ nāma natthi. ekanteneva panassa ^b^saṅkhapālajātake^eb^ --
[22] bhojaputte na kuppāmi, esā me sīlapāramī''ti.. (cariyā0 2.91) --
[25] evaṃ attapariccāgaṃ karontassa ^b^sīlapāramī^eb^ paramatthapāramī nāma jātā.
[03] tathā mahārajjaṃ pahāya nekkhammapāramiyā pūritattabhāvānaṃ parimāṇaṃ nāma natthi. ekantena panassa ^b^cūḷasutasomajātake^eb^ --
[22] cajato na hoti lagganaṃ, esā me nekkhammapāramī''ti.. (dha0 sa0 aṭṭha0 nidānakathā; jā0 aṭṭha0 1ḍūrenidānakathā; apa0 aṭṭha0 1ḍūrenidānakathā) --
[25] evaṃ nissaṅgatāya rajjaṃ chaḍḍetvā nikkhamantassa ^b^nekkhammapāramī^eb^ paramatthapāramī nāma jātā.
[03] tathā mahosadhapaṇḍitakālādīsu paññāpāramiyā pūritattabhāvānaṃ parimāṇaṃ nāma natthi. ekantena panassa ^b^sattubhattakapaṇḍitakāle^eb^ --
[22] paññāya me samo natthi, esā me paññāpāramī''ti.. (dha0 sa0 aṭṭha0 nidānakathā; jā0 aṭṭha0 1ḍūrenidānakathā; apa0 aṭṭha0 1ḍūrenidānakathā) --
[25] antobhastagataṃ ^a^M0.0081^ea^ sappaṃ dassentassa ^b^paññāpāramī^eb^ paramatthapāramī nāma jātā.
[03] tathā vīriyapāramitāya pūritattabhāvānaṃ parimāṇaṃ nāma natthi. ekantena panassa ^b^mahājanakajātake^eb^ --
[22] cittassa aññathā natthi, esā me vīriyapāramī''ti.. (dha0 sa0 aṭṭha0 nidānakathā; jā0 aṭṭha0 1ḍūrenidānakathā; apa0 aṭṭha0 1ḍūrenidānakathā) --
[25] evaṃ mahāsamuddaṃ tarantassa ^b^vīriyapāramī^eb^ paramatthapāramī nāma jātā.
[22] kāsirāje na kuppāmi, esā me khantipāramī''ti.. (dha0 sa0 aṭṭha0 nidānakathā; jā0 aṭṭha0 1ḍūrenidānakathā; apa0 aṭṭha0 1ḍūrenidānakathā) --
[25] evaṃ ^a^V0.0072^ea^ acetanabhāvena viya mahādukkhaṃ adhivāsentassa ^b^khantipāramī^eb^ paramatthapāramī nāma jātā.
[22] mocesiṃ ekasataṃ khattiye, esā me saccapāramī''ti.. (dha0 sa0 aṭṭha0 nidānakathā; jā0 aṭṭha0 1ḍūrenidānakathā; apa0 aṭṭha0 1ḍūrenidānakathā) --
[25] evaṃ jīvitaṃ cajitvā saccaṃ anurakkhantassa ^b^saccapāramī^eb^ paramatthapāramī nāma jātā.
[21] ``mātā ^a^P0.0061^ea^ pitā na me dessā, attā me na ca dessiyo.
[22] sabbaññutaṃ piyaṃ mayhaṃ, tasmā vataṃ adhiṭṭhahi''nti.. (dha0 sa0 aṭṭha0 nidānakathā; jā0 aṭṭha0 1ḍūrenidānakathā; apa0 aṭṭha0 1ḍūrenidānakathā; cariyā 3.65) --
[25] evaṃ jīvitampi pariccajitvā vataṃ adhiṭṭhahantassa ^b^adhiṭṭhānapāramī^eb^ paramatthapāramī nāma jātā.
[21] ``na maṃ koci uttasati, napi bhāyāmi kassaci.
[22] mettābalenupatthaddho, ramāmi pavane tadā''ti.. (dha0 sa0 aṭṭha0 nidānakathā; jā0 aṭṭha0 1ḍūrenidānakathā; apa0 aṭṭha0 1ḍūrenidānakathā; cariyā0 3.113) --
[25] evaṃ ^a^M0.0082^ea^ jīvitampi anoloketvā mettāyantassa ^b^mettāpāramī^eb^ paramatthapāramī nāma jātā.
[22] gāmaṇḍalā upagantvā, rūpaṃ dassentinappaka''nti.. (dha0 sa0 aṭṭha0 nidānakathā; jā0 aṭṭha0 1ḍūrenidānakathā; apa0 aṭṭha0 1ḍūrenidānakathā; cariyā0 3.119) --

[25] evaṃ gāmadārakesu niṭṭhubhanādīhi ceva mālāgandhūpahārādīhi ca sukhadukkhaṃ uppādentesupi upekkhaṃ anativattantassa ^b^upekkhāpāramī^eb^ paramatthapāramī nāma jātā. ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana ^b^cariyāpiṭakato^eb^ gahetabbo.
[03] idāni therena puṭṭhassa bhagavato byākaraṇaṃ dassentehi saṅgītikārakehi --
[22] pubbenivāsānugatāya buddhiyā, pakāsayī lokahitaṃ sadevake''ti.. -- vuttaṃ.

[03] tattha ^b^tassa puṭṭho viyākāsī^eb^ti tena dhammasenāpatinā puṭṭho hutvā tassa byākāsi, attano abhinīhārato paṭṭhāya abhisambodhipariyosānaṃ sabbaṃ buddhavaṃsaṃ kathesīti attho. ^b^karavīkamadhuragiro^eb^ti karavīkasakuṇassa viya madhurā girā yassa so karavīkamadhuragiro, karavīkamadhuramañjussaroti attho. tatridaṃ karavīkānaṃ madhurassaratā -- karavīkasakuṇā kira madhurarasaṃ ^a^P0.0062^ea^ ambapakkaṃ mukhatuṇḍakena paharitvā paggharitaṃ phalarasaṃ pivitvā pakkhena tāḷaṃ datvā vikūjamāne catuppadā madamattā viya laḷituṃ ārabhanti, gocarapasutāpi catuppadagaṇā mukhagatānipi tiṇāni chaḍḍetvā taṃ nādaṃ suṇanti, vāḷamigā khuddakamige anubandhamānā ukkhittaṃ pādaṃ anikkhipitvā ^a^M0.0083^ea^ cittakatā viya tiṭṭhanti, anubandhamigāpi maraṇabhayaṃ hitvā tiṭṭhanti, ākāse pakkhandantā pakkhinopi pakkhe pasāretvā tiṭṭhanti, udake macchāpi kaṇṇapaṭalaṃ acālentā taṃ saddaṃ suṇamānā tiṭṭhanti. evaṃ madhurassarā karavīkā (dī0 ni0 aṭṭha0 2.38; ma0 ni0 aṭṭha0 2.386). ^b^nibbāpayanto hadaya^eb^nti kilesaggisantattasabbajanamānasaṃ ^a^V0.0074^ea^ dhammakathāmatadhārāya sītibhāvaṃ janayantoti attho. ^b^hāsayanto^eb^ti tosayanto. ^b^sadevaka^eb^nti sadevakaṃ lokaṃ.

[03] atītabuddhānanti atītānaṃ buddhānaṃ. amhākaṃ bhagavato abhinīhārassa purato pana taṇhaṅkaro medhaṅkaro saraṇaṅkaro dīpaṅkaroti cattāro buddhā ekasmiṃ kappe nibbattiṃsu. tesaṃ aparabhāge koṇḍaññādayo tevīsati buddhāti sabbe dīpaṅkarādayo catuvīsati buddhā idha ``atītabuddhā''ti adhippetā, tesaṃ atītabuddhānaṃ. ^b^jināna^eb^nti tasseva vevacanaṃ. ^b^desita^eb^nti kathitaṃ. catuvīsatiyā buddhānaṃ catusaccapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ dhammakathaṃ. ^b^nikīlita^eb^nti tesaṃ caritaṃ kappajātigottāyubodhisāvakasannipātaupaṭṭhākamātāpituputtabhariyāparicchedādikaṃ nikīlitaṃ nāma. ^b^buddhaparamparāgata^eb^nti dīpaṅkaradasabalato paṭṭhāya yāva kassapaparamparato āgataṃ desitaṃ nikīlitaṃ vāti attho. ^b^pubbenivāsānugatāya buddhiyā^eb^ti ekampi jātiṃ dvepi jātiyoti (ma0 ni0 1.148, 384, 421; 2.233; 3.82; pārā0 12) evaṃ vibhattaṃ pubbe nivuṭṭhakkhandhasantānasaṅkhātaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ anugatā upagatā tāya pubbenivāsānugatāya buddhiyā, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇenāti attho. ^b^pakāsayī^eb^ti byākāsi. ^b^lokahita^eb^nti sabbalokahitaṃ buddhavaṃsaṃ. ^b^sadevake^eb^ti sadevake loketi attho.

[03] 80^b^.^eb^ atha bhagavā karuṇāsītalena hadayena sadevakaṃ lokaṃ savane niyojento ^b^``pītipāmojjajanana''^eb^ntiādimāha. tattha ^b^pītipāmojjajanana^eb^nti pītipāmojjakaraṃ pītiyā pubbabhāgaṃ pāmojjaṃ, pañcavaṇṇāya pītiyā janananti attho. ^b^sokasallavinodana^eb^nti sokasaṅkhātānaṃ sallānaṃ vinodanaṃ viddhaṃsanaṃ. ^b^sabbasampattipaṭilābha^eb^nti ^a^P0.0063^ea^ sabbāpi devamanussasampattiādayo sampattiyo paṭilabhanti etenāti sabbasampattipaṭilābho, taṃ sabbasampattipaṭilābhaṃ buddhavaṃsadesananti attho. ^b^cittīkatvā^eb^ti ^a^M0.0084^ea^ citte katvā, buddhānussatiṃ purakkhatvāti attho. ^b^suṇāthā^eb^ti nisāmetha nibodhatha. ^b^me^eb^ti mama.

[03] 81^b^.^eb^ ^b^madanimmadana^eb^nti jātimadādīnaṃ sabbamadānaṃ nimmadanakaraṃ. ^b^sokanuda^eb^nti soko nāma ñātibyasanādīhi phuṭṭhassa cittasantāpo. kiñcāpi atthato domanassameva hoti, evaṃ santepi antonijjhānalakkhaṇo, cetaso parinijjhāyanaraso, anusocanapaccupaṭṭhāno, taṃ sokaṃ nudatīti sokanudo, taṃ sokanudaṃ. ^b^saṃsāraparimocana^eb^nti saṃsārabandhanato parimocanakaraṃ. ``saṃsārasamatikkama''ntipi pāṭho, tassa saṃsārasamatikkamakaranti attho.

[03] ^b^sabbadukkhakkhaya^eb^nti ^a^V0.0075^ea^ ettha ^b^dukkha^eb^-saddo dukkhavedanā-dukkhavatthu-dukkhārammaṇa-dukkhapaccaya-dukkhaṭṭhānādīsu dissati. ayañhi ``dukkhassa ca pahānā''tiādīsu (dī0 ni0 1.232; ma0 ni0 1.383, 430; pārā0 11) dukkhavedanāyaṃ dissati. ``jātipi dukkhā jarāpi dukkhā''tiādīsu (dī0 ni0 2.387; saṃ0 ni0 5.1081) dukkhavatthusmiṃ. ``yasmā ca kho, mahāli, rūpaṃ dukkhaṃ dukkhānupatitaṃ dukkhāvakkanta''ntiādīsu (saṃ0 ni0 3.60) dukkhārammaṇe. ``dukkho pāpassa uccayo''tiādīsu (dha0 pa0 117) dukkhapaccaye. ``yāvañcidaṃ, bhikkhave, na sukarā akkhānena pāpuṇitaṃ yāva dukkhā nirayā''tiādīsu (ma0 ni0 3.250) dukkhaṭṭhāne. idha panāyaṃ dukkhavatthusmiṃ dukkhapaccayepi ca daṭṭhabbo. tasmā jātiādisabbadukkhakkhayakaranti attho (dha0 sa0 aṭṭha0 2 ādayo). ^b^magga^eb^nti ettha kusalatthikehi maggīyati, kilese vā mārento gacchatīti maggoti buddhavaṃsadesanā vuccati, taṃ nibbānassa maggabhūtaṃ buddhavaṃsadesanaṃ. ^b^sakkacca^eb^nti sakkaccaṃ cittīkatvā, ohitasotā hutvāti attho. ^b^paṭipajjathā^eb^ti adhitiṭṭhatha, suṇāthāti attho. atha vā pītipāmojjajananaṃ sokasallavinodanaṃ sabbasampattipaṭilābhahetubhūtaṃ imaṃ buddhavaṃsadesanaṃ sutvā idāni madanimmadanādiguṇavisesāvahaṃ sabbadukkhakkhayaṃ buddhabhāvamaggaṃ paṭipajjathāti ^a^P0.0064^ea^ sabbesaṃ devamanussānaṃ buddhattaṃ paṇidhāya ussāhaṃ janeti. sesamettha uttānamevāti.

[25] ādinayappavattāya buddhavaṃsavaṇṇanāya okāso anuppatto. sā panesā buddhavaṃsavaṇṇanā yasmā suttanikkhepaṃ vicāretvā vuccamānā pākaṭā hoti, tasmā suttanikkhepavicāraṇā tāva veditabbā. cattāro hi suttanikkhepā attajjhāsayo parajjhāsayo pucchāvasiko aṭṭhuppattikoti. tattha yāni suttāni bhagavā parehi anajjhiṭṭho kevalaṃ attano ajjhāsayena kathesi. seyyathidaṃ -- ^b^ākaṅkheyyasuttaṃ^eb^ (ma0 ni0 1.64 ādayo) ^b^vatthasutta^eb^nti (ma0 ni0 1.70 ādayo) evamādīni, tesaṃ ^b^attajjhāsayo^eb^ nikkhepo.

[03] yāni vā pana ``paripakkā kho rāhulassa vimuttiparipācanīyā dhammā, yaṃnūnāhaṃ rāhulaṃ uttariṃ āsavānaṃ khaye vineyya''nti (saṃ0 ni0 4.121) evaṃ paresaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ khantiṃ manaṃ bujjhanakabhāvañca oloketvā parajjhāsayavasena kathitāni. seyyathidaṃ -- ^b^rāhulovādasuttaṃ^eb^ ^b^dhammacakkappavattanasutta^eb^nti (saṃ0 ni0 5.1081; mahāva0 13 ādayo; paṭi0 ma0 2.30) evamādīni, tesaṃ ^b^parajjhāsayo^eb^ nikkhepo.

[03] bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā te te devamanussā pañhaṃ pucchanti. evaṃ puṭṭhena pana bhagavatā yāni kathitāni ^b^devatāsaṃyutta^eb^ (saṃ0 ni0 1.1 ādayo) ^b^bojjhaṅgasaṃyuttā^eb^dīni (saṃ0 ni0 5.182 ādayo) tesaṃ ^b^pucchāvasiko^eb^ nikkhepo.

[03] yāni vā pana uppannaṃ kāraṇaṃ paṭicca desitāni dhammadāyāda- (ma0 ni0 1.29 ādayo) puttamaṃsūpamādīni (saṃ0 ni0 2.63), tesaṃ ^b^aṭṭhuppattiko^eb^ nikkhepo. evametesu catūsu suttanikkhepesu imassa buddhavaṃsassa pucchāvasiko nikkhepo. pucchāvasena hi bhagavatā ayaṃ ^a^V0.0077^ea^ nikkhitto. kassa pucchāvasena? āyasmato sāriputtattherassa. vuttañhetaṃ asmiṃ nidānasmiṃ eva --
[22] kīdiso te mahāvīra, abhinīhāro naruttamā''ti.. (bu0 vaṃ0 1.74-75) --

[03] tattha ^b^kappe ca satasahasse^eb^ti ettha ^b^kappa^eb^-saddo panāyaṃ abhisaddahanavohārakālapaññattichedanavikappanalesasamantabhāvāayukappamahākappādīsu dissati. tathā hi ``okappanīyametaṃ bhoto gotamassa. yathā taṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassā''tiādīsu (ma0 ni0 1.387) abhisaddahane dissati. ``anujānāmi, bhikkhave, pañcahi samaṇakappehi phalaṃ paribhuñjitu''nti evamādīsu (cūḷava0 250) vohāre. ``yena sudaṃ niccakappaṃ viharāmī''tiādīsu (ma0 ni0 1.387) kāle. ``iccāyasmā kappo''ti (su0 ni0 1098; cūḷani0 kappamāṇavapucchā 117; kappamāṇavapucchāniddesa 61) ca, ``nigrodhakappo iti tassa nāmaṃ, tayā kataṃ bhagavā brāhmaṇassā''ti ca evamādīsu (su0 ni0 346) paññattiyaṃ. ``alaṅkato kappitakesamassū''ti evamādīsu (jā0 2.22.1368) chedane. ``kappati dvaṅgulakappo''tiādīsu (cūḷava0 446) vikappe. ``atthi kappo nipajjitu''ntiādīsu (a0 ni0 8.80) lese. ``kevalakappaṃ jetavanaṃ obhāsetvā''tiādīsu samantabhāve. ``tiṭṭhatu, bhante, bhagavā kappaṃ, tiṭṭhatu sugato kappa''nti (dī0 ni0 2.178; udā0 51) ettha āyukappe. ``kīva dīgho nu kho, bhante, kappo''ti (saṃ0 ni0 2.128-129) ettha mahākappe. ādisaddena ``satthukappena vata kira, bho, mayaṃ sāvakena saddhiṃ mantayamānā na jānimhā''ti (ma0 ni0 1.260) ettha paṭibhāge. ``kappo naṭṭho hoti. kappakatokāso jiṇṇo hotī''ti (pāci0 371) ettha vinayakappe. idha pana mahākappe daṭṭhabbo. tasmā kappe ca satasahasseti mahākappānaṃ satasahassānanti attho (dī0 ni0 aṭṭha0 1.29; 3.275; saṃ0 ni0 aṭṭha0 1.1.1; a0 ni0 aṭṭha0 2.3.128; khu0 pā0 aṭṭha0 5ṃaṅgalasutta, evamiccādipāṭhavaṇṇanā; su0 ni0 aṭṭha0 2ṃaṅgalasuttavaṇṇanā; cariyā0 aṭṭha0 nidānakathā.1; cūḷani0 aṭṭha0 khaggavisāṇasuttaniddesavaṇṇanā). ^a^V0.0078^ea^ ^b^caturo ca asaṅkhiye^eb^ti ``catunnaṃ asaṅkhyeyyānaṃ matthake''ti vacanaseso daṭṭhabbo. kappasatasahassādhikānaṃ catunnaṃ asaṅkhyeyyānaṃ matthaketi attho. ^b^amaraṃ nāma nagara^eb^nti ``amara''nti ca ``amaravatī''ti ^a^M0.0087^ea^ ca laddhanāmaṃ nagaraṃ ahosi. keci panettha aññenāpi pakārena vaṇṇayanti, kiṃ tehi, nāmamattaṃ panetaṃ tassa nagarassa. ^b^dassaneyya^eb^nti suvibhattavicitra-caccaradvāra-catukkasiṅghāṭika-pākāra-parikkhepapāsāda- hammiya-bhavana-samalaṅkatattā dassanīyaṃ. ^b^manorama^eb^nti samasuciparamaramaṇīyabhūmibhāgattā chāyūdakasampannattā ^a^P0.0066^ea^ sulabhāhārattā sabbopakaraṇayuttattā ca samiddhattā devamanussādīnaṃ mano ramayatīti manoramaṃ.

[03] ^b^dasahi saddehi avivitta^eb^nti hatthisaddena assasaddena rathasaddena bherisaddena saṅkhasaddena mudiṅgasaddena vīṇāsaddena gītasaddena sammatāḷasaddena ``bhuñjatha pivatha khādathā''ti dasamena saddenāti; imehi dasahi saddehi avivittaṃ ahosi, sabbakālaṃ anupamussavasamajjanāṭakā kīḷantīti attho. ^b^annapānasamāyuta^eb^nti annena catubbidhenāhārena ca pānena ca suṭṭhu āyutaṃ annapānasamāyutaṃ, iminā subhikkhatā dassitā, bahuannapānasamāyutanti attho.
[03] idāni te dasa sadde vatthuto dassanatthaṃ --
[22] khādatha pivatha ceva, annapānena ghosita''nti.. -- vuttaṃ.

[03] tattha ^b^hatthisadda^eb^nti hatthīnaṃ koñcanādasaddena, karaṇatthe upayogavacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. esa nayo sesapadesupi. ^b^bherisaṅkharathāni cā^eb^ti bherisaddena ca saṅkhasaddena ca rathasaddena cāti attho. liṅgavipariyāsena vuttaṃ, `khādatha pivathā'ti evamādinayappavattena annapānapaṭisaṃyuttena ghositaṃ abhināditanti attho. etthāha -- tesaṃ pana saddānaṃ ekadesova dassito, na sakaloti? na ekadeso sakalo dasavidho dassitova. kathaṃ? bherisaddena mudiṅgasaddo saṅgahito, saṅkhasaddena vīṇāgītasammatāḷasaddā saṅgahitāti daseva dassitā.
[03] evaṃ ekena pariyāyena nagarasampattiṃ vaṇṇetvā puna tameva dassetuṃ --

[03] tattha ^a^V0.0079^ea^ ^b^sabbaṅgasampanna^eb^nti pākāragopuraṭṭālakādisabbanagarāvayavasampannaṃ, paripuṇṇasabbavittūpakaraṇadhanadhaññatiṇakaṭṭhodakanti vā attho. ^b^sabbakammamupāgata^eb^nti sabbakammantena upagataṃ, samupagatasabbakammantanti attho. ^b^sattaratanasampanna^eb^nti ^a^P0.0067^ea^ paripuṇṇamuttādisattaratanaṃ, cakkavattinivāsabhūmito vā hatthiratanādīhi sattaratanehi sampannaṃ. ^b^nānājanasamākula^eb^nti nānāvidhadesabhāsehi janehi samākulaṃ. ^b^samiddha^eb^nti manussopabhogasabbopakaraṇehi samiddhaṃ phītaṃ. ^b^devanagaraṃ vā^eb^ti devanagaraṃ viya ālakamandā viya amaravatī samiddhanti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^āvāsaṃ puññakammina^eb^nti āvasanti ettha puññakammino janāti āvāso. ``āvāso''ti vattabbe ``āvāsa''nti liṅgabhedaṃ katvā vuttanti veditabbaṃ. paññāyati tenāti puññaṃ, kularūpamahābhogissariyavasena paññāyatīti attho. punātīti vā puññaṃ. sabbakusalamalarajāpavāhakattā puññaṃ kammaṃ yesaṃ atthi te puññakammino, tesaṃ puññakamminaṃ āvāsabhūtanti attho.

[03] tattha ^b^sumedho^eb^ nāma brāhmaṇo paṭivasati ubhato sujāto mātito ca pitito ca, saṃsuddhagahaṇiko yāva sattamā kulaparivaṭṭā akkhitto anupakuṭṭho jātivādena, abhirūpo dassanīyo pāsādiko paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāya samannāgato, so tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāragū ahosi sanighaṇḍukeṭubhānaṃ sākkharappabhedānaṃ itihāsapañcamānaṃ padako veyyākaraṇo anavayo lokāyatamahāpurisalakkhaṇesu. tassa pana daharakāleyeva mātāpitaro kālamakaṃsu. athassa rāsivaḍḍhako amacco āyapotthakaṃ āharitvā suvaṇṇarajatamaṇimuttādivividharatanabharite gabbhe vivaritvā -- ``etthakaṃ te, kumāra, mātu santakaṃ, etthakaṃ pitu santakaṃ, etthakaṃ ayyakapayyakāna''nti yāva sattamā kulaparivaṭṭā dhanaṃ ācikkhitvā -- ``etaṃ paṭipajjāhī''ti niyyātesi. so ``sādhū''ti sampaṭicchitvā puññāni karonto agāraṃ ajjhāvasi. tena vuttaṃ --
[22] lakkhaṇe itihāse ca, sadhamme pāramiṃ gato''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^nagare amaravatiyā^eb^ti amaravatīsaṅkhāte nagare. ^b^sumedho nāmā^eb^ti ettha ``medhā''ti paññā ^a^V0.0080^ea^ vuccati. sā tassa sundarā pasatthāti sumedhoti paññāyittha. ^b^brāhmaṇo^eb^ti brahmaṃ aṇati sikkhatīti brāhmaṇo, mante sajjhāyatīti attho ^a^P0.0068^ea^. akkharacintakā pana ``brahmuno apaccaṃ brāhmaṇo''ti vadanti. ariyā pana bāhitapāpattā brāhmaṇāti. ^b^anekakoṭisannicayo^eb^ti koṭīnaṃ sannicayo koṭisannicayo, aneko koṭisannicayo yassa soyaṃ anekakoṭisannicayo, anekakoṭi dhanasannicayoti attho. ^b^pahūtadhanadhaññavā^eb^ti bahuladhanadhaññavā. purimaṃ bhūmigatagabbhagatadhanadhaññavasena vuttaṃ, idaṃ niccaparibhogūpagatadhanadhaññavasena vuttanti veditabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^ajjhāyako^eb^ti na jhāyatīti ajjhāyako, jhānabhāvanārahitoti attho. vuttañhetaṃ -- ``na dānime jhāyantīti. na dānime jhāyantīti kho, vāseṭṭha, `ajjhāyakā ajjhāyakā' tveva tatiyaṃ akkharaṃ upanibbatta''nti (dī0 ni0 3.132) evaṃ paṭhamakappikakāle jhānavirahitānaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ garahavacanaṃ uppannaṃ. idāni mantaṃ jhāyatīti ajjhāyako, mante parivattetīti iminā atthena pasaṃsavacanaṃ katvā voharanti. mante dhāretīti ^b^mantadharo^eb^. ^b^tiṇṇaṃ vedāna^eb^nti iruvedayajuvedasāmavedānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ. ayaṃ pana ^b^veda^eb^-saddo ñāṇasomanassaganthesu dissati. tathā hesa -- ``yaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vedagumābhijaññā, akiñcanaṃ kāmabhave asatta''ntiādīsu (su0 ni0 1065) ñāṇe dissati. ``ye vedajātā vicaranti loke''tiādīsu (a0 ni0 4.57) somanasse. ``tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāragū sanighaṇḍukeṭubhāna''ntiādīsu (dī0 ni0 1.256) ganthe. idhāpi ganthe (ma0 ni0 aṭṭha0 1.75). ^b^pāragū^eb^ti tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ oṭṭhapahatakaraṇamattena pāraṃ gatoti pāragū. ^b^lakkhaṇe^eb^ti itthilakkhaṇapurisalakkhaṇamahāpurisalakkhaṇādike lakkhaṇe. ^b^itihāse^eb^ti itiha āsa, itiha āsāti īdisavacanapaṭisaṃyutte ^a^M0.0090^ea^ purāṇasaṅkhāte ganthavisese. ^b^sadhamme^eb^ti brāhmaṇānaṃ sake dhamme, sake ācariyake vā. ^b^pāramiṃ gato^eb^ti pāraṃ gato, disāpāmokkho ācariyo ahosīti attho.

[03] athekadivasaṃ so dasaguṇagaṇārādhitapaṇḍito sumedhapaṇḍito uparipāsādavaratale rahogato hutvā pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā nisinno cintesi -- ``punabbhave paṭisandhiggahaṇaṃ nāma dukkhaṃ, tathā nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne sarīrabhedanaṃ, ahañca jātidhammo, jarādhammo, byādhidhammo, maraṇadhammo, evaṃbhūtena mayā ajātiṃ ajaraṃ abyādhiṃ amaraṇaṃ sukhaṃ sivaṃ nibbānaṃ pariyesituṃ ^a^P0.0069^ea^ vaṭṭati, avassaṃ bhavacārakato muccitvā nibbānagāminā ekena maggena bhavitabba''nti. tena vuttaṃ --
[22] dukkho punabbhavo nāma, sarīrassa ca bhedanaṃ..
[21] ``atthi hehiti so maggo, na so sakkā na hetuye.

[03] ettha pana gāthāsambandhañca anuttānapadānamatthañca vatvāva gamissāma. tattha ^b^rahogato^eb^ti rahasi gato, rahasi ṭhāne nisinno. ^b^evaṃ cintesaha^eb^nti evaṃ cintesiṃ ahaṃ. evanti iminā cintanākāraṃ dasseti. ^b^tadā^eb^ti tasmiṃ sumedhapaṇḍitakāle. ``evaṃ cintesaha''nti bhagavā iminā attanā saddhiṃ sumedhapaṇḍitaṃ ekattaṃ karoti. tasmā tadā so sumedho ahamevāti pakāsento ``evaṃ cintesahaṃ tadā''ti bhagavā uttamapurisavasenāha. ^b^jātidhammo^eb^ti jātisabhāvo. esa nayo sesapadesupi. ^b^nibbuti^eb^nti nibbānaṃ.

[03] ^b^yaṃnūnā^eb^ti ^a^M0.0091^ea^ parivitakkanatthe nipāto, yadi panāhanti attho. ^b^pūtikāya^eb^nti pūtibhūtaṃ kāyaṃ. ^b^nānākuṇapapūrita^eb^nti mutta-karīsa-pubbalohita-pitta-semha-kheḷasiṅghāṇikādianekakuṇapapūritaṃ. ^b^anapekkho^eb^ti anālayo. ^b^atthī^eb^ti avassaṃ upalabbhati. ^b^hehitī^eb^ti bhavissati, parivitakkanavacanamidaṃ. ^b^na so sakkā na hetuye^eb^ti tena maggena na sakkā na bhavituṃ. so pana maggo ^b^hetuye^eb^ti hetubhāvāya na na hoti, hetuyevāti attho. ^b^bhavato parimuttiyā^eb^ti bhavabandhanavimuttiyāti attho.

[03] idāni attanā parivitakkitamatthaṃ sampādayituṃ ^b^``yathāpī''^eb^ti ādimāha. yathā hi loke dukkhassa paṭipakkhabhūtaṃ sukhaṃ nāma atthi, evaṃ bhave sati tappaṭipakkhena vibhavenāpi bhavitabbaṃ ^a^P0.0070^ea^, yathā ca uṇhe sati tassa vūpasamabhūtaṃ sītalampi atthi, evaṃ rāgādiaggīnaṃ vūpasamena nibbānena bhavitabbaṃ. yathā ca pāpassa lāmakassa dhammassa paṭipakkhabhūto kalyāṇo anavajjadhammopi ^a^V0.0082^ea^ atthiyeva, evameva pāpikāya jātiyā sati sabbajātikhepanato ajātisaṅkhātena nibbānenāpi bhavitabbamevāti. tena vuttaṃ --

[03] tattha ^b^yathāpī^eb^ti opammatthe nipāto. ^b^sukha^eb^nti kāyikacetasikasukhaṃ, suṭṭhu dukkhaṃ khaṇatīti sukhaṃ. ^b^bhave^eb^ti janane. ^b^vibhavo^eb^ti ajananaṃ, janane vijjamāne ajananadhammopi icchitabbo. ^b^tividhaggi vijjante^eb^ti tividhe rāgādike aggimhi vijjamāneti attho. ^b^nibbāna^eb^nti tassa tividhassa rāgādiaggissa nibbāpanaṃ upasamanaṃ nibbānañca icchitabbaṃ. ^b^pāpe^eb^ti akusale lāmake. ^b^kalyāṇamapī^eb^ti kusalamapi. ^b^evamevā^eb^ti evamevaṃ. ^b^jāti vijjante^eb^ti ^a^M0.0092^ea^ jātiyā vijjamānāyāti attho. liṅgabhedañca vibhattilopañca katvā vuttaṃ. ^b^ajātipī^eb^ti jātikhepanaṃ ajātinibbānampi icchitabbaṃ.

[03] athāhaṃ parampi cintesiṃ -- ``yathā nāma gūtharāsimhi nimuggena purisena dūratova kamalakuvalayapuṇḍarīkasaṇḍamaṇḍitaṃ vimalasalilaṃ taḷākaṃ disvā -- `katarena nu kho maggena tattha gantabba'nti taḷākaṃ gavesituṃ yuttaṃ. yaṃ tassa agavesanaṃ, na so tassa taḷākassa doso, tassa purisasseva doso. evameva kilesamaladhovane amatamahātaḷāke vijjamāne yaṃ tassa agavesanaṃ, na so amatasaṅkhātassa nibbānamahātaḷākassa doso, purisasseva doso. yathā pana corehi saṃparivārito puriso palāyanamagge vijjamānepi sace so na palāyati, na so tassa maggassa doso, tassa purisasseva doso. evameva kilesacorehi parivāretvā gahitassa purisassa vijjamāneyeva nibbānamahānagaragāmimhi sive mahāmagge tassa maggassa agavesanaṃ ^a^P0.0071^ea^ nāma na maggassa doso, purisasseva doso. yathā byādhipīḷito puriso vijjamāne byādhitikicchake vejje sace taṃ vejjaṃ gavesitvā taṃ byādhiṃ na tikicchāpeti, na ^a^V0.0083^ea^ so vejjassa doso, tassa purisasseva doso. evameva pana yo kilesabyādhiparipīḷito kilesavūpasamamaggakovidaṃ vijjamānameva ācariyaṃ na gavesati, tasseva doso, na kilesabyādhivināyakassa ācariyassa doso''ti. tena vuttaṃ --
[22] na gavesati taṃ taḷākaṃ, na doso taḷākassa so..
[22] na gavesati taṃ taḷākaṃ, na doso amatantaḷe..
[22] na palāyati so puriso, na doso añjasassa so..
[22] na gavesati taṃ maggaṃ, na doso sivamañjase..
[22] na tikicchāpeti taṃ byādhiṃ, na doso so tikicchake..
[22] na gavesati taṃ ācariyaṃ, na doso so vināyake''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^gūthagato^eb^ti gūthakūpagato, gūthena gato makkhito vā. ^b^kilesamaladhova^eb^nti kilesamalasodhane, bhummatthe paccattavacanaṃ. ^b^amatantaḷe^eb^ti amatasaṅkhātassa taḷākassa, sāmiatthe bhummavacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, anussaraṃ pakkhipitvā vuttaṃ. ^b^arīhī^eb^ti paccatthikehi. ^b^pariruddho^eb^ti samantato niruddho. ^b^gamanampathe^eb^ti gamanapathe. chandāvināsatthaṃ anussarāgamanaṃ katvā vuttaṃ. ^b^na palāyatī^eb^ti yadi na palāyeyya. ^b^so puriso^eb^ti so corehi pariruddho puriso. ^b^añjasassā^eb^ti ^a^P0.0072^ea^ maggassa. maggassa hi --
[22] nāvā uttarasetu ca, kullo ca bhisi saṅkamo''ti.. (cūḷani0 pārāyanatthutigāthāniddesa 101) --

[25] bahūni nāmāni. svāyamidha añjasanāmena vutto. ^b^sive^eb^ti sabbupaddavābhāvato sive. ^b^sivamañjase^eb^ti sivassa añjasassāti attho. ^b^tikicchake^eb^ti vejje. ^b^na tikicchāpetī^eb^ti na tikicchāpeyya. ^b^na doso so tikicchake^eb^ti tikicchakassa doso natthi, byādhitasseva dosoti attho. ^b^dukkhito^eb^ti sañjātakāyikacetasikadukkho. ^b^ācariya^eb^nti mokkhamaggācariyaṃ. ^b^vināyake^eb^ti ācariyassa.

[03] evaṃ panāhaṃ cintetvā uttarimpi evaṃ cintesiṃ -- ``yathāpi maṇḍanakajātiko puriso kaṇṭhe āsattaṃ kuṇapaṃ chaḍḍetvā sukhī gaccheyya, evaṃ mayāpi imaṃ pūtikāyaṃ chaḍḍetvā anapekkhena nibbānamahānagaraṃ pavisitabbaṃ. yathā ca naranāriyo ukkārabhūmiyaṃ uccārapassāvaṃ katvā na taṃ ucchaṅgena vā ādāya dasante vā veṭhetvā ādāya gacchanti, atha kho jigucchamānā oloketumpi anicchantā anapekkhā chaḍḍetvā gacchanti, evaṃ mayāpi imaṃ pūtikāyaṃ anapekkhena chaḍḍetvā amataṃ nibbānanagaraṃ pavisituṃ vaṭṭati. yathā ca nāvikā nāma jajjaraṃ nāvaṃ udakagāhiniṃ chaḍḍetvā anapekkhāva gacchanti, evamahampi imaṃ navahi vaṇamukhehi paggharantaṃ kāyaṃ chaḍḍetvā anapekkho nibbānamahānagaraṃ pavisissāmi ^a^M0.0094^ea^. yathā ca koci puriso muttāmaṇiveḷuriyādīni nānāvidhāni ratanāni ādāya corehi saddhiṃ maggaṃ gacchanto attano ratanavināsabhayena te core chaḍḍetvā khemaṃ maggaṃ gaṇhāti, evamayampi pūtikāyo ratanavilopakacorasadiso. sacāhaṃ ettha taṇhaṃ karissāmi, ariyamaggakusaladhammaratanāni me nassissanti, tasmā mayā imaṃ mahācorasadisaṃ karajakāyaṃ chaḍḍetvā nibbānamahānagaraṃ pavisituṃ vaṭṭatī''ti. tena vuttaṃ --
[22] chaḍḍayitvāna gacchissaṃ, vaccaṃ katvā yathā kuṭiṃ..

[03] tattha ^b^yathāpi kuṇapaṃ puriso^eb^ti yathāpi daharo yuvā maṇḍanakajātiko puriso ahikuṇapena vā kukkurakuṇapena vā manussakuṇapena vā kaṇṭhe āsattena aṭṭīyitvā harāyitvā jigucchitvā taṃ kuṇapaṃ mocetvā ^a^M0.0095^ea^ gaccheyya. ^b^sukhī^eb^ti sukhito. ^b^serī^eb^ti yathicchakavihārī. ^b^nānākuṇapasañcaya^eb^nti anekavidhakuṇaparāsibhūtaṃ ``nānākuṇapapūrita''ntipi pāṭho.

[03] ^b^uccāraṭṭhānamhī^eb^ti uccārenti vaccaṃ karonti etthāti uccāro, uccāro ca so ṭhānaṃ ceti uccāraṭṭhānaṃ. atha vā ussāsiyyatīti ussāso, vaccassetaṃ nāmaṃ, tassa ṭhānaṃ ussāsaṭṭhānaṃ, tasmiṃ ^b^ussāsaṭṭhānamhi,^eb^ ukkāraṭṭhāneti attho. ^b^vaccaṃ katvā yathā kuṭi^eb^nti vaccaṃ katvā kuṭiṃ naranāriyo viyāti attho.

[03] ^b^jajjara^eb^nti jiṇṇaṃ. ^b^palugga^eb^nti palujjantiṃ, vikirantinti attho. ^b^udagāhini^eb^nti udakagāhiniṃ ^a^V0.0086^ea^. ^b^sāmī^eb^ti nāvāsāmikā. ^b^navacchidda^eb^nti cakkhusotādīhi navahi vaṇamukhehi chiddāvacchiddehi yuttattā navacchiddaṃ. ^b^dhuvassava^eb^nti dhuvanissandaṃ, niccaṃ paggharaṇāsucinti attho.

[03] ^b^bhaṇḍamādiyā^eb^ti yaṃkiñci ratanādikaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ ādiya. ^b^bhaṇḍacchedabhayaṃ^eb^ ^a^P0.0074^ea^ ^b^disvā^eb^ti bhaṇḍassa acchindanena bhayaṃ disvāti attho. ^b^evamevā^eb^ti so bhaṇḍamādāya gacchanto puriso viya. ^b^ayaṃ kāyo^eb^ti ayaṃ pana kucchitānaṃ paramajegucchānaṃ āyoti kāyo. ^b^āyo^eb^ti upattiṭṭhānaṃ. āyanti tatoti āyo, kucchitā kesādayo. iti kucchitānaṃ kesādīnaṃ āyoti kāyo. ^b^mahācorasamo viyā^eb^ti cakkhuādīhi rūpādīsu piyarūpesu sārajjanādivasena pāṇātipātādinnādānādicoro hutvā sabbakusalaṃ vilumpatīti mahācorasamo. tasmā yathā so ratanabhaṇḍamādāya corehi saddhiṃ gacchanto puriso te core pahāya gacchati, evamevāhampi imaṃ mahācorasamaṃ kāyaṃ pahāya attano sotthibhāvakaraṃ maggaṃ gavesituṃ gamissāmīti atthasambandho veditabbo. ^b^kusalacchedanābhayā^eb^ti kusaladhammavilopanabhayenāti attho.

[03] athevaṃ sumedhapaṇḍito nānāvidhāhi upamāhi nekkhammakāraṇaṃ cintetvā punapi cintesi -- ``imaṃ mahādhanarāsiṃ saṃharitvā mayhaṃ pitupitāmahādayo paralokaṃ gacchantā ekakahāpaṇampi gahetvā na gatā, mayā pana gahetvā gamanakāraṇaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī''ti gantvā rañño ārocesi ^a^M0.0096^ea^ -- ``ahaṃ, mahārāja, jātijarādīhi upaddutahadayo agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajissāmi, mayhaṃ anekakoṭisatasahassaṃ dhanaṃ atthi, taṃ devo paṭipajjatū''ti. rājā āha -- ``na mayhaṃ te dhanena attho, tvaṃyeva yathicchakaṃ karohī''ti.

[03] so ca ``sādhu devā''ti nagare bheriṃ carāpetvā mahājanassa dānaṃ datvā vatthukāme ca kilesakāme ca pahāya amaravaranagarasadisato amaranagarato nikkhamitvā ekakova nānāmigagaṇavante himavante ^b^dhammikaṃ^eb^ nāma pabbataṃ nissāya assamaṃ katvā tattha paṇṇasālaṃ katvā pañcadosavivajjitaṃ caṅkamaṃ māpetvā aṭṭhaguṇasamupetaṃ abhiññābalaṃ samāharituṃ navadosasamannāgataṃ sāṭakaṃ pajahitvā dvādasaguṇamupāgataṃ vākacīraṃ nivāsetvā pabbaji. evaṃ pana so pabbajito aṭṭhadosasamākiṇṇaṃ paṇṇasālaṃ pahāya dasaguṇasamannāgataṃ rukkhamūlaṃ upagantvā sabbadhaññavikatiṃ pahāya pavattaphalabhojano hutvā nisajjaṭṭhānacaṅkamanavasena padhānaṃ padahanto sattāhabbhantareyeva aṭṭhannaṃ samāpattīnaṃ pañcannañca abhiññānaṃ lābhī ahosi. tena vuttaṃ --

[03] tattha ^b^evāha^eb^nti evaṃ ahaṃ, heṭṭhā vuttappakārena cintetvāti attho. ^b^nāthānāthāna^eb^nti sanāthānamanāthānañca aḍḍhānañceva daliddānañca ``atthikā gaṇhantū''ti saha koṭṭhāgārehi datvāti attho. ^b^himavantassāvidūre^eb^ti himavantapabbatarājassa avidūre samīpe. ^b^dhammiko nāma pabbato^eb^ti evaṃnāmako pabbato. kasmā panāyaṃ dhammikoti? yebhuyyena pana bodhisattā isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā taṃ pabbataṃ upanissāya abhiññāyo nibbattetvā samaṇadhammaṃ akaṃsu. tasmā samaṇadhammassa nissayabhūtattā ``dhammiko''tveva pākaṭo ahosi. ^b^assamo sukato mayha^eb^ntiādinā sumedhapaṇḍitena assamapaṇṇasālā caṅkamā sahatthā māpitā viya vuttā, na ca pana sahatthā māpitā, kintu sakkena devena pesite vissakammunā devaputtena nimmitā. bhagavā ^a^V0.0088^ea^ pana tadā attano puññānubhāvena nibbattaṃ taṃ sampadaṃ sandhāya -- ``sāriputta, tasmiṃ pabbate --

[03] tattha ^b^paṇṇasālā^eb^ti paṇṇachadanasālā. ^b^tatthā^eb^ti tasmiṃ assamapade. ^b^pañcadosavivajjita^eb^nti pañcahi caṅkamadosehi vivajjitaṃ. katame pañca caṅkamadosā nāma? thaddhavisamatā, antorukkhatā, gahanacchannatā, atisambādhatā, ativisālatāti imehi pañcahi ^a^P0.0076^ea^ dosehi vivajjitaṃ. ukkaṭṭhaparicchedena dīghato saṭṭhiratano vitthārato diyaḍḍharatano caṅkamo vutto. atha vā ^b^pañcadosavivajjita^eb^nti pañcahi nīvaraṇadosehi vivajjitaṃ parihīnaṃ ^b^abhiññābalamāhari^eb^nti iminā uttarapadena sambandho daṭṭhabbo (dha0 sa0 aṭṭha0 nidānakathā, sumedhakathā). ^b^aṭṭhaguṇasamupeta^eb^nti ``evaṃ samāhite citte parisuddhe pariyodāte anaṅgaṇe vigatūpakkilese mudubhūte kammaniye ṭhite āneñjappatte''ti evaṃ vuttehi aṭṭhaguṇehi (dī0 ni0 1.244-245; ma0 ni0 1.384-386, 431-433; pārā0 12-14) samannāgataṃ abhiññābalaṃ āhariṃ ānesinti attho.

[03] keci ^a^M0.0098^ea^ pana ``aṭṭhahi samaṇasukhehi upetaṃ, aṭṭhimāni samaṇasukhāni nāma dhanadhaññapariggahābhāvo, anavajjapiṇḍapātapariyesanabhāvo, nibbutapiṇḍabhuñjanabhāvo, raṭṭhaṃ pīḷetvā dhanadhaññādīsu gaṇhantesu rājapurisesu raṭṭhapīḷanakilesābhāvo, upakaraṇesu nicchandarāgabhāvo, coravilopane nibbhayabhāvo, rājarājamahāmattehi asaṃsaṭṭhabhāvo, catūsu disāsu appaṭihatabhāvoti imehi aṭṭhahi samaṇasukhehi (apa0 aṭṭha0 1ḍūrenidāna, sumedhakathā; dha0 sa0 aṭṭha0 nidānakathā) upetaṃ samupetaṃ assamaṃ māpesi''nti assamena sambandhaṃ katvā vadanti, taṃ pāḷiyā na sameti.

[03] ^b^sāṭaka^eb^nti vatthaṃ. ^b^tatthā^eb^ti tasmiṃ assame. ^b^navadosamupāgata^eb^nti, sāriputta, tattha vasanto attano nivatthapārutaṃ mahagghasāṭakaṃ ^b^pajahiṃ^eb^ pariccajiṃ. sāṭakaṃ pajahanto ca tattha nava dose disvā pajahinti dīpeti. tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitānañhi sāṭakasmiṃ nava dosā pakāsitā. katame nava? sāṭakassa mahagghabhāvo, parapaṭibaddhabhāvo, paribhogena lahukaṃ kilissanabhāvo, kiliṭṭho ca dhovitabbo puna rajitabbo ca hoti paribhogena jīraṇabhāvo, jiṇṇassa puna tunnakaraṇaṃ ^a^V0.0089^ea^ vā aggaḷadānaṃ vā kātabbaṃ hoti puna pariyesanāya durabhisambhavabhāvo, tāpasapabbajjāya ananucchavikabhāvo, paccatthikānaṃ sādhāraṇabhāvo, yathā naṃ na paccatthikā gaṇhanti, evaṃ gopetabbo hoti paridahato vibhūsanaṭṭhānabhāvo, gahetvā carantassa mahicchabhāvoti etehi navahi dosehi (apa0 aṭṭha0 1ḍūrenidāna, sumedhakathā) upagataṃ sāṭakaṃ pahāya vākacīraṃ nivāsesinti dīpeti. ^b^vākacīra^eb^nti muñjatiṇaṃ hīrāhīraṃ katvā ganthetvā kataṃ vākamayacīraṃ nivāsanapārupanatthāya ādiyinti attho. ^b^dvādasaguṇamupāgata^eb^nti dvādasahi ānisaṃsehi upetaṃ. ettha ^b^guṇa^eb^-saddo ānisaṃsaṭṭho ``sataguṇā dakkhiṇā pāṭikaṅkhitabbā''tiādīsu (ma0 ni0 3.379) viya. ^b^ma^eb^-kāro padasandhikaro. vākacīrasmiṃ dvādasānisaṃsā ^a^P0.0077^ea^ appagghatā, aparāyattatā, sahatthā kātuṃ sakkuṇeyyatā, paribhogena jiṇṇepi sibbitabbābhāvo, corabhayābhāvo pariyesantassa sukhena karaṇabhāvo, tāpasapabbajjāya sāruppabhāvo, sevamānassa vibhūsanaṭṭhānābhāvo, cīvarappaccaye appicchabhāvo ^a^M0.0099^ea^, paribhogasukhabhāvo, vākuppattiyā sulabhabhāvo, vākacīre naṭṭhepi anapekkhabhāvoti imehi dvādasahi guṇehi sampannaṃ (apa0 aṭṭha0 1ḍūrenidāna, sumedhakathā; dha0 sa0 aṭṭha0 nidānakathā).

[03] atha sumedhapaṇḍito tattha paṇṇasālāyaṃ viharanto paccūsasamaye paccuṭṭhāya attano nikkhamanakāraṇaṃ paccavekkhamāno evaṃ kira cintesi -- ``ahaṃ pana navakanakakaṭakanūpurādisaṅghaṭṭanasaddasammissita-madhurahasitakathitagehajanaramaṇīyaṃ uḷāravibhavasobhitaṃ suravarabhavanākāramagāraṃ kheḷapiṇḍaṃ viya pahāya vivekārāmatāya sabbajanapāpapavāhanaṃ tapovanaṃ paviṭṭhosmi, idha pana me paṇṇasālāya vāso dutiyo gharāvāso viya hoti, handāhaṃ rukkhamūle vaseyya''nti. tena vuttaṃ --

[03] tattha ^b^aṭṭhadosasamākiṇṇa^eb^nti aṭṭhahi dosehi samākiṇṇaṃ saṃyuttaṃ. katamehi aṭṭhahi? mahāsambhārehi nipphādanīyatā, tiṇapaṇṇamattikādīhi niccaṃ paṭijagganīyatā, senāsanaṃ nāma mahallakassa pāpuṇātīti avelāya vuṭṭhāpiyamānassa cittekaggatā na hotīti vuṭṭhāpanīyabhāvo, sītuṇhassa paṭighātena kāyassa sukhumālakaraṇabhāvo, gharaṃ paviṭṭhena yaṃ kiñci pāpaṃ sakkā kātunti garahapaṭicchādanakaraṇabhāvo, ``mayhamida''nti sapariggahabhāvo, gehassa atthibhāvo sadutiyakavāso, ūkāmaṅgulagharagoḷikādīnaṃ sādhāraṇatāya bahusādhāraṇabhāvoti ^a^V0.0090^ea^ iti ime aṭṭha ādīnave (apa0 aṭṭha0 1ḍūrenidāna, sumedhakathā) disvā mahāsatto paṇṇasālaṃ pajahiṃ.

[03] ^b^guṇe dasahupāgata^eb^nti channaṃ paṭikkhipitvā dasahi guṇehi upetaṃ, rukkhamūlaṃ upagatosmīti attho. katamehi dasahi? appasamārambhatā, upagamanamattamevettha hotīti sulabhānavajjatā, abhiṇhaṃ tarupaṇṇavikāradassanena aniccasaññāsamuṭṭhāpanatā, senāsanamaccherābhāvo, tattha hi pāpaṃ karonto lajjatīti pāpakaraṇārahābhāvo, pariggahakaraṇābhāvo, devatāhi saha vāso, channapaṭikkhepo, paribhogasukhatā, rukkhamūlasenāsanassa gatagataṭṭhāne sulabhatāya anapekkhabhāvoti iti ime dasa guṇe (apa0 aṭṭha0 1ḍūrenidāna, sumedhakathā) disvā rukkhamūlaṃ upagatosmīti vadati. āha ca --

[03] atha sumedhapaṇḍito paṇṇasālāya diṭṭhadoso hutvā rukkhamūlasenāsane laddhānisaṃso viharanto uttaripi cintesi -- ``āhāratthāya me gāmagamanaṃ āhārapariyesanadukkhaṃ, nāhaṃ kenaci pārijuññena nikkhamitvā āhāratthāya pabbajito, āhārapariyesanamūlassa ca dukkhassa pamāṇaṃ natthi, yaṃnūnāhaṃ pavattaphalena yāpeyya''nti. imaṃ pana atthavisesaṃ dīpento --

[03] tattha ^a^V0.0091^ea^ ^b^vāpita^eb^nti vapitvā nipphannaṃ. ^b^ropita^eb^nti ropitvā nipphannaṃ, vapanaropanavasena duvidhāva sassanipphatti, taṃ duvidhampi attano appicchatāya pahāya pavattaphalena yāpesiṃ. ^b^pavattaphala^eb^nti sayameva patitaphalaṃ. ^b^ādiyi^eb^nti paribhuñjiṃ.
[22] tasmā hi nātimaññeyya, pavattaphalabhojana''nti.. (visuddhi0 1.26 thokaṃ visadisaṃ) --

[25] evaṃ pavattamāno sumedhapaṇḍito nacirasseva antosattāhe aṭṭha samāpattiyo pañca abhiññāyo ca pāpuṇi. imamatthaṃ pakāsentena ^b^``tatthappadhānaṃ^eb^ ^a^M0.0101^ea^ ^b^padahi''^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^tatthā^eb^ti tasmiṃ assame. ^b^padhāna^eb^nti vīriyaṃ, vīriyañhi padahitabbato padhānabhāvakaraṇato vā ``padhāna''nti vuccati. ^b^padahi^eb^nti vīriyamārabhiṃ. ^b^nissajjaṭṭhānacaṅkame^eb^ti nisajjāya ca ṭhānena ca caṅkamena ca.

[03] sumedhapaṇḍito pana seyyaṃ paṭikkhipitvā nisajjaṭṭhānacaṅkameheva rattindivaṃ vītināmetvā sattāhabbhantareyeva abhiññābalaṃ pāpuṇi. evaṃ pana abhiññābalaṃ patvā sumedhatāpase samāpattisukhena vītināmente tadā sabbajanasaṅgahakaro mārabalabhayaṃkaro ñāṇadīpaṅkaro ^b^dīpaṅkaro^eb^ nāma satthā loke udapādi.

[03] saṅkhepeneva tassāyamānupubbikathā -- ayaṃ kira dīpaṅkaro nāma mahāsatto samattiṃsa pāramiyo pūretvā vessantarattabhāvasadise attabhāve ṭhito pathavikampanādīni mahādānāni datvā āyupariyosāne ^a^P0.0079^ea^ tusitapure nibbattitvā tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā dasasahassacakkavāḷadevatāhi sannipatitvā --
[22] sadevakaṃ tārayanto, bujjhassu amataṃ pada''nti.. (bu0 vaṃ0 1.67) --

[25] vutte ^a^V0.0092^ea^ tato so devatānaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā ca pañca mahāvilokanāni viloketvā tato cuto rammavatīnagare attano yasavibhūtiyā vijitavāsudevassa naradevassa sudevassa nāma rañño kule sumedhāya deviyā kucchismiṃ āsāḷhipuṇṇamiyā uttarāsāḷhanakkhattena paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā mahatā parivārena parihariyamāno mahādeviyā kucchimhi maṇikūṭagato viya kenaci asucinā amakkhito dasa māse vasitvā saliladharavivaragato saradakālacando viya tassā udarato nikkhami.

[03] tassa pana dīpaṅkarakumārassa paṭisandhikkhaṇepi vijātakkhaṇepi ^b^dvattiṃsa pubbanimittāni^eb^ pāṭihāriyāni pāturahesuṃ. sabbasabbaññubodhisattesu mātukucchiṃ okkamantesu nikkhamantesu sambujjhantesu dhammacakkaṃ pavattantesūti imesu ^a^M0.0102^ea^ catūsu ṭhānesu dvattiṃsa pāṭihāriyāni pavattanteva. tasmā mayā pākaṭattā dīpaṅkarakumārassa jātiyaṃ dassitāni --
[22] pakampi saṅkampi tadā samantā, sahassasaṅkhyā dasalokadhātu..
[22] paṭhamaṃ paṭiggaṇhiṃsu, pacchā taṃ manujā pana..
[21] ``avāditā kenaci cammanaddhā, supokkharā dundubhiyo ca vīṇā.
[22] aghaṭṭitānābharaṇāni tasmiṃ, khaṇe samantā madhuraṃ raviṃsu..
[21] ``chijjiṃsu sabbattha ca bandhanāni, sayaṃ vigacchiṃsu ca sabbarogā.
[22] rūpāni passiṃsu ca jātiandhā, saddaṃ samantā badhirā suṇiṃsu..
[21] ``anussatiṃ jātijaḷā manussā, labhiṃsu yānaṃ padasāva paṅgulā.
[21] ``ākāsaṭṭhaṃ ^a^V0.0093^ea^ ^a^P0.0080^ea^ bhūmigatañca sabbaṃ, sayaṃ samantā ratanaṃ viroci.
[22] nibbāyi ghore niraye hutāso, nadīsu toyampi ca nappavatti..
[21] ``na vāyi vāto pharuso kharo vā, samphullapupphā taravo ahesuṃ.
[22] viroci cando adhikaṃ satāro, na cāpi uṇho sūriyo ahosi..
[21] ``khagā nabhamhāpi ca rukkhato ca, haṭṭhāva heṭṭhā pathaviṃ bhajiṃsu.
[22] mahācatuddīpagato ca megho, pavassi toyaṃ madhuraṃ samantā..
[21] ``ṭhatvāva dibbe bhavane sakasmiṃ, pasannacittā pana devatāyo.
[22] nacciṃsu gāyiṃsu ca vādayiṃsu, seḷiṃsu tā keḷimakaṃsu ceva..
[21] ``sayaṃ kira dvāramahākavāṭā, khaṇeva tasmiṃ vivaṭā ahesuṃ.
[22] mahājane neva khudā pipāsā, pīḷesi lokaṃ kira kañci kañci..
[21] ``ye niccaverā pana pāṇisaṅghā, te mettacittaṃ paramaṃ labhiṃsu.
[22] kākā ulūkehi cariṃsu saddhiṃ, koṇā varāhehi akaṃsu keḷiṃ..
[21] ``ghorāpi sappānamukhāpi sappā, kīḷiṃsu kāmaṃ nakulehi saddhiṃ.
[22] khujjā ahesuṃ samacārukāyā, mūgā ca vācaṃ madhuraṃ lapiṃsu..
[22] assā ca hesiṃsu pahaṭṭhacittā, gajjiṃsu mattā varavāraṇāpi..

[03] tatra hissa dasasahassilokadhātukampo sabbaññutaññāṇapaṭilābhassa pubbanimittaṃ, devatānaṃ ekacakkavāḷe sannipāto dhammacakkappavattanakāle ekappahāreneva sannipatitvā dhammapaṭiggahaṇassa pubbanimittaṃ, paṭhamaṃ devatānaṃ paṭiggahaṇaṃ catunnaṃ rūpāvacarajjhānānaṃ paṭilābhassa pubbanimittaṃ, pacchā manussānaṃ paṭiggahaṇaṃ catunnaṃ arūpāvacarajjhānānaṃ paṭilābhassa pubbanimittaṃ, cammanaddhadundubhīnaṃ sayameva vajjanaṃ mahantiyā dhammabheriyā anusāvanassa pubbanimittaṃ, vīṇābharaṇānaṃ sayameva vajjanaṃ anupubbavihārapaṭilābhassa pubbanimittaṃ, bandhanānaṃ sayameva chedo asmimānasamucchedassa pubbanimittaṃ, mahājanassa sabbarogavigamo catusaccaphalapaṭilābhassa pubbanimittaṃ, jaccandhānaṃ rūpadassanaṃ dibbacakkhupaṭilābhassa pubbanimittaṃ, badhirānaṃ saddassavanaṃ dibbasotadhātupaṭilābhassa pubbanimittaṃ.

[03] jātijaḷānaṃ anussatuppādo catusatipaṭṭhānapaṭilābhassa pubbanimittaṃ, paṅgulānaṃ padasā gamanaṃ caturiddhipādapaṭilābhassa pubbanimittaṃ, videsagatānaṃ nāvānaṃ sapaṭṭanāgamanaṃ catupaṭisambhidādhigamassa, ratanānaṃ sayameva virocanaṃ dhammobhāsapaṭilābhassa, niraye agginibbāyanaṃ ekādasagginibbāyanassa, nadīsu toyassa nappavattanaṃ catuvesārajjapaṭilābhassa, lokantare āloko avijjandhakāraṃ vidhametvā ñāṇalokadassanassa, mahāsamuddassa ^a^M0.0105^ea^ madhurodakatā nibbānarasena ekarasabhāvassa, vātassa avāyanaṃ dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhigatabhedanassa, tarūnaṃ pupphitabhāvo vimuttipupphehi pupphitabhāvassa pubbanimittaṃ.

[03] candassa ativirocanaṃ bahujanakantatāya pubbanimittaṃ, sūriyassa nātiuṇhavimalabhāvo kāyikacetasikasukhuppattiyā, khagānaṃ nagādīhi pathavigamanaṃ ovādaṃ sutvā mahājanassa pāṇehi saraṇagamanassa, mahato catuddīpagatameghassa pavassanaṃ mahato dhammavassassa, devatānaṃ sakasakabhavanesveva ṭhatvā naccādīhi kīḷanaṃ buddhabhāvaṃ patvā udānudānassa, dvārakavāṭānaṃ sayameva vivaraṇaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikamaggadvāravivaraṇassa, khudāpīḷanassa abhāvo vimuttisukhena sukhitabhāvassa, verīnaṃ mettacittapaṭilābho catubrahmavihārapaṭilābhassa, dasasahassilokadhātuyā ^a^P0.0082^ea^ ekadhajamālitā ariyadhajamālitāya pubbanimittaṃ, sesavisesā pana sesabuddhaguṇapaṭilābhassa pubbanimittānīti veditabbā.

[03] atha ^a^V0.0095^ea^ ^b^dīpaṅkarakumāro^eb^ mahatiyā sampattiyā paricāriyamāno anukkamena bhaddaṃ yobbanaṃ patvā tiṇṇaṃ utūnaṃ anucchavikesu tīsu pāsādesu devalokasiriṃ viya rajjasirimanubhavanto uyyānakīḷāya gamanasamaye anukkamena jiṇṇabyādhimatasaṅkhāte tayo devadūte disvā sañjātasaṃvego nivattitvā sudassananagarasadisavibhavasobhaṃ rammavatī nāma nagaraṃ pāvisi. nagaraṃ pavisitvā puna catutthavāre hatthācariyaṃ pakkosāpetvā etadavoca -- ``ahaṃ, tāta, uyyānadassanatthāya nikkhamissāmi hatthiyānāni kappāpehī''ti. so ``sādhu, devā''ti paṭisuṇitvā caturāsītihatthisahassāni kappāpesi. atha vissakammo nāma devaputto bodhisattaṃ nānāvirāgavasananivāsanaṃ āmukkamuttāhārakeyūraṃ ruciranavakanakakaṭakamakuṭakuṇḍaladharaṃ paramasurabhikusumamālasamalaṅkatasiroruhaṃ samalaṅkari kira. atha dīpaṅkarakumāro devakumāro viya caturāsītiyā hatthisahassehi parivuto hatthikkhandhavaragato mahatā balakāyena parivuto ratijananaṃ uyyānaṃ pavisitvā hatthikkhandhato oruyha taṃ uyyānamanusañcaritvā paramaruciradassane sakahadayasītale silātale nisīditvā pabbajjāya cittaṃ uppādesi ^a^M0.0106^ea^. taṅkhaṇaññeva suddhāvāsakhīṇāsavo mahābrahmā aṭṭha samaṇaparikkhāre ādāya mahāpurisassa cakkhupathe pāturahosi.
