[03] mahāpuriso taṃ disvā -- ``kimida''nti pucchitvā, ``samaṇaparikkhāro''ti sutvā alaṅkārabhaṇḍaṃ omuñcitvā pasādhanabhaṇḍāgārikassa hatthe datvā maṅgalakhaggamādāya saddhiṃ makuṭena kese chinditvā antalikkhe ākāse ukkhipi. atha sakko devarājā suvaṇṇacaṅkoṭakena taṃ kesamakuṭaṃ ādāya sinerumuddhani tiyojanappamāṇaṃ indanīlamaṇimayaṃ ^b^makuṭacetiyaṃ^eb^ nāma akāsi. atha mahāpuriso devadattiyaṃ arahattadhajaṃ kāsāvaṃ paridahitvā sāṭakayugaṃ ākāse khipi. taṃ brahmā paṭiggahetvā brahmaloke dvādasayojanikaṃ sabbaratanamayaṃ cetiyamakāsi. dīpaṅkarakumāraṃ pana pabbajantaṃ ekā purisakoṭi anupabbaji. tāya pana parisāya parivuto bodhisatto dasa māse padhānacariyaṃ acari. atha visākhapuṇṇamāya aññataraṃ nagaraṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi.

[03] tasmiṃ kira nagare taṃdivasaṃ devatānaṃ balikaraṇatthāya nirudakapāyāsaṃ paciṃsu. tassa pana mahāsattassa saparisassa piṇḍāya paviṭṭhassa manussā adaṃsu. taṃ kira sabbesaṃ koṭisaṅkhyāyānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pariyattaṃ ahosi. mahāpurisassa pana patte devatā dibbojaṃ pakkhipiṃsu. taṃ paribhuñjitvā tattheva ^a^P0.0083^ea^ sālavane divāvihāraṃ vītināmetvā sāyanhasamaye paṭisallānā vuṭṭhāya gaṇaṃ vissajjetvā ^b^sunandena^eb^ nāmājīvakena dinnā aṭṭha tiṇamuṭṭhiyo gahetvā ^a^V0.0096^ea^ pipphalibodhirukkhamūlaṃ gantvā tiṇasantharaṃ santharitvā navutihatthaṃ bodhikkhandhaṃ piṭṭhito katvā pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā caturaṅgavīriyaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā bodhirukkhamūle nisīdi.

[03] tato mārabalaṃ vidhamitvā rattiyā paṭhamayāme pubbenivāsaṃ anussaritvā majjhimayāme dibbacakkhuṃ visodhetvā pacchimayāme anulomapaṭilomavasena paccayākāraṃ sammasitvā ānāpānacatutthajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhāya pañcasu khandhesu abhinivisitvā udayabbayavasena samapaññāsa lakkhaṇāni disvā yāva gotrabhuñāṇaṃ vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā aruṇodaye ariyamaggena sakalabuddhaguṇe paṭivijjhitvā buddhasīhanādaṃ naditvā sattasattāhaṃ bodhisamīpeyeva vītināmetvā brahmuno dhammadesanaṃ paṭiññāya ^b^sunandārāme^eb^ dhammacakkaṃ pavattetvā koṭisatānaṃ devamanussānaṃ dhammāmataṃ pāyetvā catuddīpikamahāmegho viya dhammavassaṃ ^a^M0.0107^ea^ vassento mahājanassa bandhanamokkhaṃ karonto janapadacārikaṃ vicari.
[03] tadā kira sumedhapaṇḍito samāpattisukhena vītināmento neva pathavikampanamaddasa na tāni nimittāni. tena vuttaṃ --

[03] tattha ^b^eva^eb^nti idāni vattabbaṃ nidasseti. ^b^me^eb^ti mama. ^b^siddhippattassā^eb^ti pañcābhiññāsiddhippattassa. ^b^vasībhūtassā^eb^ti bhūtavasissa, ciṇṇavasībhāvamupagatassāti attho. ^b^sāsane^eb^ti vivekamānasānaṃ sāsane, anādaralakkhaṇe sāmivacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^jino^eb^ti kilesārijayanena jino.

[03] ^b^uppajjante^eb^ti paṭisandhiggahaṇe. ^b^jāyante^eb^ti mātukucchito nikkhamane. ^b^bujjhante^eb^ti anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambujjhante. ^b^dhammadesane^eb^ti dhammacakkappavattane. ^b^caturo^eb^ ^a^P0.0084^ea^ ^b^nimitte^eb^ti cattāri nimittāni. dīpaṅkarassa dasabalassa paṭisandhi-jāti-bodhi-dhammacakkappavattanesu catūsu ṭhānesu dasasahassilokadhātukampanādīni nimittānīti attho. etthāha -- tāni pana bahūni nimittāni, kasmā ^a^V0.0097^ea^ ``caturo nimitte''ti vuttaṃ, ayuttaṃ nanūti? nāyuttaṃ, yadipi etāni bahūni nimittāni, catūsu ṭhānesu pana pavattattā ``caturo nimitte''ti vuttaṃ. ^b^nāddasa^eb^nti nāddasiṃ. idāni tesaṃ catunnaṃ nimittānaṃ adassane kāraṇaṃ niddisanto ^b^``jhānaratisamappito''^eb^ti āha. ^b^jhānaratī^eb^ti samāpattisukhassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. jhānaratiyā samappitattā samaṅgībhūtattā tāni nimittāni nāddasanti attho.

[03] atha tasmiṃ kāle dīpaṅkaradasabalo catūhi khīṇāsavasatasahassehi parivuto anupubbena cārikaṃ caramāno paramarammaṃ rammaṃ nāma nagaraṃ patvā ^b^sudassana^eb^mahāvihāre paṭivasati. rammanagaravāsino ``dīpaṅkaro kira dasabalo anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ patvā pavattitavaradhammacakko anupubbena ^a^M0.0108^ea^ cārikaṃ caramāno rammanagaraṃ patvā sudassanamahāvihāre paṭivasatī''ti sutvā sappiādīni bhesajjāni gahetvā bhuttapātarāsā suddhuttarāsaṅgā pupphadhūpagandhahatthā yena buddho tenupasaṅkamiṃsu, upasaṅkamitvā satthāraṃ vanditvā pupphādīhi pūjetvā ekamantaṃ nisīditvā atimadhuraṃ dhammakathaṃ sutvā svātanāya bhagavantaṃ nimantetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā dasabalaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkamiṃsu.

[03] te punadivase asadisamahādānaṃ sajjetvā maṇḍapaṃ kāretvā vimalakomalehi nīluppalehi chādetvā catujjātigandhena paribhaṇḍaṃ kāretvā lājapañcamāni surabhikusumāni vikiritvā maṇḍapassa catūsu koṇesu sītalamadhuravāripuṇṇā cāṭiyo ṭhapetvā kadalipaṇṇehi pidahitvā maṇḍapopari jayasumanakusumasadisaṃ paramaruciradassanaṃ celavitānaṃ bandhitvā suvaṇṇamaṇirajatatārakāhi racayitvā tattha gandhadāmapupphadāmapattadāmaratanadāmāni olambetvā dhūpehi duddinaṃ katvā sakalañca taṃ rammaṃ rammanagaraṃ sammaṭṭhaṃ saphalakadaliyo ca pupphasamalaṅkate puṇṇaghaṭe ca ṭhapāpetvā nānāvirāgā dhajapaṭākāyo ca samussāpetvā mahāvīthiyā ubhosu passesu sāṇipākārehi parikkhipitvā dīpaṅkaradasabalassa āgamanamaggaṃ alaṅkarontā udakaparibhinnaṭṭhānesu paṃsuṃ pakkhipitvā cikkhallakampi pathaviṃ asamaṃ samaṃ katvā muttāsadisāhi vālukāhi ākiranti, lājapañcamehi ca pupphehi ākiranti, saphalakadalikamuke ca patiṭṭhāpenti.

[03] atha tasmiṃ kāle sumedhatāpaso attano assamapadato uggantvā rammanagaravāsīnaṃ tesaṃ manussānaṃ uparibhāgena ākāsena gacchanto te haṭṭhapahaṭṭhe maggaṃ sodhente ca alaṅkaronte ca disvā -- ``kiṃ nu kho kāraṇa''nti cintetvā sabbesaṃ passantānaññeva ^a^P0.0085^ea^ ākāsato oruyha ekamante ^a^V0.0098^ea^ ṭhatvā te manusse pucchi -- ``ambho! kassatthāya tumhe imaṃ maggaṃ sodhethā''ti? tena vuttaṃ --

[03] tattha ^b^paccantadesavisaye^eb^ti majjhimadesasseva ekapasse paccantadesasaññite janapade. ^b^tassa āgamanaṃ magga^eb^nti tena āgantabbaṃ magganti attho. ^b^ahaṃ tena samayenā^eb^ti ahaṃ tasmiṃ samaye, bhummatthe cetaṃ karaṇavacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^sakassamā^eb^ti attano assamapadato nikkhamitvā. ^b^dhunanto^eb^ti odhunanto. ^b^``tena samayena'' ca, ``tadā'' cā^eb^ti imesaṃ dvinnaṃ padānaṃ ekatthattā purimassa nikkhamanakiriyāya pacchimassa ca gamanakiriyāya saddhiṃ sambandho veditabbo, itarathā punaruttidosā na muccati. ^b^tadā^eb^ti tasmiṃ samaye.

[03] ^b^vedajāta^eb^nti sañjātasomanassaṃ. ^b^tuṭṭhahaṭṭhaṃ pamodita^eb^nti imāni tīṇi padāni aññamaññavevacanāni aññamaññassa atthadīpanāni. atha vā sukhena ^b^tuṭṭhaṃ,^eb^ pītiyā ^b^haṭṭhaṃ,^eb^ pāmojjena ^b^pamuditaṃ^eb^. ^b^orohitvānā^eb^ti otaritvā. ^b^manusse pucchī^eb^ti mānuse pucchi. ayameva vā pāṭho. ^b^tāvade^eb^ti tadā, taṅkhaṇeyevāti attho. idāni pucchitamatthaṃ dassentena ^b^``tuṭṭhahaṭṭho pamudito''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ayaṃ mahājano tuṭṭhahaṭṭho pamoditahadayo hutvā maggaṃ sodheti, kiṃ kāraṇā sodheti, kassatthāya vā sodhetīti? evaṃ ``sodheti'' saddaṃ āharitvā attho daṭṭhabbo, itarathā na yujjati. ^b^sodhīyatī^eb^ti suddhabhāvo karīyati. ^b^maggo añjasaṃ vaṭumāyana^eb^nti maggassevetāni vevacanāni.

[03] evaṃ ^a^V0.0099^ea^ tena sumedhatāpasena puṭṭhā te manussā āhaṃsu -- ``bhante ^a^P0.0086^ea^ sumedha, kiṃ na jānātha dīpaṅkaro nāma buddho anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ patvā pavattitavaradhammacakko janapadacārikaṃ caramāno anukkamena amhākaṃ nagaraṃ patvā sudassanamahāvihāre paṭivasati, mayaṃ taṃ bhagavantaṃ nimantayitvā tasseva buddhassa bhagavato āgamanamaggaṃ sodhemā''ti. tato taṃ sutvā sumedhapaṇḍito cintesi -- ``buddhoti kho panesa ghosopi dullabho, pageva buddhuppādo, tena hi mayāpi imehi manussehi saddhiṃ dasabalassa āgamanamaggaṃ sodhetuṃ vaṭṭatī''ti. so te manusse ^a^M0.0110^ea^ āha -- ``sace, bho, tumhe imaṃ maggaṃ buddhassa sodhetha, mayhampi ekaṃ okāsaṃ detha, ahampi tumhehi saddhiṃ buddhassa maggaṃ sodhessāmī''ti. tato te ``sādhū''ti sampaṭicchitvā -- ``ayaṃ sumedhapaṇḍito mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo''ti jānamānā dubbisodhanaṃ udakasambhinnaṃ ativiya visamaṃ ekaṃ okāsaṃ sallakkhetvā -- ``imaṃ okāsaṃ tumhe sodhetha alaṅkarotha cā''ti adaṃsu. tato sumedhapaṇḍito buddhārammaṇaṃ pītiṃ uppādetvā cintesi -- ``ahaṃ pana imaṃ okāsaṃ iddhiyā paramadassanīyaṃ kātuṃ pahomi, evaṃ kate pana maṃ na paritosessati. ajja pana mayā kāyaveyyāvaccaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī''ti paṃsuṃ āharitvā taṃ padesaṃ pūreti.

[03] tassa pana tasmiṃ padese asodhite vippakateyeva rammanagaravāsino manussā bhagavato kālamārocesuṃ -- ``niṭṭhitaṃ, bhante, bhatta''nti. evaṃ tehi kāle ārocite dasabalo jayasumanakusumasadisavaṇṇaṃ dupaṭṭacīvaraṃ timaṇḍalaṃ paṭicchādetvā nivāsetvā tassupari suvaṇṇapāmaṅgena jayasumanakusumakalāpaṃ parikkhipanto viya vijjulatāsassirikaṃ kāyabandhanaṃ bandhitvā kanakagirisikharamatthake lākhārasaṃ parisiñcanto viya suvaṇṇacetiyaṃ pavāḷajālena parikkhipanto viya ca suvaṇṇagghikaṃ rattakambalena paṭimuñcanto viya ca saradasamayarajanikaraṃ rattavalāhakena paṭicchādento viya ca lākhārasena tintakiṃsukakusumasadisavaṇṇaṃ rattavarapaṃsukūlacīvaraṃ pārupitvā gandhakuṭidvārato kañcanaguhato sīho viya nikkhamitvā gandhakuṭipamukhe aṭṭhāsi. atha sabbe bhikkhū attano attano pattacīvaramādāya bhagavantaṃ parivārayiṃsu. te pana parivāretvā ṭhitā bhikkhū evarūpā ahesuṃ --

[03] iti ^a^M0.0111^ea^ ^a^P0.0087^ea^ bhagavā sayaṃ vītarāgo vītarāgehi vītadoso vītadosehi vītamoho vītamohehi parivuto ativiya virocittha. atha satthā mahānubhāvānaṃ khīṇāsavānaṃ chaḷabhiññānaṃ catūhi satasahassehi parivuto marugaṇaparivuto dasasatanayano viya brahmagaṇaparivuto hāritamahābrahmā viya ca aparimitasamayasamupacitakusalabalajanitāya anopamāya buddhalīḷāya tārāgaṇaparivuto saradasamayarajanikaro viya ca gaganatalaṃ taṃ maggaṃ alaṅkatapaṭiyattaṃ paṭipajji.
[22] suvaṇṇavaṇṇe kusume karonto, suvaṇṇavaṇṇo paṭipajji maggaṃ''..

[03] sumedhatāpasopi tena alaṅkatapaṭiyattena maggena āgacchantassa dīpaṅkarassa bhagavato dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ asītiyā anubyañjanehi anurañjitaṃ byāmappabhāya parikkhepaṃ sassirikaṃ indanīlamaṇisadisaṃ ākāse nānappakārā vijjulatā viya chabbaṇṇabuddharasmiyo vissajjentaṃ rūpasobhaggappattaṃ attabhāvaṃ akkhīni ummīletvā oloketvā -- ``ajja mayā dasabalassa jīvitapariccāgaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī''ti, ``mā bhagavā kalale akkami, maṇimayaphalakasetuṃ akkamanto viya saddhiṃ catūhi khīṇāsavasatasahassehi mama piṭṭhiṃ akkamanto gacchatu, taṃ me bhavissati dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāyā''ti kese mocetvā ajinajaṭāvākacīrāni kāḷavaṇṇe kalale pattharitvā tattheva kalalapiṭṭhe nipajji. tena vuttaṃ --
[21] ``te me puṭṭhā viyākaṃsu, buddho loke anuttaro.
[22] idha bījāni ropissaṃ, khaṇo ve mā upaccagā..
[22] buddho buddhoti cintento, maggaṃ sodhemahaṃ tadā..
[22] mā naṃ kalale akkamittha, hitāya me bhavissatī''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^M0.0113^ea^ ^b^viyākaṃsū^eb^ti byākariṃsu. ``dīpaṅkaro nāma jino, tassa sodhīyati patho''tipi pāṭho. ^b^somanassaṃ pavedayi^eb^nti somanassamanubhavinti attho. ^b^tattha ṭhatvā^eb^ti yasmiṃ padese ākāsato otari, tattheva ṭhatvā. ^b^saṃviggamānaso^eb^ti pītivimhitamānaso. ^b^idhā^eb^ti imasmiṃ dīpaṅkare puññakkhette. ^b^bījānī^eb^ti kusalabījāni. ^b^ropissa^eb^nti ropissāmi. ^b^khaṇo^eb^ti aṭṭhakkhaṇavirahito navamo khaṇasannipāto. atidullabho so mayā paṭiladdho. ^b^ve^eb^ti nipātamattaṃ. ^b^mā upaccagā^eb^ti so mā accagamā, mā atikkamīti attho. ^b^dadāthā^eb^ti ^a^P0.0089^ea^ detha. ^b^te^eb^ti ye me puṭṭhā manussā, teti attho. ^b^sodhemahaṃ tadā^eb^ti sodhemi ahaṃ tadā. ^b^aniṭṭhite^eb^ti apariyosite vippakate. ^b^khīṇāsavehī^eb^ti ettha cattāro āsavā -- kāmāsavo, bhavāsavo, diṭṭhāsavo, avijjāsavoti (cūḷani0 jatukaṇṇimāṇavapucchāniddesa 69) ime cattāro āsavā yesaṃ khīṇā pahīnā samucchinnā paṭippassaddhā abhabbuppattikā ñāṇagginā daḍḍhā, te khīṇāsavā, tehi khīṇāsavehi. khīṇāsavattāyeva ^b^vimalehi^eb^.

[03] ^b^devā manusse passantī^eb^ti ettha devānaṃ manussadassane vattabbaṃ natthi, pakatidassanavasena pana yathā manussā idha ṭhatvā passanti, evaṃ devāpi manusse passantīti attho. ^b^devatā^eb^ti deve. ^b^ubhopī^eb^ti ubho devamanussā. ^b^pañjalikā^eb^ti katapañjalikā, ubhopi hatthe sirasi patiṭṭhāpetvāti attho. ^b^anuyanti tathāgata^eb^nti tathāgatassa pacchato yanti, anuyoge sati sāmiatthe upayogavacanaṃ hotīti lakkhaṇaṃ. tena vuttaṃ ``anuyanti tathāgata''nti. ^b^vajjayantā^eb^ti vādentā.

[03] ^b^mandārava^eb^nti mandāravapupphaṃ. ^b^disodisa^eb^nti disato disato. ^b^okirantī^eb^ti avakiranti. ^b^ākāsanabhagatā^eb^ti ākāsasaṅkhāte nabhasi gatā. atha vā ākāsaṃ gatā saggagatāva. ``nabho''ti hi saggo vuccati. ^b^marū^eb^ti amarā. ^b^sarala^eb^nti saralatarukusumaṃ. ^b^nīpa^eb^nti kadambapupphaṃ. ^b^nāgapunnāgaketaka^eb^nti nāgapunnāgaketakapupphāni ca. ^b^bhūmitalagatā^eb^ti bhūmigatā.

[03] ^b^kese^eb^ ^a^V0.0103^ea^ ^b^muñcitvāha^eb^nti ahaṃ kese baddhā kalāpakuṭilajaṭā muñcitvā, vippakiritvāti attho. ^b^tatthā^eb^ti mayhaṃ dinne okāse. ^b^cammaka^eb^nti cammakkhaṇḍaṃ. ^b^kalale^eb^ti cikkhallakaddame. ^b^avakujjo^eb^ti adhomukho hutvā. ^b^nipajjaha^eb^nti nipajjiṃ ^a^M0.0114^ea^ ahaṃ. ^b^mā na^eb^nti ettha ^b^mā^eb^ti paṭisedhatthe nipāto. ^b^na^eb^nti padapūraṇatthe nipāto, buddho kalale mā akkamitthāti attho. ^b^hitāya me bhavissatī^eb^ti taṃ kalale anakkamanaṃ dīgharattaṃ mama hitatthāya bhavissatīti. ``sukhāya me bhavissatī''tipi pāṭho.

[03] tato ^a^P0.0090^ea^ sumedhapaṇḍito kalalapiṭṭhe nipanno evaṃ cintesi -- ``sacāhaṃ iccheyyaṃ sabbakilese jhāpetvā saṅghanavako hutvā rammanagaraṃ paviseyyaṃ, aññātakavesena pana me kilese jhāpetvā nibbānappattiyā kiccaṃ natthi, yaṃnūnāhaṃ dīpaṅkaradasabalo viya paramābhisambodhiṃ patvā dhammanāvaṃ āropetvā mahājanaṃ saṃsārasāgarā uttāretvā pacchā parinibbāyeyyaṃ, idaṃ me patirūpa''nti. tato aṭṭha dhamme samodhānetvā buddhabhāvāya abhinīhāraṃ katvā nipajji. tena vuttaṃ --
[22] icchamāno ahaṃ ajja, kilese jhāpaye mama..

[03] tattha ^b^pathaviyaṃ nipannassā^eb^ti puthaviyā nipannassa. ayameva vā pāṭho. ^b^cetaso^eb^ti cetaso parivitakko ^a^V0.0104^ea^ ahosīti attho. ``evaṃ me āsi cetanā''tipi pāṭho. ^b^icchamāno^eb^ti ākaṅkhamāno. ^b^kilese^eb^ti kilissanti upatāpentīti kilesā, rāgādayo dasa. ^b^jhāpaye^eb^ti jhāpeyyaṃ, mama kilese jhāpaye ahanti attho.

[03] ^b^ki^eb^nti paṭikkhepavacanaṃ. ^b^aññātavesenā^eb^ti apākaṭavesena, aviññātena paṭicchannena. idha pana bhikkhū viya āsavakkhayaṃ katvā kiṃ, buddhakare dhamme ^a^M0.0115^ea^ pūretvā paṭisandhijātibodhidhammacakkappavattanesu mahāpathavikampanaṃ katvā buddho bodhetā, tiṇṇo tāretā, mutto mocetā bhaveyyanti adhippāyo. ^b^sadevake^eb^ti sadevake loke.

[03] ^b^thāmadassinā^eb^ti attano thāmabalaṃ passamānena. ^b^santāressa^eb^nti santāressāmi. ^b^sadevaka^eb^nti ^a^P0.0091^ea^ sadevakaṃ sattanikāyaṃ, sadevakaṃ lokaṃ vā. ^b^adhikārenā^eb^ti adhivisiṭṭhena kārena, buddhassa mama jīvitaṃ pariccajitvā kalalapiṭṭhe sayanenādhikārenāti attho.
[03] ^b^saṃsārasota^eb^nti kammakilesavasena yonigativiññāṇaṭṭhitinavasattāvāsesu ito cito ca saṃsaraṇaṃ saṃsāro. yathāha --

[22] abbocchinnaṃ vattamānā, saṃsāroti pavuccatī''ti.. (visuddhi0 2.619; dī0 ni0 aṭṭha0 2.95 apasādanāvaṇṇanā; saṃ0 ni0 aṭṭha0 2.2.60; a0 ni0 aṭṭha0 2.4.199; dha0 sa0 aṭṭha0 nidānakathā; vibha0 aṭṭha0 226 saṅkhāpadaniddesa; su0 ni0 aṭṭha0 2.523; udā0 aṭṭha0 39; itivu0 aṭṭha0 14, 58; theragā0 aṭṭha0 1.67, 99; cūḷani0 aṭṭha0 6; paṭi0 ma0 aṭṭha0 2.1.117).

[03] saṃsāro ca so sotaṃ ceti saṃsārasotaṃ, taṃ saṃsārasotaṃ. atha vā saṃsārassa sotaṃ ^b^saṃsārasotaṃ,^eb^ saṃsārakāraṇaṃ taṇhāsotaṃ chinditvāti attho. ^b^tayo bhave^eb^ti kāmarūpārūpabhave. tibhavanibbattakakammakilesā tayo bhavāti adhippetā. ^b^dhammanāva^eb^nti ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ. so hi caturoghuttaraṇaṭṭhena ``dhammanāvā''ti vuccati. ^b^samāruyhā^eb^ti āruyha. ^b^santāressa^eb^nti santāressāmi. yasmā pana buddhattaṃ patthentassa --
[03] tattha ^b^manussatta^eb^nti manussattabhāveyeva ṭhatvā buddhattaṃ patthentassa patthanā samijjhati, na nāgajātiādīsu ṭhitānaṃ. kasmāti ce? ahetukabhāvato.

[03] ^b^liṅgasampattī^eb^ti manussattabhāve vattamānassāpi purisaliṅge ṭhitasseva patthanā samijjhati, na itthiyā vā paṇḍakanapuṃsakaubhatobyañjanakānaṃ vā samijjhati ^a^M0.0116^ea^. kasmāti ce? lakkhaṇapāripūriyā abhāvato. vuttañhetaṃ -- ``aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso, yaṃ itthī arahaṃ assa sammāsambuddho''ti (ma0 ni0 3.130; a0 ni0 1.279; vibha0 809) vitthāro. tasmā itthiliṅge ṭhitassa manussajātikassāpi patthanā na samijjhati.
[03] ^b^hetū^eb^ti purisassāpi tasmiṃ attabhāve arahattappattiyā hetusampannasseva patthanā samijjhati, no itarassa.

[03] ^b^satthāradassana^eb^nti sace jīvamānakabuddhasseva santike pattheti patthanā samijjhati. parinibbute bhagavati cetiyassa santike vā bodhirukkhamūle vā paṭimāya vā paccekabuddhabuddhasāvakānaṃ vā santike patthanā na samijjhati. kasmā? bhabbābhabbake ñatvā kammavipākaparicchedakañāṇena ^a^P0.0092^ea^ paricchinditvā byākātuṃ asamatthattā. tasmā buddhassa santikeyeva patthanā samijjhati.

[03] ^b^pabbajjā^eb^ti buddhassa bhagavato santike patthentassāpi kammakiriyavādīsu tāpasesu vā bhikkhūsu vā pabbajitasseva patthanā samijjhati, no gihiliṅge ṭhitassa. kasmā? pabbajitāyeva hi bodhisattā sambodhiṃ adhigacchanti, na gahaṭṭhā. tasmā ādimhi paṇidhānakālepi pabbajiteneva bhavitabbaṃ.
[03] ^b^guṇasampattī^eb^ti pabbajitassāpi aṭṭhasamāpattilābhino pañcābhiññasseva samijjhati, na pana imāya guṇasampattiyā virahitassa. kasmā? nigguṇassa tadabhāvato.
[03] ^b^adhikāro^eb^ti ^a^V0.0106^ea^ guṇasampannenāpi yena attano jīvitaṃ buddhānaṃ pariccattaṃ hoti, tassa iminā adhikārena sampannasseva samijjhati, na itarassa.

[03] ^b^chandatā^eb^ti abhinīhārasampannassāpi yassa buddhakārakadhammānaṃ atthāya mahanto chando vāyāmo ca ussāho ca pariyeṭṭhi ca, tasseva samijjhati, na itarassa. tatridaṃ chandamahantatāya opammaṃ -- sace hi evamassa, ``yo pana sakalacakkavāḷagabbhaṃ ekodakībhūtaṃ attano bāhubalena uttaritvā pāraṃ gantuṃ samattho, so buddhattaṃ pāpuṇāti. yo panimaṃ attano dukkaraṃ na maññati `ahaṃ imaṃ uttaritvā pāraṃ gamissāmī'''ti evaṃ mahatā chandena ussāhena samannāgato hoti, tassa patthanā samijjhati, na itarassa (su0 ni0 aṭṭha0 1.khaggavisāṇasuttavaṇṇanā; apa0 aṭṭha0 1ḍūrenidāna, sumedhakathā; cariyā0 aṭṭha0 pakiṇṇakakathā).

[03] sumedhapaṇḍito ^a^M0.0117^ea^ pana ime aṭṭha dhamme samodhānetvāva buddhabhāvāya abhinīhāraṃ katvā nipajji. dīpaṅkaropi bhagavā āgantvā sumedhapaṇḍitassa sīsabhāge ṭhatvā kalalapiṭṭhe nipannaṃ sumedhatāpasaṃ disvā -- ``ayaṃ tāpaso buddhattāya abhinīhāraṃ katvā nipanno, ijjhissati nu kho etassa patthanā, udāhu no''ti anāgataṃsañāṇaṃ pesetvā upadhārento -- ``ito kappasatasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni atikkamitvā gotamo nāma buddho bhavissatī''ti ñatvā ṭhitakova parisamajjhe byākāsi -- ``passatha no, tumhe bhikkhave, imaṃ uggatapaṃ tāpasaṃ kalalapiṭṭhe nipanna''nti. ``evaṃ, bhante''ti. ayaṃ buddhattāya abhinīhāraṃ katvā nipanno, samijjhissati imassa tāpasassa patthanā, ayañhi ito kappasatasahassādhikānaṃ catunnaṃ asaṅkhyeyyānaṃ matthake gotamo nāma buddho loke bhavissati. tasmiṃ panassa attabhāve kapilavatthu nāma nagaraṃ nivāso bhavissati, mahāmāyā nāma devī mātā, suddhodano nāma rājā pitā, upatisso ca kolito ca dve aggasāvakā, ānando nāma upaṭṭhāko, khemā ca uppalavaṇṇā ca dve aggasāvikā bhavissanti ^a^P0.0093^ea^. ayaṃ paripakkañāṇo hutvā mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamitvā mahāpadhānaṃ padahitvā nigrodhamūle sujātāya nāma kumāriyā dinnaṃ pāyāsaṃ paṭiggahetvā nerañjarāya tīre paribhuñjitvā bodhimaṇḍaṃ āruyha assattharukkhamūle abhisambujjhissatīti. tena vuttaṃ --
[22] pitā suddhodano nāma, ayaṃ hessati gotamo..
[27] kolito upatisso ca, aggā hessanti sāvakā.

[03] tattha ^b^lokavidū^eb^ti sabbathā viditalokattā pana lokavidū. bhagavā hi sabhāvato samudayato ^a^V0.0108^ea^ nirodhato nirodhūpāyatoti sabbathāpi lokaṃ ^a^P0.0094^ea^ avedi aññāsi paṭivijjhi. tasmā lokavidūti vuccati. yathāha --
[22] lokassa antaṃ samitāvi ñatvā, nāsīsatī lokamimaṃ parañcā''ti.. (saṃ0 ni0 1.107; a0 ni0 4.46).

[03] api ca tayo lokā -- saṅkhāraloko, sattaloko, okāsalokoti. tattha saṅkhāraloko nāma paṭiccasamuppannā pathaviādayo dhammā. sattaloko nāma saññino asaññino nevasaññināsaññino ca sattā. okāsaloko nāma sattānaṃ nivāsaṭṭhānaṃ. ime pana tayopi lokā bhagavatā yathāsabhāvato viditā, tasmā lokavidūti vuccati. ^b^āhutīnaṃ paṭiggaho^eb^ti dānānaṃ paṭiggahetuṃ arahattā dakkhiṇeyyattā āhutīnaṃ paṭiggaho. ^b^ussīsake maṃ ṭhatvānā^eb^ti mama ^a^M0.0119^ea^ sīsasamīpe ṭhatvā. ^b^idaṃ^eb^ idāni vattabbaṃ vacanaṃ abravīti attho. ^b^jaṭila^eb^nti jaṭā assa santīti jaṭilo, taṃ jaṭilaṃ. ^b^uggatāpana^eb^nti uggatāpasaṃ. ^b^ahū^eb^ti ahani, athāti attho. ayameva vā pāṭho. ^b^kapilavhayā^eb^ti kapilāvhayā abhidhānā. ^b^rammā^eb^ti ramaṇīyato. ^b^padhāna^eb^nti vīriyaṃ. ^b^ehitī^eb^ti essati gamissati. sesagāthāsu uttānamevāti.

[03] tato sumedhapaṇḍito -- ``mayhaṃ kira patthanā samijjhissatī''ti sañjātasomanasso ahosi. mahājano dīpaṅkaradasabalassa vacanaṃ sutvā -- ``sumedhatāpaso kira buddhabījaṅkuro''ti haṭṭhatuṭṭho ahosi. evañcassa ahosi -- ``yathā nāma puriso nadiṃ taranto ujukena titthena tarituṃ asakkonto heṭṭhātitthena uttarati, evameva mayaṃ dīpaṅkaradasabalassa sāsane maggaphalaṃ alabhamānā anāgate yadā tvaṃ buddho bhavissasi, tadā tava sammukhā maggaphalaṃ sacchikātuṃ samatthā bhaveyyāmā''ti patthanaṃ akaṃsu. dīpaṅkaradasabalo bodhisattaṃ mahāsattaṃ pasaṃsitvā aṭṭhahi pupphamuṭṭhīhi pūjetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi. tepi catusatasahassā khīṇāsavā bodhisattaṃ pupphehi ca gandhehi ca pūjetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkamiṃsu. devamanussā pana tatheva pūjetvā vanditvā pakkamiṃsu.

[03] atha sabbalokamatidīpaṅkaro dīpaṅkaro bhagavā catūhi khīṇāsavasatasahassehi parivuto rammanagaravāsīhi pūjiyamāno devatāhi abhivandiyamāno sañjhāppabhānurañjitavarakanakagirisikharo viya jaṅgamamāno anekesu pāṭihāriyesu ^a^P0.0095^ea^ vattamānesu tena alaṅkatapaṭiyattena ^a^V0.0109^ea^ maggena gantvā nānāsurabhikusumagandhavāsitaṃ cuṇṇasammodagandhaṃ samussitadhajapaṭākaṃ gandhānubaddhahadayehi bhamaragaṇehi gumbagumbāyamānaṃ dhūpandhakāraṃ amarapurasadisasobhaṃ abhirammaṃ rammanagaraṃ pavisitvā paññatte mahārahe buddhāsane yugandharamatthake saradasamayarucirakararajanikaro timiranikaranidhanakaro kamalavanavikasanakaro divasakaro viya dasabaladivasakaro nisīdi. bhikkhusaṅghopi paṭipāṭiyā attano attano pattāsane nisīdi. rammanagaravāsino pana upāsakā saddhādiguṇasampannā nānāvidhakhajjādīhi samalaṅkataṃ vaṇṇagandharasasampannaṃ asadisaṃ sukhanidānaṃ dānaṃ buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa adaṃsu.

[03] atha ^a^M0.0120^ea^ kho bodhisatto dasabalassa byākaraṇaṃ sutvā buddhabhāvaṃ karatalagatamiva maññamāno pamuditahadayo sabbesu paṭikkantesu sayanā vuṭṭhāya -- ``pāramiyo vicinissāmī''ti puppharāsimatthake pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā nisīdi. evaṃ nisinne mahāsatte sakaladasasahassacakkavāḷadevatā sādhukāraṃ datvā -- ``ayya sumedhatāpasa, porāṇakabodhisattānaṃ pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā -- `pāramiyo vicinissāmī'ti nisinnakāle yāni pubbanimittāni nāma paññāyanti, tāni sabbānipi ajja pātubhūtāni nissaṃsayena tvaṃ buddho bhavissasi, mayametaṃ jānāma -- `yassetāni nimittāni paññāyanti, so ekanteneva buddho bhavissati' tasmā tvaṃ attano vīriyaṃ daḷhaṃ katvā paggaṇhā''ti bodhisattaṃ nānappakārāhi thutīhi abhitthaviṃsu. tena vuttaṃ --
[22] devā manussā asurā ca, abhivādetvāna pakkamuṃ..
[22] pītiyā ca abhissanno, pallaṅkaṃ ābhujiṃ tadā..
[22] vasībhūto ahaṃ jhāne, abhiññāsu pāramiṃ gato..
[22] tāni ajja padissanti, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi..
[22] tāni ajja padissanti, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi..
[22] tāni ajja padissanti, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi..
[22] tepajja pupphitā sabbe, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi..
[21] ``latā vā yadi vā rukkhā, phalabhārā honti tāvade.
[22] tepajja phalitā sabbe, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi..
[22] tepajja ratanā jotanti, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi..
[21] ``mānussakā ca dibbā ca, turiyā vajjanti tāvade.
[22] tepi ajja pavassanti, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi..
[22] tepajja nibbutā aggī, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi..
[22] tepi ajja padissanti, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi..
[22] tepajja āsayā chuddhā, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi..
[21] ``na honti aratī sattānaṃ, santuṭṭhā honti tāvade.
[22] tepajja sabbe santuṭṭhā, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi..
[22] tāni ajja padissanti, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi..
[21] ``rogā tadā tanu hoti, doso moho vinassasi.
[22] tepajja vigatā sabbe, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi..
[22] tena liṅgena jānāma, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi..
[22] tena liṅgena jānāma, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi..
[22] sopajja vāyatī gandho, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi..
[22] tepajja sabbe dissanti, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi..
[22] tepajja sabbe dissanti, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi..
[21] ``kuṭṭā ^a^V0.0113^ea^ ^a^P0.0098^ea^ kavāṭā selā ca, na hontāvaraṇā tadā.
[21] ``cutī ca upapattī ca, khaṇe tasmiṃ na vijjati.
[03] tattha ^b^idaṃ sutvāna vacana^eb^nti idaṃ dīpaṅkarassa bhagavato bodhisattassa byākaraṇavacanaṃ sutvā. ^b^asamassā^eb^ti samassa sadisassa abhāvato asamassa. yathāha --
[21] ``na me ācariyo atthi, sadiso me na vijjati.
[22] sadevakasmiṃ lokasmiṃ, natthi me paṭipuggalo''ti.. (ma0 ni0 1.285; 2.341; mahāva0 11; kathā0 405; mi0 pa0 4.5.11).

[03] ^b^mahesino^eb^ti mahante sīlasamādhipaññākkhandhe esi gavesīti mahesī, tassa mahesino. ^b^naramarū^eb^ti narā ca amarā ca, ukkaṭṭhaniddeso panāyaṃ sabbepi dasasahassilokadhātuyā nāgasupaṇṇayakkhādayopi āmoditāva. ^b^buddhabījaṃ kira aya^eb^nti ayaṃ kira buddhaṅkuro uppannoti āmoditāti attho.

[03] ^b^ukkuṭṭhisaddā^eb^ti unnādasaddā vattanti. ^b^apphoṭentī^eb^ti hatthehi bāhā abhihananti. ^b^dasasahassī^eb^ti dasasahassilokadhātuyo. ^b^sadevakā^eb^ti saha devehi sadevakā dasasahassī namassantīti attho. ^b^yadimassā^eb^ti yadi imassa, ayameva vā pāṭho. ^b^virajjhissāmā^eb^ti yadi na sampāpuṇissāma. ^b^anāgatamhi addhāne^eb^ti anāgate kāle. ^b^hessāmā^eb^ti bhavissāma. ^b^sammukhā^eb^ti sammukhībhūtā. ^b^ima^eb^nti imassa, sāmiatthe upayogavacanaṃ.

[03] ^b^nadiṃ^eb^ ^a^M0.0124^ea^ ^b^tarantā^eb^ti nadītaraṇakā, ``naditarantā''tipi pāṭho. ^b^paṭitittha^eb^nti paṭimukhatitthaṃ. ^b^virajjhiyā^eb^ti virajjhitvā. ^b^yadi muñcāmā^eb^ti yadi imaṃ bhagavantaṃ muñcitvā akatakiccā gamissāmāti ^a^V0.0114^ea^ attho. ^b^mama kammaṃ pakittetvā^eb^ti mama bhāvitamatthaṃ byākaritvā. ^b^dakkhiṇaṃ^eb^ ^a^P0.0099^ea^ ^b^pādamuddharī^eb^ti dakkhiṇaṃ pādaṃ ukkhipi, ``katapadakkhiṇo''tipi pāṭho.

[03] ^b^jinaputtā^eb^ti dīpaṅkarassa satthuno sāvakā. ^b^devā manussā asurā ca, abhivādetvāna pakkamu^eb^nti devādayo sabbepi ime maṃ tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pupphādīhi pūjetvā suppatiṭṭhitapañcaṅgā vanditvā nivattitvā punappunaṃ oloketvā madhuratthabyañjanāhi nānappakārāhi thutīhi vaṇṇentā pakkamiṃsu. ``narā nāgā ca gandhabbā, abhivādetvāna pakkamu''ntipi pāṭho.

[03] ^b^dassanaṃ me atikkante^eb^ti mama dassanavisayaṃ bhagavati atikkante. ``jahite dassanūpacāre''tipi pāṭho. ^b^sasaṅghe^eb^ti saddhiṃ saṅghena sasaṅgho, tasmiṃ sasaṅghe. ^b^sayanā vuṭṭhahitvānā^eb^ti nipannaṭṭhānato kalalato uṭṭhahitvā. ^b^pallaṅkaṃ ābhuji^eb^nti katapallaṅko hutvā puppharāsimhi nisīdinti attho. ``haṭṭho haṭṭhena cittena, āsanā vuṭṭhahiṃ tadā''tipi pāṭho, so uttānatthova.

[03] ^b^pītiyā ca abhissanno^eb^ti pītiparipphuṭo. ^b^vasībhūto^eb^ti vasībhāvappatto. ^b^jhāne^eb^ti rūpāvacarārūpāvacarajhānesu. ^b^sahassiyamhī^eb^ti dasasahassiyaṃ. ^b^lokamhī^eb^ti lokadhātuyā. ^b^me samā^eb^ti mayā sadisā. avisesena ``me samā natthī''ti vatvā idāni tameva niyamento ^b^``asamo iddhidhammesū''^eb^ti āha. tattha ^b^iddhidhammesū^eb^ti pañcasu iddhidhammesūti attho. ^b^alabhi^eb^nti paṭilabhiṃ. ^b^īdisaṃ sukha^eb^nti īdisaṃ somanassaṃ.

[03] atha sumedhatāpaso dasabalassa byākaraṇaṃ sutvā buddhabhāvaṃ karatalagatakālamiva maññamāno pamuditahadayo dasasu lokadhātusahassesu suddhāvāsamahābrahmāno atītabuddhadassāvino niyatabodhisattānaṃ byākaraṇe uppajjamānapāṭihāriyadassanena tathāgatavacanassa avitathataṃ pakāsento maṃ paritosayantā imā gāthāyo āhaṃsūti dassento bhagavā ^b^``pallaṅkābhujane mayha''^eb^ntiādimāha.

[03] tattha ^a^M0.0125^ea^ ^b^pallaṅkābhujane mayha^eb^nti mama pallaṅkābhujane. ayameva vā pāṭho. ^b^dasasahassādhivāsino^eb^ti dasasahassivāsino mahābrahmāno. ^b^yā pubbe^eb^ti yāni pubbe, vibhattilopaṃ katvā vuttanti veditabbaṃ. ^b^pallaṅkavaramābhuje^eb^ti varapallaṅkābhujane. ^b^nimittāni padissantī^eb^ti nimittāni ^a^V0.0115^ea^ padissiṃsūti attho. atītavacane vattabbe vattamānavacanaṃ vuttaṃ. kiñcāpi vuttaṃ, atītavasena attho gahetabbo. ^b^tāni ajja padissare^eb^ti pubbepi niyatabodhisattānaṃ pallaṅkābhujane ^a^P0.0100^ea^ yāni nimittāni uppajjiṃsu, tāni nimittāni ajja padissare. tasmā tvaṃ dhuvameva buddho bhavissasīti attho. na pana tāniyeva nimittāni uppajjiṃsu, taṃsadisattā ``tāni ajja padissare''ti vuttanti veditabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^sīta^eb^nti sītattaṃ. ^b^byapagata^eb^nti gataṃ vigataṃ. ^b^tānī^eb^ti sītavigamanauṇhupasamanānīti attho. ^b^nissaddā^eb^ti asaddā anigghosā. ^b^nirākulā^eb^ti anākulā, ayameva vā pāṭho. ^b^na sandantī^eb^ti na vahanti nappavattanti. ^b^savantiyo^eb^ti nadiyo. ^b^tānī^eb^ti avāyanāsandanāni. ^b^thalajā^eb^ti pathavitalapabbatarukkhesu jātāni. ^b^dakajā^eb^ti odakāni pupphāni. ^b^pupphantī^eb^ti pubbe bodhisattānaṃ pupphiṃsu, atītatthe vattamānavacanaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. ^b^tepajja pupphitānī^eb^ti tāni pupphāni ajja pupphitānīti attho.

[03] ^b^phalabhārā^eb^ti phaladharā. ^b^tepajjā^eb^ti tepi ajja, pulliṅgavasena ``tepī''ti vuttaṃ, ``latā vā rukkhā vā''ti vuttattā. ^b^phalitā^eb^ti sañjātaphalā. ^b^ākāsaṭṭhā ca bhūmaṭṭhā cā^eb^ti ākāsagatā ca bhūmigatā ca ^b^ratanānī^eb^ti muttādīni ratanāni. ^b^jotantī^eb^ti obhāsanti. ^b^mānussakā^eb^ti manussānaṃ santakā mānussakā. ^b^dibbā^eb^ti devānaṃ santakā dibbā. ^b^turiyā^eb^ti ātataṃ vitataṃ ātatavitataṃ susiraṃ ghananti pañca turiyāni. tattha ātataṃ nāma cammapariyonaddhesu bheriādīsu ekatalaturiyaṃ. vitataṃ nāma ubhayatalaṃ. ātatavitataṃ nāma sabbato pariyonaddhaṃ mahativallakiādikaṃ. susiraṃ nāma vaṃsādikaṃ. ghanaṃ nāma sammatāḷādikaṃ. ^b^vajjantī^eb^ti heṭṭhā vuttanayena vajjiṃsu, atītatthe vattamānavacanaṃ veditabbaṃ. esa nayo upari īdisesu vacanesupi. ^b^abhiravantī^eb^ti tatra tatra kusalehi sumuñcitā suppatāḷitā suvāditā viya abhiravanti, abhinadantīti attho.

[03] ^b^vicittapupphā^eb^ti ^a^M0.0126^ea^ vicitrāni nānāgandhavaṇṇāni pupphāni. ^b^abhivassantī^eb^ti abhivassiṃsu, nipatiṃsūti attho. ^b^tepī^eb^ti tānipi vicitrapupphāni abhivassantāni padissanti, devabrahmagaṇehi okiriyamānānīti adhippāyo. ^b^ābhujatī^eb^ti osakkati. ^b^tepajjubho^eb^ti ^a^P0.0101^ea^ tepi ajja ubho mahāsamuddadasasahassiyo. ^b^abhiravantī^eb^ti abhinadanti. ^b^niraye^eb^ti nirayesu. ^b^dasasahassā^eb^ti anekadasasahassā. ^b^nibbantī^eb^ti sammanti, santiṃ upentīti attho. ^b^tārakā^eb^ti nakkhattāni ^a^V0.0116^ea^. ^b^tepi ajja padissantī^eb^ti tepi sūriyassa vimalabhāvā tārakā ajja divā dissanti.

[03] ^b^anovaṭṭhenā^eb^ti anovaṭṭhe, bhummatthe karaṇavacanaṃ. atha vā ^b^anovaṭṭhe^eb^ti anabhivaṭṭhepi. ^b^nā^eb^ti nipātamattaṃ ``sutvā na dūtavacana''ntiādīsu viya. ^b^tampajjubbhijjate^eb^ti tampi udakaṃ ajja ubbhijjati, ubbhijjitvā uṭṭhahatīti attho. ^b^mahiyā^eb^ti pathaviyā, nissakkavacanaṃ. ^b^tārāgaṇā^eb^ti gahanakkhattādayo sabbe tāragaṇā. ^b^nakkhattā^eb^ti nakkhattatārakā ca. ^b^gaganamaṇḍale^eb^ti sakalagaganamaṇḍalaṃ virocantīti attho. ^b^bilāsayā^eb^ti bilāsayā ahinakulakumbhīlagodhādayo. ^b^darīsayā^eb^ti jharāsayā. ayameva vā pāṭho. ^b^nikkhamantī^eb^ti nikkhamiṃsu. ^b^sakāsayā^eb^ti attano attano āsayato. ``tadāsayā''tipi pāṭho. tassa tadā tasmiṃ kāle, āsayato, bilatoti attho. ^b^chuddhā^eb^ti suchuddhā suvuddhāritā, nikkhantāti attho.

[03] ^b^aratī^eb^ti ukkaṇṭhā. ^b^santuṭṭhā^eb^ti paramena santuṭṭhena santuṭṭhā. ^b^vinassatī^eb^ti vigacchati. ^b^rāgo^eb^ti kāmarāgo. ^b^tadā tanu hotī^eb^ti oramattako hoti, iminā pariyuṭṭhānābhāvaṃ dīpeti. ^b^vihatā^eb^ti vinaṭṭhā. ^b^tadā^eb^ti pubbe, bodhisattānaṃ pallaṅkābhujaneti attho. ^b^na bhavatī^eb^ti na hoti. ^b^ajjapeta^eb^nti ajja tava pallaṅkābhujanepi etaṃ bhayaṃ na hotevāti attho. ^b^tena liṅgena jānāmā^eb^ti tena kāraṇena sabbeva mayaṃ jānāma, yaṃ tvaṃ buddho bhavissasīti attho.

[03] ^b^anuddhaṃsatī^eb^ti na uggacchati. ^b^aniṭṭhagandho^eb^ti duggandho. ^b^pakkamatī^eb^ti pakkami vigacchi. ^b^pavāyatī^eb^ti pavāyi. ^b^sopajjā^eb^ti sopi dibbagandho ajja. ^b^padissantī^eb^ti ^a^P0.0102^ea^ padissiṃsu. ^b^tepajjā^eb^ti tepi sabbe devā ajja. ^b^yāvatā^eb^ti paricchedanatthe ^a^M0.0127^ea^ nipāto, yattakāti attho. ^b^kuṭṭā^eb^ti pākārā. ^b^na hontāvaraṇā^eb^ti āvaraṇakarā na ahesuṃ. ^b^tadā^eb^ti pubbe. ^b^ākāsabhūtā^eb^ti te kuṭṭakavāṭapabbatā āvaraṇaṃ tirokaraṇaṃ kātuṃ asakkontā, ajaṭākāsabhūtāti attho. ^b^cutī^eb^ti maraṇaṃ. ^b^upapattī^eb^ti paṭisandhiggahaṇaṃ. ^b^khaṇe^eb^ti pubbe bodhisattānaṃ pallaṅkābhujanakkhaṇe. ^b^na vijjatī^eb^ti nāhosi. ^b^tānipajjā^eb^ti tānipi ajja cavanabhavanānīti attho. ^b^mā nivattī^eb^ti mā paṭikkami. ^b^abhikkamā^eb^ti parakkama. sesamettha uttānamevāti.

[03] tato sumedhapaṇḍito dīpaṅkarassa dasabalassa ca dasasahassacakkavāḷadevatānañca vacanaṃ sutvā bhiyyosomattāya sañjātussāho hutvā cintesi -- ``buddhā nāma amoghavacanā, natthi buddhānaṃ kathāya aññathattaṃ. yathā hi ākāse khittassa leḍḍussa patanaṃ dhuvaṃ, jātassa maraṇaṃ, aruṇe ^a^V0.0117^ea^ uggate sūriyassa abbhuggamanaṃ, āsayā nikkhantassa sīhassa sīhanādanadanaṃ, garugabbhāya itthiyā bhāramoropanaṃ dhuvaṃ avassambhāvī, evameva buddhānaṃ vacanaṃ nāma dhuvaṃ amoghaṃ, addhā ahaṃ buddho bhavissāmīti. tena vuttaṃ --
[22] vitathaṃ natthi buddhānaṃ, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavāmahaṃ..
[21] ``yathā khittaṃ nabhe leḍḍu, dhuvaṃ patati bhūmiyaṃ.
[22] vitathaṃ natthi buddhānaṃ, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavāmahaṃ..
[22] vitathaṃ natthi buddhānaṃ, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavāmahaṃ..
[22] vitathaṃ natthi buddhānaṃ, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavāmahaṃ..
[22] vitathaṃ natthi buddhānaṃ, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavāmahaṃ..
[22] vitathaṃ natthi buddhānaṃ, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavāmaha''nti..

[03] tattha ^a^V0.0118^ea^ ^b^buddhassa vacanaṃ sutvā, dasasahassī na cūbhaya^eb^nti dīpaṅkarasammāsambuddhassa ca dasasahassacakkavāḷadevatānañca vacanaṃ sutvā. ^b^ubhaya^eb^nti ubhayesaṃ, sāmiatthe paccattavacanaṃ, ubhayavacanaṃ vā. ^b^evaṃ cintesaha^eb^nti evaṃ cintesiṃ ahaṃ.

[03] ^b^advejjhavacanā^eb^ti dvedhā appavattavacanā, ekaṃsavacanāti attho. ``acchiddavacanā''tipi pāṭho, tassa niddosavacanāti attho. ^b^amoghavacanā^eb^ti avitathavacanā. ^b^vitatha^eb^nti vitathavacanaṃ natthīti attho. ^b^dhuvaṃ buddho bhavāmaha^eb^nti ahaṃ ekaṃseneva buddho bhavissāmīti niyatavasena avassambhāvivasena ca vattamānavacanaṃ katanti veditabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^sūriyuggamana^eb^nti sūriyassa udayanaṃ, ayameva vā pāṭho. ^b^dhuvasassata^eb^nti ekaṃsabhāvī ceva sassatañca. ^b^nikkhantasayanassā^eb^ti sayanato nikkhantassa. ^b^āpannasattāna^eb^nti garugabbhānaṃ, gabbhinīnanti attho. ^b^bhāramoropana^eb^nti bhāraoropanaṃ, gabbhassa oropananti attho. ^b^ma^eb^-kāro padasandhikaro. sesametthāpi uttānamevāti.

[03] ``svāhaṃ addhā buddho bhavissāmī''ti evaṃ katasanniṭṭhāno buddhakārake dhamme upadhāretuṃ -- ``kahaṃ nu kho buddhakārakā dhammā''ti, uddhaṃ adho disāsu vidisāsūti anukkamena sakalaṃ dhammadhātuṃ vicinanto pubbe porāṇakehi bodhisattehi āsevitanisevitaṃ paṭhamaṃ dānapāramiṃ disvā evaṃ attānaṃ ovadi -- ``sumedhapaṇḍita, tvaṃ ito paṭṭhāya paṭhamaṃ dānapāramiṃ pūreyyāsi. yathā hi nikujjito udakakumbho nissesaṃ katvā udakaṃ vamatiyeva na paccāharati, evameva dhanaṃ vā yasaṃ vā puttadāraṃ ^a^P0.0104^ea^ vā aṅgapaccaṅgaṃ vā anoloketvā sabbattha yācakānaṃ sabbaṃ icchiticchitaṃ nissesaṃ katvā dadamāno bodhimūle nisīditvā buddho bhavissasī''ti paṭhamaṃ dānapāramiṃ daḷhaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhāsi. tena vuttaṃ --
[22] uddhaṃ adho dasa disā, yāvatā dhammadhātuyā..
[21] ``imaṃ ^a^V0.0119^ea^ tvaṃ paṭhamaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya.
[21] ``yathāpi kumbho sampuṇṇo, yassa kassaci adho kato.
[22] dadāhi dānaṃ nissesaṃ, kumbho viya adho kato''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^handā^eb^ti vavassaggatthe nipāto. ^b^buddhakare dhamme^eb^ti buddhattakare dhamme. buddhattakarā nāma dhammā dānapāramitādayo dasa dhammā. ^b^vicināmī^eb^ti vicinissāmi, vīmaṃsissāmi upaparikkhissāmīti attho. ^b^ito cito^eb^ti ito ito, ayameva vā pāṭho. tattha tattha vicināmīti attho. uddhanti devaloke. ^b^adho^eb^ti manussaloke. ^b^dasa disā^eb^ti dasasu disāsu; kattha nu kho te buddhakārakadhammā uddhaṃ adho tiriyaṃ disāsu vidisāsūti adhippāyo. ^b^yāvatā dhammadhātuyā^eb^ti ettha ^b^yāvatā^eb^ti paricchedavacanaṃ. ^b^dhammadhātuyā^eb^ti sabhāvadhammassa, pavattanīti vacanaseso daṭṭhabbo. kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? yāvatikā sabhāvadhammānaṃ kāmarūpārūpadhammānaṃ pavatti, tāvatikaṃ vicinissāmīti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03] ^b^vicinanto^eb^ti vīmaṃsanto upaparikkhanto. ^b^pubbakehī^eb^ti porāṇehi bodhisattehi. ^b^anuciṇṇa^eb^nti ajjhāciṇṇaṃ āsevitaṃ. ^b^samādiyā^eb^ti samādiyanaṃ karohi, ajja paṭṭhāya ayaṃ paṭhamaṃ dānapāramī pūretabbā mayāti evaṃ samādiyāti attho. ^b^dānapāramitaṃ gacchā^eb^ti dānapāramiṃ gaccha, pūrayāti attho. ^b^yadi^eb^ ^a^P0.0105^ea^ ^b^bodhiṃ pattumicchasī^eb^ti bodhimūlamupagantvā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ pattuṃ icchasi ce. ^b^yassa kassacī^eb^ti udakassa vā khīrassa vā yassa kassaci sampuṇṇo. sampuṇṇasaddayoge sati sāmivacanaṃ icchanti ^a^M0.0130^ea^ saddavidū. karaṇatthe vā sāmivacanaṃ, yena kenacīti attho. ^b^adho kato^eb^ti heṭṭhāmukhīkato. ^b^na tattha parirakkhatī^eb^ti tasmiṃ vamane na parirakkhati, nissesaṃ udakaṃ vamatevāti attho. ^b^hīnamukkaṭṭhamajjhime^eb^ti hīnamajjhimapaṇīte. ^b^ma^eb^-kāro padasandhikaro. ^b^kumbho viya adho kato^eb^ti heṭṭhāmukhīkato viya kumbho. yācake upagate disvā -- ``tvaṃ, sumedha, attano anavasesetvā sabbadhanapariccāgena dānapāramiṃ, aṅgapariccāgena upapāramiṃ, jīvitapariccāgena paramatthapāramiñca pūrehī''ti evaṃ attanāva attānaṃ ovadi.

[03] athassa ^a^V0.0120^ea^ ``na ettakeheva buddhakārakehi dhammehi bhavitabba''nti uttarimpi upadhārayato dutiyaṃ sīlapāramiṃ disvā etadahosi -- ``sumedhapaṇḍita, tvaṃ ito paṭṭhāya sīlapāramiṃ pūreyyāsi. yathā camarī migo nāma jīvitampi anoloketvā attano vālameva rakkhati, evaṃ tvampi ito paṭṭhāya jīvitampi anoloketvā sīlameva rakkhanto buddho bhavissasī''ti dutiyaṃ sīlapāramiṃ daḷhaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhāsi. tena vuttaṃ --
[21] ``imaṃ tvaṃ dutiyaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya.
[22] upeti maraṇaṃ tattha, na vikopeti vāladhiṃ..
[22] parirakkha sabbadā sīlaṃ, camarī viya vāladhi''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^na hete^eb^ti na hi eteyeva. ^b^bodhipācanā^eb^ti maggaparipācanā sabbaññutaññāṇaparipācanā vā. ^b^dutiyaṃ^eb^ ^a^P0.0106^ea^ ^b^sīlapārami^eb^nti sīlaṃ nāma sabbesaṃ kusaladhammānaṃ patiṭṭhā, sīle patiṭṭhito kusaladhammehi na parihāyati, sabbepi ^a^M0.0131^ea^ lokiyalokuttaraguṇe paṭilabhati. tasmā sīlapāramī pūretabbāti dutiyaṃ sīlapāramiṃ addakkhinti attho.

[03] ^b^āsevitanisevita^eb^nti bhāvitañceva bahulīkatañca. ^b^camarī^eb^ti camarī migo. ^b^kismiñcī^eb^ti yattha katthaci rukkhalatākaṇṭakādīsu aññatarasmiṃ. ^b^paṭilaggita^eb^nti paṭivilaggitaṃ. ^b^tatthā^eb^ti yattha vilaggitaṃ, tattheva ṭhatvā maraṇaṃ upagacchati. ^b^na vikopetī^eb^ti na chindati. ^b^vāladhi^eb^nti vālaṃ chinditvā na gacchati, tattheva maraṇaṃ upetīti attho.

[03] ^b^catūsu^eb^ ^a^V0.0121^ea^ ^b^bhūmīsu sīlānī^eb^ti catūsu ṭhānesu vibhattasīlāni, pātimokkhasaṃvaraindriyasaṃvarāajīvapārisuddhipaccayasannissitavasenāti attho. bhūmivasena pana dvīsuyeva bhūmīsu pariyāpannaṃ tampi catusīlamevāti. ^b^paripūrayā^eb^ti khaṇḍachiddasabalādiabhāvena paripūraya. ^b^sabbadā^eb^ti sabbakālaṃ. ^b^camarī viyā^eb^ti camarī migo viya. sesametthāpi uttānatthamevāti.

[03] athassa ``na ettakeheva buddhakārakehi dhammehi bhavitabba''nti uttarimpi upadhārayato tatiyaṃ nekkhammapāramiṃ disvā etadahosi -- ``sumedhapaṇḍita, tvaṃ ito paṭṭhāya nekkhammapāramimpi pūreyyāsi. yathāpi suciraṃ bandhanāgāre vasamāno puriso na tattha sinehaṃ karoti, atha kho ukkaṇṭhito avasitukāmo hoti, evameva tvampi sabbabhave bandhanāgārasadise katvā passa, sabbabhavehi ukkaṇṭhito muccitukāmo hutvā nekkhammābhimukhova hoti, evaṃ buddho bhavissasī''ti tatiyaṃ nekkhammapāramiṃ daḷhaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhāsi. tena vuttaṃ --
[21] ``imaṃ tvaṃ tatiyaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya.
[22] na tattha rāgaṃ janeti, muttiṃyeva gavesati..

[03] tattha ^b^andughare^eb^ti bandhanāgāre. ^b^ciravuṭṭho^eb^ti cirakālaṃ vuṭṭho. ^b^dukhaṭṭito^eb^ti dukkhapīḷito. ^b^na^eb^ ^a^V0.0122^ea^ ^b^tattha rāgaṃ janetī^eb^ti tattha andughare rāgaṃ sinehaṃ na janeti na uppādeti. ``imaṃ andugharaṃ muñcitvā nāhaṃ aññattha gamissāmī''ti evaṃ tattha rāgaṃ na janeti, kintu muttiṃyeva mokkhameva gavesatīti adhippāyo. ^b^nekkhammābhimukho^eb^ti nikkhamanābhimukho hoti. ^b^bhavato^eb^ti sabbabhavehi. ^b^parimuttiyā^eb^ti parimocanatthāya. nekkhammābhimukho hutvā, sambodhiṃ pāpuṇissasī''tipi pāṭho. sesamettha uttānatthamevāti.

[03] athassa ``na ettakeheva buddhakārakadhammehi bhavitabba''nti uttarimpi upadhārayato catutthaṃ paññāpāramiṃ disvā etadahosi -- ``sumedhapaṇḍita, tvaṃ ito paṭṭhāya paññāpāramimpi pūreyyāsi. hīnamajjhimukkaṭṭhesu kañci avajjetvā sabbepi paṇḍite upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṃ puccheyyāsi. yathāpi piṇḍacāriko bhikkhu hīnādibhedesu kulesu kiñci kulaṃ avivajjetvā paṭipāṭiyā piṇḍāya caranto khippaṃ yāpanamattaṃ labhati, evameva tvampi sabbe paṇḍite upasaṅkamitvā pucchanto buddho bhavissasī''ti catutthaṃ paññāpāramiṃ daḷhaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhāsi. tena vuttaṃ --
[21] ``imaṃ tvaṃ catutthaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya.
[22] kulāni na vivajjento, evaṃ labhati yāpanaṃ..

[03] tattha ^a^M0.0133^ea^ ^b^bhikkhanto^eb^ti piṇḍāya caranto. ^b^hīnamukkaṭṭhamajjhime^eb^ti hīnamukkaṭṭhamajjhimāni kulānīti ^a^V0.0123^ea^ attho. liṅgavipariyāso kato. ^b^na vivajjento^eb^ti na pariharanto, gharapaṭipāṭiṃ muñcitvā caranto vivajjeti nāma, evamakatvāti attho. ^b^yāpana^eb^nti yāpanamattaṃ pāṇadhāraṇaṃ āhāraṃ labhatīti attho. ^b^paripuccha^eb^nti -- ``kiṃ, bhante, kusalaṃ, kiṃ akusalaṃ; kiṃ sāvajjaṃ, kiṃ anavajja''ntiādinā (dī0 ni0 3.84, 216) nayena tattha tattha abhiññāte paṇḍite jane upasaṅkamitvā paripucchantoti attho. ^b^budhaṃ jana^eb^nti paṇḍitaṃ janaṃ. ``budhe jane''tipi pāṭho. ^b^paññāya pārami^eb^nti paññāya pāraṃ. ``paññāpāramitaṃ gantvā''tipi pāṭho. sesametthāpi uttānamevāti.

[03] athassa ``na ettakeheva buddhakārakadhammehi bhavitabba''nti uttarimpi upadhārayato pañcamaṃ vīriyapāramiṃ disvā etadahosi -- ``sumedhapaṇḍita, tvaṃ ito paṭṭhāya vīriyapāramimpi pūreyyāsi. yathāpi sīho migarājā sabbairiyāpathesu daḷhavīriyo hoti, evaṃ tvampi sabbabhavesu sabbairiyāpathesu daḷhavīriyo anolīnavīriyo samāno buddho bhavissasī''ti pañcamaṃ vīriyapāramiṃ daḷhaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhāsi. tena vuttaṃ --
[21] ``imaṃ tvaṃ pañcamaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya.

[03] tattha ^a^V0.0124^ea^ ^b^alīnavīriyo^eb^ti anolīnavīriyo. ^b^sabbabhave^eb^ti ^a^P0.0109^ea^ jātajātabhave, sabbesu bhavesūti attho. āraddhavīriyo hutvā, sambodhiṃ pāpuṇissasītipi pāṭho. sesametthāpi uttānamevāti.

[03] athassa ^a^M0.0134^ea^ ``na ettakeheva buddhakārakadhammehi bhavitabba''nti uttarimpi upadhārayato chaṭṭhamaṃ khantipāramiṃ disvā etadahosi -- ``sumedhapaṇḍita, tvaṃ ito paṭṭhāya khantipāramiṃ paripūreyyāsi, sammānanepi avamānanepi khamova bhaveyyāsi. yathā hi pathaviyaṃ nāma sucimpi pakkhipanti asucimpi, na ca tena pathavī sinehaṃ vā paṭighaṃ vā karoti, khamati sahati adhivāsetiyeva, evameva tvampi sabbesaṃ sammānanāvamānanesu khamo samāno buddho bhavissasī''ti chaṭṭhamaṃ khantipāramiṃ daḷhaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhāsi. tena vuttaṃ --
[21] ``imaṃ tvaṃ chaṭṭhamaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya.
[22] sabbaṃ sahati nikkhepaṃ, na karoti paṭighaṃ tayā..

[03] tattha ^b^tatthā^eb^ti tassaṃ khantipāramiyaṃ. advejjhamānasoti ekaṃsamānaso. ^b^sucimpī^eb^ti candanakuṅkumagandhamālādisucimpi. ^b^asucimpī^eb^ti ahikukkuramanussakuṇapagūthamuttakheḷasiṅghāṇikādiasucimpi. ^b^sahatī^eb^ti khamati, adhivāseti. ^b^nikkhepa^eb^nti nikkhittaṃ. ^b^paṭigha^eb^nti kodhaṃ. ^b^tayā^eb^ti tāya vuttiyā, tāya nikkhittatāya vā. ``paṭighaṃ daya''ntipi pāṭho, tassa tena nikkhepena paṭighānurodhaṃ na karotīti attho. ^b^sammānāvamānakkhamo^eb^ti sabbesaṃ ^a^V0.0125^ea^ sammānanāvamānanasaho tvampi ^a^P0.0110^ea^ bhavāti attho. ``tatheva tvampi sabbabhave, sammānanavimānakkhamo''tipi paṭhanti. ``khantiyā pāramiṃ gantvā''tipi pāṭho, tassā khantiyā pāramipūraṇavasena gantvāti attho. sesametthāpi uttānamevāti. ito paraṃ ettakampi avatvā yattha yattha viseso atthi, taṃ tameva vatvā pāṭhantaraṃ dassetvā gamissāmāti.

[03] athassa ^a^M0.0135^ea^ ``na ettakeheva buddhakārakadhammehi bhavitabba''nti uttarimpi upadhārayato sattamaṃ saccapāramiṃ disvā etadahosi -- ``sumedhapaṇḍita, tvaṃ ito paṭṭhāya saccapāramimpi pūreyyāsi, asaniyā matthake patamānāyapi dhanādīnaṃ atthāya chandādīnaṃ vasena sampajānamusāvādaṃ nāma mā bhāsi. yathāpi osadhītārakā nāma sabbautūsu attano gamanavīthiṃ vijahitvā aññāya vīthiyā na gacchati, sakavīthiyāva gacchati, evameva tvampi saccaṃ pahāya musāvādaṃ nāma avadantoyeva buddho bhavissasī''ti sattamaṃ saccapāramiṃ daḷhaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhāsi. tena vuttaṃ --
[21] ``imaṃ tvaṃ sattamaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya.
[22] samaye utuvasse vā, na vokkamati vīthito..
[21] ``tatheva tvampi saccesu, mā vokkama hi vīthito.

[03] tattha ^b^tatthā^eb^ti saccapāramiyaṃ. ^b^advejjhavacano^eb^ti avitathavacano. ^b^osadhī nāmā^eb^ti osadhītārakā, osadhagahaṇe osadhītārakaṃ uditaṃ disvā osadhaṃ gaṇhanti. tasmā ``osadhītārakā''ti vuccati. ^b^tulābhūtā^eb^ti pamāṇabhūtā. ^b^sadevake^eb^ti sadevakassa lokassa. ^b^samaye^eb^ti ^a^V0.0126^ea^ vassasamaye. ^b^utuvasse^eb^ti hemantagimhesu. ``samaye utuvaṭṭe''tipi pāṭho. tassa ^b^samaye^eb^ti gimhe. ^b^utuvaṭṭe^eb^ti hemante ca vassāne cāti attho. ^b^na^eb^ ^a^P0.0111^ea^ ^b^vokkamati vīthito^eb^ti taṃ taṃ utumhi attano gamanavīthito na vokkamati na vigacchati, cha māse pacchimaṃ disaṃ gacchati, cha māse pubbaṃ disaṃ gacchatīti. atha vā ^b^osadhī nāmā^eb^ti siṅgiverapipphalimaricādikaṃ osadhaṃ. ^b^na vokkamatī^eb^ti yaṃ yaṃ phaladānasamatthaṃ osadhaṃ, taṃ taṃ phaladānaṃ okkamma attano ^a^M0.0136^ea^ phalaṃ adatvā na nivattati. ^b^vīthito^eb^ti gamanavīthito, pittaharo pittaṃ harateva, vātaharo vātaṃ harateva, semhaharo semhaṃ haratevāti attho. sesametthāpi uttānamevāti.

[03] athassa ``na ettakeheva buddhakārakadhammehi bhavitabba''nti uttarimpi upadhārayato aṭṭhamaṃ adhiṭṭhānapāramiṃ disvā etadahosi -- ``sumedhapaṇḍita, tvaṃ ito paṭṭhāya adhiṭṭhānapāramimpi pūreyyāsi, yaṃ adhiṭṭhāsi, tasmiṃ adhiṭṭhāne niccalo bhaveyyāsi, yathā pabbato nāma sabbadisāsu vāte paharantepi na kampati na calati, attano ṭhāneyeva tiṭṭhati, evameva tvampi attano adhiṭṭhāne niccalo hontova buddho bhavissasī''ti aṭṭhamaṃ adhiṭṭhānapāramiṃ daḷhaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhāsīti. tena vuttaṃ --
[21] ``imaṃ tvaṃ aṭṭhamaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya.
[22] tattha tvaṃ acalo hutvā, sambodhiṃ pāpuṇissasi..

[03] tattha ^a^V0.0127^ea^ ^b^selo^eb^ti silāmayo. ^b^acalo^eb^ti niccalo ^b^suppatiṭṭhito^eb^ti acalattāva suṭṭhu patiṭṭhito. ``yathāpi pabbato acalo, nikhāto suppatiṭṭhito''tipi pāṭho. ^b^bhusavātehī^eb^ti balavavātehi. ^b^sakaṭṭhānevā^eb^ti attano ṭhāneyeva, yathāṭhitaṭṭhāneyevāti attho. sesametthāpi uttānamevāti.

[03] athassa ``na ettakeheva buddhakārakadhammehi bhavitabba''nti uttarimpi upadhārayato navamaṃ mettāpāramiṃ disvā etadahosi ^a^P0.0112^ea^ -- ``sumedhapaṇḍita, tvaṃ ito paṭṭhāya mettāpāramiṃ pūreyyāsi, hitesupi ahitesupi ekacittova ^a^M0.0137^ea^ bhaveyyāsi. yathāpi udakaṃ nāma pāpajanassapi kalyāṇajanassapi sītabhāvaṃ ekasadisaṃ katvā pharati, evameva tvampi sabbasattesu mettacittena ekacittova hutvā buddho bhavissasī''ti navamaṃ mettāpāramiṃ daḷhaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhāsīti. tena vuttaṃ --
[21] ``imaṃ tvaṃ navamaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya.
[22] mettāya asamo hoti, yadi bodhiṃ pattumicchasi..

[03] tattha ^b^asamo hohī^eb^ti mettābhāvanāya asadiso hohi. tattha ``tvaṃ samasamo hohī''tipi pāṭho, so uttānatthova. ^b^sama^eb^nti tulyaṃ. ^b^pharatī^eb^ti phusati. ^b^pavāhetī^eb^ti visodheti. ^b^rajo^eb^ti āgantukarajaṃ. ^b^mala^eb^nti sarīre uṭṭhitaṃ sedamalādiṃ. ``rajamala''ntipi pāṭho, soyevattho. ^b^hitāhite^eb^ti ^a^V0.0128^ea^ hite ca ahite ca, mitte ca amitte cāti attho. ^b^mettāya bhāvayā^eb^ti mettaṃ bhāvaya vaḍḍhehi. sesametthāpi uttānamevāti.

[03] athassa ``na ettakeheva buddhakārakadhammehi bhavitabba''nti uttarimpi upadhārayato dasamaṃ upekkhāpāramiṃ disvā etadahosi -- ``sumedhapaṇḍita, tvaṃ ito paṭṭhāya upekkhāpāramiṃ paripūreyyāsi, sukhepi dukkhepi majjhattova bhaveyyāsi. yathāpi pathavī nāma sucimpi asucimpi ca pakkhipamāne majjhattāva hoti, evameva tvampi sukhadukkhesu majjhattova honto buddho bhavissasī''ti ^a^P0.0113^ea^ dasamaṃ upekkhāpāramiṃ daḷhaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhāsi. tena vuttaṃ --
[21] ``imaṃ tvaṃ dasamaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya.

[03] tattha ^b^tulābhūto^eb^ti majjhattabhāve ṭhito yathā tulāya daṇḍo samaṃ tulito samaṃ tiṭṭhati, na namati na unnamati, evameva tvampi sukhadukkhesu tulāsadiso hutvā sambodhiṃ pāpuṇissasi. ^b^kopānunayavajjitā^eb^ti paṭighānurodhavajjitā. ``dayākopavivajjitā''tipi pāṭho, soyevattho. sesaṃ khantipāramiyaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.

[03] tato sumedhapaṇḍito ime dasa pāramidhamme vicinitvā tato paraṃ cintesi -- ``imasmiṃ ^a^V0.0129^ea^ loke bodhisattehi paripūretabbā bodhipācanā buddhattakarā dhammā ettakāyeva, na ito bhiyyo, imā pana pāramiyo uddhaṃ ākāsepi natthi, na heṭṭhā pathaviyampi, na puratthimādīsu disāsupi atthi, mayhaṃyeva pana hadayamaṃsantareyeva patiṭṭhitā''ti. evaṃ tāsaṃ attano hadaye patiṭṭhitabhāvaṃ disvā sabbāpi tā daḷhaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhāya punappunaṃ sammasanto anulomapaṭilomaṃ sammasi, pariyante gahetvā ādimhi pāpesi, ādimhi gahetvā pariyante ṭhapesi, majjhe gahetvā ubhato osāpesi, ubhato koṭīsu gahetvā majjhe osāpesi. bāhirabhaṇḍapariccāgo ^b^pāramiyo^eb^ nāma, aṅgapariccāgo ^b^upapāramiyo^eb^ nāma, jīvitapariccāgo ^b^paramatthapāramiyo^eb^ nāmāti dasa pāramiyo dasa upapāramiyo dasa paramatthapāramiyoti samattiṃsa pāramiyo yamakatelaṃ vinivaṭṭento viya sammasi. tassa dasa pāramiyo sammasantassa dhammatejena ^a^M0.0139^ea^ catunahutādhikadviyojanasatasahassabahalā vipulā ayaṃ mahāpathavī hatthinā akkantanaḷakalāpo viya uppīḷiyamānaṃ ucchuyantaṃ viya ca mahāviravaṃ viravamānā saṅkampi sampakampi sampavedhi. kulālacakkaṃ ^a^P0.0114^ea^ viya telayantacakkaṃ viya ca paribbhami. tena vuttaṃ --
[22] tatuddhaṃ natthi aññatra, daḷhaṃ tattha patiṭṭhaha..
[22] telayante yathā cakkaṃ, evaṃ kampati medanī''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^ettakāyevā^eb^ti niddiṭṭhānaṃ dasannaṃ pāramitānaṃ anūnādhikabhāvassa dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^tatuddha^eb^nti tato dasapāramīhi uddhaṃ ^b^natthi. aññatrā^eb^ti aññaṃ, lakkhaṇaṃ saddasatthato gahetabbaṃ. tato dasapāramito añño buddhakārakadhammo natthīti attho. ^b^tatthā^eb^ti tāsu dasasu pāramīsu. ^b^patiṭṭhahā^eb^ti patiṭṭha, paripūrento tiṭṭhāti attho.

[03] ^b^ime dhamme^eb^ti pāramidhamme. ^b^sammasato^eb^ti upaparikkhantassa, anādaratthe sāmivacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^sabhāvasarasalakkhaṇe^eb^ti sabhāvasaṅkhātena sarasalakkhaṇena sammasantassāti attho. ^b^dhammatejenā^eb^ti pāramipavicayañāṇatejena. ^b^vasudhā^eb^ti vasūti ratanaṃ vuccati, taṃ dhāreti dhīyati vā etthāti vasudhā ^a^V0.0130^ea^. kā sā? medanī. ^b^pakampathā^eb^ti pakampittha. sumedhapaṇḍite pana pāramiyo vicinante tassa ñāṇatejena dasasahassī pakampitthāti attho.

[03] ^b^calatī^eb^ti chappakārā kampi. ^b^ravatī^eb^ti nadati vikūjati. ^b^ucchuyantaṃva pīḷita^eb^nti nippīḷitaṃ ucchuyantaṃ viya. ``guḷayantaṃva pīḷita''ntipi pāṭho, soyevattho. ^b^telayante^eb^ti telapīḷanayante. ^b^yathā cakka^eb^nti cakkikānaṃ mahācakkayantaṃ viya. ^b^eva^eb^nti yathā telapīḷanacakkayantaṃ paribbhamati kampati, evaṃ ayaṃ medanī kampatīti attho. sesamettha uttānamevāti.

[03] evaṃ ^a^M0.0140^ea^ mahāpathaviyā kampamānāya rammanagaravāsino manussā bhagavantaṃ ^a^P0.0115^ea^ parivisayamānā saṇṭhātuṃ asakkontā yugandharavātabbhāhatā mahāsālā viya mucchitā papatiṃsu. ghaṭādīni kulālabhaṇḍāni pavaṭṭentāni aññamaññaṃ paharantāni cuṇṇavicuṇṇāni ahesuṃ. mahājano bhītatasito satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā -- ``kiṃ nu kho bhagavā `nāgāvaṭṭo ayaṃ, bhūtayakkhadevatāsu aññatarāvaṭṭo vā'ti na hi mayaṃ etaṃ jānāma. api ca kho sabbopi ayaṃ mahājano bhayena upadduto, kiṃ nu kho imassa lokassa pāpakaṃ bhavissati, udāhu kalyāṇaṃ, kathetha no etaṃ kāraṇa''nti pucchiṃsu.

[03] atha satthā tesaṃ kathaṃ sutvā -- ``tumhe mā bhāyittha, mā kho cintayittha, natthi vo itonidānaṃ bhayaṃ, yo so mayā ajja sumedhapaṇḍito `anāgate gotamo nāma buddho bhavissatī'ti byākato, so idāni pāramiyo sammasati, tassa sammasantassa dhammatejena sakaladasasahassī lokadhātu ekappahārena kampati ceva viravati cā''ti āha. tena vuttaṃ --
[22] pavedhamānā sā tattha, mucchitā seti bhūmiyaṃ..
[22] sabbo upadduto loko, taṃ vinodehi cakkhuma..
[22] vissatthā hotha mā bhātha, imasmiṃ pathavikampane..

[03] tattha ^b^yāvatā^eb^ti yāvatikā. ^b^āsī^eb^ti ^a^P0.0116^ea^ ahosi. ``yā tadā parisā āsī''tipi pāṭho, tassa yā tattha parisā ṭhitā āsīti attho. ^b^pavedhamānā^eb^ti kampamānā. ^b^sā^eb^ti sā parisā. ^b^tatthā^eb^ti tasmiṃ parivesanaṭṭhāne. ^b^setī^eb^ti sayittha.

[03] ^b^ghaṭā^eb^ti ghaṭānaṃ, sāmiatthe paccattavacanaṃ, ghaṭānaṃ nekasahassānīti attho. ^b^sañcuṇṇamathitā^eb^ti cuṇṇā ceva mathitā ca, mathitasañcuṇṇāti attho. ^b^aññamaññaṃ paghaṭṭitā^eb^ti aññamaññaṃ pahaṭā. ^b^ubbiggā^eb^ti utrāsahadayā. ^b^tasitā^eb^ti sañjātatāsā. ^b^bhītā^eb^ti bhayabhītā. ^b^bhantā^eb^ti phandanamānasā, vibbhantacittāti attho. sabbāni panetāni aññamaññavevacanāni. ^b^samāgammā^eb^ti samāgantvā. ayameva vā pāṭho.

[03] ^b^upadduto^eb^ti upahato. ^b^taṃ vinodehī^eb^ti taṃ upaddutabhayaṃ vinodehi, vināsayāti attho. ^b^cakkhumā^eb^ti pañcahi cakkhūhi cakkhuma. ^b^tesaṃ tadā^eb^ti te jane tadā, upayogatthe sāmivacanaṃ. ^b^saññāpesī^eb^ti ñāpesi bodhesi. ^b^visatthā^eb^ti vissatthacittā. ^b^mā bhāthā^eb^ti mā bhāyatha. ^b^yamaha^eb^nti yaṃ ahaṃ sumedhapaṇḍitaṃ. ^b^dhamma^eb^nti pāramidhammaṃ. ^b^pubbaka^eb^nti porāṇaṃ. ^b^jinasevita^eb^nti jinehi bodhisattakāle sevitanti attho. ^b^buddhabhūmi^eb^nti pāramidhammaṃ. ^b^tenā^eb^ti tena sammasanakāraṇena. ^b^kampitā^eb^ti calitā. ^b^sadevake^eb^ti sadevake loke.

[03] tato mahājano tathāgatassa vacanaṃ sutvā haṭṭhatuṭṭho mālāgandhavilepanādīni ādāya rammanagarato ^a^V0.0132^ea^ nikkhamitvā bodhisattaṃ upasaṅkamitvā mālāgandhādīhi pūjetvā vanditvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā rammanagarameva pāvisi. atha kho bodhisatto dasa pāramiyo sammasitvā vīriyaṃ daḷhaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhāya nisinnāsanā vuṭṭhāsi. tena vuttaṃ --
[22] sabbe maṃ upasaṅkamma, punāpi maṃ abhivandisuṃ..

[03] tattha ^b^mano nibbāyī^eb^ti mahājanassa pathavikampane ubbiggahadayassa tattha kāraṇaṃ sutvā mano nibbāyi, santiṃ agamāsīti attho. ``jano nibbāyī''tipi pāṭho, so uttānoyeva. ^b^samādiyitvā^eb^ti sammā ādiyitvā, samādāyāti attho. ^b^buddhaguṇa^eb^nti pāramiyo. sesaṃ uttānameva.

[03] atha kho bodhisattaṃ dayitasabbasattaṃ āsanā vuṭṭhahantaṃ sakaladasasahassacakkavāḷadevatā sannipatitvā dibbehi mālāgandhādīhi pūjetvā -- ``ayya sumedhatāpasa, tayā ajja dīpaṅkaradasabalassa pādamūle mahati patthanā patthitā, sā te anantarāyena samijjhatu, mā te tattha bhayaṃ vā chambhitattaṃ vā ahosi. sarīre te appamattakopi rogo mā uppajjatu, khippaṃ pāramiyo pūretvā sammāsambodhiṃ paṭivijjha. yathā pupphūpagaphalūpagā rukkhā samaye pupphanti ceva phalanti ca, tatheva tvampi taṃ samayaṃ anatikkamitvā khippaṃ sambodhiṃ phusassū''tiādīni thutimaṅgalāni payirudāhaṃsu, evaṃ payirudāhitvā bodhisattaṃ abhivādetvā attano attano devaṭṭhānameva agamaṃsu. bodhisattopi devatāhi abhitthuto -- ``ahaṃ dasa pāramiyo pūretvā kappasatasahassādhikānaṃ catunnaṃ asaṅkhyeyyānaṃ matthake buddho bhavissāmī''ti vīriyaṃ daḷhaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhāya ākāsamabbhuggantvā isigaṇavantaṃ himavantaṃ agamāsi. tena vuttaṃ --
[21] ``vedayanti ^a^V0.0133^ea^ ca te sotthiṃ, devā mānusakā ubho.
[22] mahantaṃ patthitaṃ tuyhaṃ, taṃ labhassu yathicchitaṃ..
[22] mā te bhavantvantarāyā, phusa khippaṃ bodhimuttamaṃ..
[22] tatheva lokā muccitvā, viroca siriyā tuvaṃ..
[22] te dhamme paripūrento, pavanaṃ pāvisī tadā''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^V0.0134^ea^ ^b^dibba^eb^nti mandāravapāricchattakasantānakusesayādikaṃ dibbakusumaṃ devā mānusakā ca mānusapupphaṃ gahetvāti attho. ^b^samokirantī^eb^ti mamopari samokiriṃsūti attho. ^b^vuṭṭhahantassā^eb^ti vuṭṭhahato. ^b^vedayantī^eb^ti nivedayiṃsu saññāpesuṃ. ^b^sotthi^eb^nti sotthibhāvaṃ. idāni vedayitākāradassanatthaṃ ^b^``mahantaṃ patthitaṃ tuyha''^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. tayā pana, sumedhapaṇḍita, mahantaṃ ṭhānaṃ patthitaṃ, taṃ yathāpatthitaṃ labhassūti attho.

[03] ^b^sabbītiyo^eb^ti entīti ītiyo, sabbā ītiyo sabbītiyo, upaddavā. ^b^vivajjantū^eb^ti mā hontu. ^b^soko rogo vinassatū^eb^ti socanasaṅkhāto soko rujanasaṅkhāto rogo ca vinassatu. ^b^te^eb^ti tava. ^b^mā bhavantvantarāyā^eb^ti mā bhavantu antarāyā. ^b^phusā^eb^ti adhigaccha pāpuṇāhi. ^b^bodhi^eb^nti arahattamaggañāṇaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇampi vaṭṭati. ^b^uttama^eb^nti seṭṭhaṃ sabbabuddhaguṇadāyakattā arahattamaggañāṇaṃ ``uttama''nti vuttaṃ.

[03] ^b^samaye^eb^ti ^a^M0.0144^ea^ tassa tassa rukkhassa pupphanasamaye sampatteti attho. ^b^pupphino^eb^ti ^a^P0.0119^ea^ pupphanakā. ^b^buddhañāṇehī^eb^ti aṭṭhārasahi buddhañāṇehi. ^b^pupphasū^eb^ti pupphassu. ^b^pūrayu^eb^nti pūrayiṃsu. ^b^pūrayā^eb^ti paripūraya. ^b^bujjhare^eb^ti bujjhiṃsu. ^b^jinabodhiya^eb^nti jinānaṃ buddhānaṃ bodhiyā, sabbaññubodhimūleti attho. ^b^puṇṇamāye^eb^ti puṇṇamāsiyaṃ. ^b^puṇṇamano^eb^ti paripuṇṇamanoratho.

[03] ^b^rāhumutto^eb^ti rāhunā sobbhānunā mutto. ^b^tāpenā^eb^ti patāpena, ālokena. ^b^lokā muccitvā^eb^ti lokadhammehi alitto hutvāti attho. ^b^virocā^eb^ti virāja. ^b^siriyā^eb^ti buddhasiriyā. ^b^osarantī^eb^ti mahāsamuddaṃ pavisanti. ^b^osarantū^eb^ti upagacchantu. ^b^tavantike^eb^ti tava santikaṃ. ^b^tehī^eb^ti devehi. ^b^thutappasattho^eb^ti thuto ceva pasattho ca, thutehi vā dīpaṅkarādīhi pasatthoti thutappasattho. ^b^dasa dhamme^eb^ti dasa pāramidhamme. ^b^pavana^eb^nti mahāvanaṃ, dhammikapabbate mahāvanaṃ pāvisīti attho. sesagāthā sūttānā evāti.

[03] rammanagaravāsinopi ^a^V0.0135^ea^ te upāsakā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ datvā puna bhagavantaṃ bhuttāviṃ onītapattapāṇiṃ mālāgandhādīhi pūjetvā vanditvā dānānumodanaṃ sotukāmā upanisīdiṃsu. atha satthā tesaṃ paramamadhuraṃ hadayaṅgamaṃ dānānumodanamakāsi --
[22] ko hi nāma naro loke, na dadeyya hite rato..
[22] na dajjā sukhappadaṃ dānaṃ, dānaṃ cittappamodanaṃ..
[22] kittimanantaṃ yāti ca dātā, vissasanīyo hoti ca dātā..
[21] ``datvā dānaṃ yāti naro so, bhogasamiddhiṃ dīghañcāyu.
[27] sussaratampi ca vindati rūpaṃ, sagge saddhiṃ kīḷati devehi.
[22] dadāti taṃ sāvakañāṇabhūmiṃ, paccekabhūmiṃ pana buddhabhūmi''nti.. --
[25] evamādinā nayena dānānumodanaṃ katvā dānānisaṃsaṃ pakāsetvā tadanantaraṃ sīlakathaṃ kathesi. sīlaṃ nāmetaṃ idhalokaparalokasampattīnaṃ mūlaṃ.
[21] ``sīlaṃ sukhānaṃ paramaṃ nidānaṃ, sīlena sīlī tidivaṃ payāti.
[21] ``avassayo ^a^M0.0146^ea^ sīlasamo janānaṃ, kuto panañño idha vā parattha.
[22] sīlaṃ guṇānaṃ paramā patiṭṭhā, yathā dharā thāvarajaṅgamānaṃ..

[03] sīlālaṅkārasamo ^a^P0.0121^ea^ alaṅkāro natthi, sīlagandhasamo gandho natthi, sīlasamaṃ kilesamalavisodhanaṃ natthi, sīlasamaṃ pariḷāhūpasamaṃ natthi, sīlasamaṃ kittijananaṃ natthi, sīlasamaṃ saggārohaṇasopānaṃ natthi, nibbānanagarappavesane ca sīlasamaṃ dvāraṃ natthi. yathāha --
[22] yo samaṃ anuvāte ca, paṭivāte ca vāyati.. (visuddhi0 1.9).
[21] ``na pupphagandho paṭivātameti, na candanaṃ taggaramallikā vā.
[22] satañca gandho paṭivātameti, sabbā disā sappuriso pavāyati..
[22] etesaṃ gandhajātānaṃ, sīlagandho anuttaro.. (dha0 pa0 54-55; mi0 pa0 5.4.1).
[21] ``na gaṅgā yamunā cāpi, sarabhū vā sarasvatī.
[22] visodhayati sattānaṃ, yaṃ ve sīlajalaṃ malaṃ..
[21] ``na taṃ sajaladā vātā, na cāpi haricandanaṃ.
[22] neva hārā na maṇayo, na candakiraṇaṅkurā..
[22] yaṃ sameti idaṃ ariyaṃ, sīlaṃ accantasītalaṃ..
[22] dvāraṃ vā pana nibbāna, nagarassa pavesane..

[03] evaṃ bhagavā sīlānisaṃsaṃ dassetvā -- ``idaṃ pana sīlaṃ nissāya ayaṃ saggo labhatī''ti dassanatthaṃ tadanantaraṃ saggakathaṃ kathesi. ayaṃ saggo nāma iṭṭho kanto manāpo ekantasukho niccamettha kīḷā niccaṃ sampattiyo labhanti. cātumahārājikā devā navutivassasatasahassāni dibbasukhaṃ dibbasampattiṃ paṭilabhanti. tāvatiṃsā tisso vassakoṭiyo saṭṭhi ca vassasatasahassānīti evamādisaggaguṇapaṭisaṃyuttakathaṃ kathesi. evaṃ saggakathāya ^a^P0.0122^ea^ palobhetvā puna -- ``ayampi saggo anicco adhuvo na tattha chandarāgo kātabbo''ti kāmānaṃ ādīnavaṃ okāraṃ saṃkilesaṃ nekkhamme ānisaṃsañca pakāsetvā amatapariyosānaṃ dhammakathaṃ kathesi. evaṃ tassa mahājanassa dhammaṃ desetvā ekacce saraṇesu ca ekacce pañcasīlesu ca ekacce sotāpattiphale ca ekacce sakadāgāmiphale ekacce anāgāmiphale ekacce catūsupi phalesu ekacce tīsu vijjāsu ekacce chasu abhiññāsu ekacce aṭṭhasu samāpattīsu patiṭṭhāpetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā rammanagarato nikkhamitvā sudassanamahāvihārameva pāvisi. tena vuttaṃ --
[22] kañci pañcasu sīlesu, sīle dasavidhe paraṃ..
[22] kassaci asame dhamme, deti so paṭisambhidā..

[03] tattha ^b^te^eb^ti rammanagaravāsino upāsakā. ^b^saraṇa^eb^nti ettha saraṇaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ saraṇassa gantā ca veditabbā. sarati hiṃsati vināsetīti ^b^saraṇaṃ,^eb^ kiṃ taṃ? ratanattayaṃ. taṃ pana saraṇagatānaṃ teneva saraṇagamanena bhayaṃ santāsaṃ dukkhaṃ duggatiṃ parikkilesaṃ hanati hiṃsati vināsetīti saraṇanti vuccatīti. vuttañhetaṃ --
[21] ``ye keci buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gatāse, na te gamissanti apāyabhūmiṃ.
[22] pahāya mānusaṃ dehaṃ, devakāyaṃ paripūressanti.. (dī0 ni0 2.332; saṃ0 ni0 1.37).
[21] ``ye ^a^P0.0123^ea^ keci dhammaṃ saraṇaṃ gatāse, na te gamissanti apāyabhūmiṃ.
[22] pahāya mānusaṃ dehaṃ, devakāyaṃ paripūressanti.. (dī0 ni0 2.332; saṃ0 ni0 1.37).
[21] ``ye keci saṅghaṃ saraṇaṃ gatāse, na te gamissanti apāyabhūmiṃ.
[22] pahāya mānusaṃ dehaṃ, devakāyaṃ paripūressantī''ti.. (dī0 ni0 2.332; saṃ0 ni0 1.37).

[03] ^b^saraṇagamanaṃ^eb^ ^a^M0.0149^ea^ nāma ratanattayaparāyanākārappavatto cittuppādo. ^b^saraṇassa gantā^eb^ nāma taṃsamaṅgīpuggalo. evaṃ tāva saraṇaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ saraṇassa gantā cāti idaṃ tayaṃ veditabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^tassā^eb^ti taṃ dīpaṅkaraṃ, upayogatthe sāmivacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. ``upagacchuṃ saraṇaṃ tatthā''tipi pāṭho. ^b^satthuno^eb^ti satthāraṃ. ^b^saraṇāgamane kañcī^eb^ti kañci puggalaṃ saraṇagamane nivesetīti attho. kiñcāpi paccuppannavasena vuttaṃ, atītakālavasena pana attho gahetabbo. esa nayo sesesupi. ``kassaci saraṇāgamane''tipi pāṭho, tassapi soyevattho. kañci pañcasu sīlesūti ^a^V0.0140^ea^ kañci puggalaṃ pañcasu viratisīlesu nivesesīti attho. ``kassaci pañcasu sīlesū''tipi pāṭho, soyevattho. ^b^sīle dasavidhe para^eb^nti aparaṃ puggalaṃ dasavidhe sīle nivesesīti attho. ``kassaci kusale dasā''tipi pāṭho, tassa kañci puggalaṃ dasa kusaladhamme samādapesīti attho. ^b^kassaci deti sāmañña^eb^nti ettha paramatthato sāmaññanti maggo vuccati. yathāha --
[02] ``katamañca, bhikkhave, sāmaññaṃ? ayameva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo, seyyathidaṃ -- sammādiṭṭhi...pe0... sammāsamādhi. idaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, sāmañña''nti (saṃ0 ni0 5.36).

[03] ^b^caturo phalamuttame^eb^ti cattāri uttamāni phalānīti attho. ^b^ma^eb^-kāro padasandhikaro. liṅgavipariyāsena vuttaṃ. yathopanissayaṃ cattāro magge cattāri ca sāmaññaphalāni kassaci adāsīti attho. ^b^kassaci asame dhamme^eb^ti kassaci asadise cattāro paṭisambhidādhamme adāsi.

[03] ^b^kassaci varasamāpattiyo^eb^ti kassaci pana nīvaraṇavigamena padhānabhūtā aṭṭha samāpattiyo adāsi. ^b^tisso kassaci vijjāyo^eb^ti kassaci puggalassa upanissayavasena dibbacakkhuñāṇapubbenivāsānussatiñāṇāasavakkhayañāṇānaṃ vasena tisso vijjāyo. ^b^chaḷabhiññā pavecchatī^eb^ti cha abhiññāyo kassaci adāsi.

[03] ^b^tena yogenā^eb^ti tena nayena tenānukkamena ca. ^b^janakāya^eb^nti janasamūhaṃ. ^b^ovadatī^eb^ti ovadi. kālavipariyāsena vuttanti veditabbaṃ. ito uparipi īdisesu vacanesu atītakālavaseneva attho gahetabbo ^a^M0.0150^ea^. ^b^tena vitthārikaṃ āsī^eb^ti tena dīpaṅkarassa bhagavato ovādena anusāsaniyā vitthārikaṃ vitthataṃ visālībhūtaṃ sāsanaṃ ahosi.

[03] ^b^mahāhanū^eb^ti ^a^P0.0124^ea^ mahāpurisānaṃ kira dvepi hanūni paripuṇṇāni dvādasiyā pakkhassa candasadisākārāni hontīti mahantāni hanūni yassa so mahāhanu, sīhahanūti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^usabhakkhandho^eb^ti usabhasseva khandho yassa bhavati, so usabhakkhandho. suvaṭṭitasuvaṇṇāliṅgasadisarucirakkhandho samavaṭṭacārukkhandhoti attho. ^b^dīpaṅkarasanāmako^eb^ti dīpaṅkarasanāmo ^a^V0.0141^ea^. ^b^bahū jane tārayatī^eb^ti bahū buddhaveneyye jane tāresi. ^b^parimocetī^eb^ti parimocesi. ^b^duggati^eb^nti duggatito. nissakkatthe upayogavacanaṃ.

[03] idāni tāraṇaparimocanakaraṇākāradassanatthaṃ ^b^``bodhaneyyaṃ jana''^eb^nti gāthā vuttā. tattha ^b^bodhaneyyaṃ jana^eb^nti bodhaneyyaṃ pajaṃ, ayameva vā pāṭho. ^b^disvā^eb^ti buddhacakkhunā vā samantacakkhunā vā disvā. ^b^satasahassepi yojane^eb^ti anekasatasahassepi yojane ṭhitaṃ. idaṃ pana dasasahassiyaṃyeva sandhāya vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03] dīpaṅkaro kira satthā buddhattaṃ patvā bodhimūle sattasattāhaṃ vītināmetvā aṭṭhame sattāhe mahābrahmuno dhammajjhesanaṃ paṭiññāya sunandārāme dhammacakkaṃ pavattetvā koṭisataṃ devamanussānaṃ dhammāmataṃ pāyesi. ayaṃ paṭhamo abhisamayo ahosi.

[03] atha satthā attano puttassa samavaṭṭakkhandhassa usabhakkhandhassa nāma ñāṇaparipākaṃ ñatvā taṃ atrajaṃ pamukhaṃ katvā ^b^rāhulovādasadisaṃ^eb^ dhammaṃ desetvā devamanussānaṃ navutikoṭiyo dhammāmataṃ pāyesi. ayaṃ dutiyo abhisamayo ahosi.

[03] puna bhagavā amaravatīnagaradvāre mahāsirīsarukkhamūle yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ katvā mahājanassa bandhanāmokkhaṃ katvā devagaṇaparivuto divasakarātirekajutivisarabhavane tāvatiṃsabhavane pāricchattakamūle paramasītale paṇḍukambalasilātale nisīditvā sabbadevagaṇapītisañjananiṃ attano ^a^M0.0151^ea^ jananiṃ sumedhādeviṃ pamukhaṃ katvā sabbalokaviditavisuddhidevo devadevo dīpaṅkaro bhagavā sabbasattahitakaraṃ paramātirekagambhīrasukhumaṃ buddhivisadakaraṃ sattappakaraṇaṃ abhidhammapiṭakaṃ desetvā navutidevakoṭisahassānaṃ dhammāmataṃ pāyesi. ayaṃ tatiyo abhisamayo ahosi. tena vuttaṃ --
[03] dīpaṅkarassa ^a^V0.0142^ea^ ^a^P0.0125^ea^ pana bhagavato tayo sāvakasannipātā ahesuṃ. tattha sunandārāme koṭisatasahassānaṃ paṭhamo sannipāto ahosi. tena vuttaṃ --

[03] athāparena samayena dasabalo catūhi bhikkhusatasahassehi parivuto gāmanigamanagarapaṭipāṭiyā mahājanānuggahaṃ karonto cārikaṃ caramāno anukkamena ekasmiṃ padese mahājanakatasakkāraṃ sabbalokavissutaṃ amanussapariggahitaṃ atibhayānakaṃ olambāmbudharaparicumbitakūṭaṃ vividhasurabhitarukusumavāsitakūṭaṃ nānāmigagaṇavicaritakūṭaṃ ^b^nāradakūṭaṃ^eb^ nāma paramaramaṇīyaṃ pabbataṃ sampāpuṇi. so kira pabbato nāradena nāma yakkhena pariggahito ahosi. tattha pana tassa yakkhassa anusaṃvaccharaṃ mahājano manussabaliṃ upasaṃharati.

[03] atha dīpaṅkaro kira bhagavā tassa mahājanassa upanissayasampattiṃ disvā tato bhikkhusaṅghaṃ cātuddisaṃ pesetvā adutiyo asahāyo mahākaruṇābalavasaṅgatahadayo tañca yakkhaṃ vinetuṃ taṃ nāradapabbataṃ abhiruhi. atha so manussabhakkho sakahitanirapekkho paravadhadakkho yakkho makkhaṃ asahamāno kodhaparetamānaso dasabalaṃ bhiṃsāpetvā palāpetukāmo taṃ pabbataṃ cālesi. so kira pabbato tena ^a^M0.0152^ea^ cāliyamāno bhagavato ānubhāvena tasseva matthake patamāno viya ahosi.

[03] tato so bhīto -- ``handa naṃ agginā jhāpessāmī''ti mahantaṃ atibhīmadassanaṃ aggikkhandhaṃ nibbattesi. so aggikkhandho paṭivāte khitto viya attanova dukkhaṃ janesi, na pana bhagavato cīvare aṃsumattampi daḍḍhuṃ samattho ahosi. yakkho pana ``samaṇo daḍḍho, na daḍḍho''ti olokento dasabalaṃ saradasamayavimalakaranikaraṃ sabbajanaratikaraṃ rajanikaramiva sītalajalatalagatakamalakaṇṇikāya nisinnaṃ viya bhagavantaṃ disvā cintesi -- ``aho ayaṃ samaṇo mahānubhāvo, yaṃ yaṃ imassāhaṃ anatthaṃ karomi, so so mamūpariyeva patati, imaṃ pana samaṇaṃ muñcitvā aññaṃ me paṭisaraṇaṃ parāyanaṃ natthi, pathaviyaṃ upakkhalitā pathaviṃyeva nissāya uṭṭhahanti, handāhaṃ imaṃyeva samaṇaṃ saraṇaṃ gamissāmī''ti.

[03] athevaṃ ^a^V0.0143^ea^ pana so cintetvā bhagavato cakkālaṅkatatalesu pādesu sirasā nipatitvā -- ``accayo maṃ, bhante, accagamā''ti vatvā bhagavantaṃ saraṇamagamāsi. athassa bhagavā anupubbikathaṃ kathesi. so desanāpariyosāne dasahi yakkhasahassehi saddhiṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi. tasmiṃ kira divase sakalajambudīpatalavāsino manussā ^a^P0.0126^ea^ tassa balikammatthaṃ ekekagāmato ekekaṃ purisaṃ āhariṃsu. aññañca bahutilataṇḍulakulatthamuggamāsādiṃ sappinavanītatelamadhuphāṇitādiñca āhariṃsu. atha so yakkho taṃ divasaṃ ābhatataṇḍulādikaṃ sabbaṃ tesaṃyeva datvā te balikammatthāya ānītamanusse dasabalassa niyyātesi.

[03] atha satthā te manusse ehibhikkhupabbajjāya pabbājetvā antosattāheyeva sabbe arahatte patiṭṭhāpetvā māghapuṇṇamāya koṭisatabhikkhumajjhagato caturaṅgasamannāgate sannipāte pātimokkhamuddisi. caturaṅgāni nāma sabbeva ehibhikkhū honti, sabbe chaḷabhiññā honti, sabbe anāmantitāva āgatā, pannarasūposathadivaso cāti imāni cattāri aṅgāni nāma. ayaṃ dutiyo sannipāto ahosi. tena vuttaṃ --

[03] yadā pana dīpaṅkaro lokanāyako sudassananāmake pabbate vassāvāsamupagañchi, tadā kira jambudīpavāsino manussā anusaṃvaccharaṃ giraggasamajjaṃ karonti. tasmiṃ kira samajje sannipatitā manussā dasabalaṃ disvā dhammakathaṃ sutvā tatra pasīditvā pabbajiṃsu. mahāpavāraṇadivase satthā tesaṃ ajjhāsayānukūlaṃ vipassanākathaṃ kathesi. taṃ sutvā te sabbe saṅkhāre sammasitvā vipassanānupubbena maggānupubbena ca arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu. atha satthā navutikoṭisahassehi saddhiṃ pavāresi. ayaṃ tatiyo sannipāto ahosi. tena vuttaṃ --
[22] antalikkhamhi caraṇo, pañcābhiññāsu pāragū''ti.. (dha0 sa0 aṭṭha0 nidānakathā).

[03] ayaṃ gāthā ^b^aṭṭhasāliniyā^eb^ dhammasaṅgahaṭṭhakathāya nidānavaṇṇanāya ^b^dīpaṅkarabuddhavaṃse^eb^ likhitā. imasmiṃ pana buddhavaṃse natthi. natthibhāvoyeva panassā yuttataro. kasmāti ce? heṭṭhā sumedhakathāsu kathitattāti.

[03] dīpaṅkare kira bhagavati dhammaṃ desente dasasahassānañca vīsatisahassānañca dhammābhisamayo ahosiyeva. ekassa pana dvinnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ catunnanti ca ādivasena abhisamayānaṃ anto natthi. tasmā dīpaṅkarassa bhagavato sāsanaṃ vitthārikaṃ bāhujaññaṃ ahosi. tena vuttaṃ --

[03] tattha ^b^dasavīsasahassāna^eb^nti dasasahassānaṃ vīsatisahassānañca. ^b^dhammābhisamayo^eb^ti catusaccadhammappaṭivedho. ^b^ekadvinnab^nti ekassa ceva dvinnañca ^a^M0.0154^ea^, tiṇṇaṃ catunnaṃ...pe0... dasannantiādinā nayena asaṅkhyeyyāti attho. evaṃ asaṅkhyeyyābhisamayattā ca ^b^vitthārikaṃ^eb^ mahantappattaṃ bahūhi paṇḍitehi devamanussehi niyyānikanti ^b^jaññaṃ^eb^ jānitabbaṃ adhisīlasikkhādīhi ^b^iddhañca^eb^ samādhiādīhi ^b^phītañca^eb^ ahosi. tena vuttaṃ --

[03] tattha ^b^suvisodhita^eb^nti suṭṭhu bhagavatā sodhitaṃ visuddhaṃ kataṃ. dīpaṅkaraṃ kira satthāraṃ sabbakālaṃ chaḷabhiññānaṃ mahiddhikānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ cattāri satasahassāni parivārenti. tena ca samayena ye sekkhā kālakiriyaṃ karonti, te garahitā bhavanti, sabbe khīṇāsavā hutvāva parinibbāyantīti adhippāyo. tasmā hi tassa bhagavato sāsanaṃ supupphitaṃ susamiddhaṃ khīṇāsavehi bhikkhūhi ativiya sobhittha. tena vuttaṃ --
[21] ``ye keci tena samayena, jahanti mānusaṃ bhavaṃ.

[03] tattha ^b^cattāri satasahassānī^eb^ti gaṇanāya dassitā evaṃ dassitagaṇanā ime bhikkhūti dassanatthaṃ ^b^``chaḷabhiññā mahiddhikā''^eb^ti vuttanti evamattho gahetabbo. atha vā ^b^chaḷabhiññā mahiddhikā^eb^ti chaḷabhiññānaṃ mahiddhikānanti sāmiatthe paccattavacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^parivārenti sabbadā^eb^ti niccakālaṃ dasabalaṃ parivārenti, bhagavantaṃ muñcitvā katthaci na gacchantīti adhippāyo. ^b^tena samayenā^eb^ti tasmiṃ samaye. ayaṃ pana ^b^samaya^eb^-saddo samavāyādīsu navasu atthesu dissati. yathāha --

[22] paṭilābhe pahāne ca, paṭivedhe ca dissatī''ti.. (dī0 ni0 aṭṭha0 1.1; ma0 ni0 aṭṭha0 1ṃūlapariyāyasuttavaṇṇanā; saṃ0 ni0 aṭṭha0 1.1.1; a0 ni0 aṭṭha0 1.1.1; dha0 sa0 aṭṭha0 1 kāmāvacarakusalapadabhājanīya; khu0 pā0 aṭṭha0 maṃgalasuttavaṇṇanā, evamiccādipāṭhavaṇṇanā; paṭi0 ma0 aṭṭha0 2.1.184).

[03] idha so kāle daṭṭhabbo; tasmiṃ kāleti attho. ^b^mānusaṃ bhava^eb^nti manussabhāvaṃ. ^b^appattamānasā^eb^ti appattaṃ anadhigataṃ mānasaṃ yehi te appattamānasā. mānasanti rāgassa ca cittassa ca arahattassa ca adhivacanaṃ. ``antalikkhacaro pāso, yvāyaṃ carati mānaso''ti (saṃ0 ni0 1.151; mahāva0 33) hi ettha pana rāgo ``mānaso''ti vutto. ``cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ hadayaṃ paṇḍara''nti (dha0 sa0 6; vibha0 184; mahāni0 1; cūḷani0 pārāyanānugītigāthāniddesa 114) ettha cittaṃ. ``appattamānaso sekho, kālaṃ kayirā janesutā''ti ^a^V0.0146^ea^ (saṃ0 ni0 1.159) ettha arahattaṃ. idhāpi arahattameva adhippetaṃ (dha0 sa0 aṭṭha0 5 kāmāvacarakusalaniddesavārakathā; mahāni0 aṭṭha0 1). tasmā appattārahattaphalāti attho. ^b^sekhā^eb^ti kenaṭṭhena sekhā? sekhadhammapaṭilābhaṭṭhena sekhā. vuttañhetaṃ -- ``kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, sekho hotīti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sekhāya sammādiṭṭhiyā samannāgato hoti...pe0... sekhena sammāsamādhinā samannāgato hoti. ettāvatā kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sekho hotī''ti (saṃ0 ni0 5.13). api ca sikkhantīti sekhā. vuttañhetaṃ -- ``sikkhati, sikkhatīti kho, bhikkhu, tasmā sekhoti vuccati. kiñca sikkhati? adhisīlampi sikkhati adhicittampi adhipaññampi sikkhatīti kho, bhikkhu, tasmā sekhoti vuccatī''ti (a0 ni0 3.86).

[03] ^b^supupphita^eb^nti suṭṭhu vikasitaṃ. ^b^pāvacana^eb^nti pasatthaṃ vacanaṃ, vuddhippattaṃ vā vacanaṃ pavacanaṃ, pavacanameva pāvacanaṃ, sāsananti attho. ^b^upasobhatī^eb^ti abhirājati ativirocati. ^b^sabbadā^eb^ti sabbakālaṃ. ``upasobhati sadevake''tipi pāṭho.

[03] tassa dīpaṅkarassa bhagavato rammavatī nāma nagaraṃ ahosi, sudevo nāma khattiyo pitā, sumedhā nāma devī mātā, sumaṅgalo ca tisso cāti dve aggasāvakā, sāgato nāma upaṭṭhāko, nandā ca sunandā cāti dve aggasāvikā, bodhi tassa bhagavato pipphalirukkho ahosi, asītihatthubbedho, satasahassavassāni āyūti. kiṃ panimesaṃ jātanagarādīnaṃ dassane payojananti ce? vuccate -- yassa yadi neva jātanagaraṃ na pitā na mātā paññāyeyya, imassa pana neva jātanagaraṃ ^a^M0.0156^ea^ na pitā na mātā paññāyati, devo vā sakko vā yakkho vā māro vā brahmā vā esa maññe, devānampi īdisaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ anacchariyanti ^a^P0.0129^ea^ maññamānā na sotabbaṃ na saddahitabbaṃ maññeyyuṃ, tato abhisamayo na bhaveyya, asati abhisamaye niratthako buddhuppādo bhaveyya, aniyyānikaṃ sāsanaṃ. tasmā sabbabuddhānaṃ jātanagarādiko paricchedo dassetabbo. tena vuttaṃ --
[22] tāvatā tiṭṭhamāno so, tāresi janataṃ bahuṃ..
[21] ``sā ca iddhi so ca yaso, tāni ca pādesu cakkaratanāni.

[03] tattha ^b^sudevo nāma khattiyo^eb^ti sudevo nāmassa khattiyo pitā ahosīti attho. ^b^janikā^eb^ti janetti. ^b^pipphalī^eb^ti pilakkhakapītanarukkho bodhi. ^b^asītihatthamubbedho^eb^ti asītihatthaṃ uccaggato. ^b^dīparukkho vā^eb^ti sampajjalitadīpamālākulo dīparukkho viya ārohapariṇāhasaṇṭhānapāripūrisampanno dvattiṃsavaralakkhaṇānubyañjanasamalaṅkatasarīro vipphuritaraṃsijālāvisaratārāgaṇasamujjalamiva gaganatalaṃ bhagavā ^a^M0.0157^ea^ dharamānakāle ^b^sobhatī^eb^ti sobhittha. ^b^sālarājāva phullito^eb^ti pupphito sabbaphāliphullo sālarājarukkho viya ca sabbaphāliphullo yojanasatubbedho pāricchatto viya ca asītihatthubbedho bhagavā ativiya sobhati.

[03] ^b^satasahassavassānī^eb^ti vassasatasahassāni tassa āyūti attho. ^b^tāvatā tiṭṭhamāno^eb^ti tāvatakaṃ kālaṃ tiṭṭhamāno. ^b^janata^eb^nti ^a^P0.0130^ea^ janasamūhaṃ. ^b^santāretvā mahājana^eb^nti tārayitvā mahājanaṃ. ``santāretvā sadevaka''ntipi pāṭho, tassa sadevakaṃ lokanti attho. ^b^sā ca iddhī^eb^ti sā ca sampatti ānubhāvo. ^b^so ca yaso^eb^ti so ca parivāro. ^b^sabbaṃ tamantarahita^eb^nti taṃ sabbaṃ vuttappakāraṃ sampattijātaṃ antarahitaṃ apagatanti attho. ^b^nanu rittā sabbasaṅkhārā^eb^ti sabbe pana saṅkhatadhammā nanu rittā tucchā, niccasārādirahitāti attho.

[03] ettha ^a^V0.0148^ea^ pana nagarādiparicchedo pāḷiyamāgatova. sambahulavāro pana nāgato, so ānetvā dīpetabbo. seyyathidaṃ -- puttaparicchedo, bhariyāparicchedo, pāsādaparicchedo, agāravāsaparicchedo, nāṭakitthiparicchedo, abhinikkhamanaparicchedo, padhānaparicchedo, vihāraparicchedo, upaṭṭhākaparicchedoti. etesampi dīpane kāraṇaṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva. tassa pana dīpaṅkarassa bhariyānaṃ tisatasahassaṃ ahosi. tassa aggamahesī padumā nāma, tassa pana putto usabhakkhandho nāma. tena vuttaṃ --

[03] sabbabuddhānaṃ pana pañca vemattāni honti āyuvemattaṃ pamāṇavemattaṃ kulavemattaṃ padhānavemattaṃ rasmivemattanti. tattha ^b^āyuvemattaṃ^eb^ nāma keci dīghāyukā ^a^M0.0158^ea^ honti keci appāyukā. tathā hi dīpaṅkarassa pana bhagavato vassasatasahassaṃ āyuppamāṇaṃ ahosi, amhākaṃ bhagavato vassasataṃ.
[03] ^b^pamāṇavemattaṃ^eb^ nāma keci dīghā honti keci rassā. tathā hi dīpaṅkaro asītihatthappamāṇo ahosi, amhākaṃ pana bhagavā aṭṭhārasahatthappamāṇo.
[03] ^b^kulavemattaṃ^eb^ nāma keci khattiyakule nibbattanti keci brāhmaṇakule. tathā hi dīpaṅkarādayo khattiyakule nibbattiṃsu, kakusandhakoṇāgamanādayo brāhmaṇakule.
[03] padhānavemattaṃ nāma kesañci padhānaṃ ittarameva hoti yathā kassapassa bhagavato ^a^P0.0131^ea^, kesañci addhaniyaṃ amhākaṃ bhagavato viya.

[03] ^b^rasmivemattaṃ^eb^ ^a^V0.0149^ea^ nāma maṅgalassa bhagavato sarīrasmi dasasahassilokadhātuṃ pharitvā aṭṭhāsi, amhākaṃ bhagavato byāmamattaṃ. tatra rasmivemattaṃ ajjhāsayapaṭibaddhaṃ hoti. yo yattakaṃ icchasi, tassa tattakaṃ sarīrappabhā pharati. maṅgalassa pana ``dasasahassilokadhātuṃ pharatū''ti ajjhāsayo ahosi. paṭividdhaguṇesu pana kassaci vemattaṃ nāma natthi (dī0 ni0 aṭṭha0 2.12 ādayo).

[03] tathā sabbabuddhānaṃ cattāri avijahitaṭṭhānāni nāma honti. ^b^bodhipallaṅko^eb^ avijahito ekasmiṃyeva ṭhāne hoti. ^b^dhammacakkappavattanaṭṭhānaṃ^eb^ isipatane migadāye avijahitameva hoti. devorohaṇakāle saṅkassanagaradvāre ^b^paṭhamapādakkamo^eb^ avijahitova hoti. jetavane gandhakuṭiyā cattāri ^b^mañcapādaṭṭhānāni^eb^ avijahitāneva honti. vihāropi avijahitova. so pana khuddako vā mahanto vā hoti.

[03] aparaṃ pana amhākaṃyeva bhagavato sahajātaparicchedañca nakkhattaparicchedañca visesaṃ. amhākaṃ sabbaññubodhisattena kira saddhiṃ rāhulamātā ānandatthero channo kaṇḍako assarājā nidhikumbhā mahābodhirukkho kāḷudāyīti imāni ^b^sata sahajātāni^eb^. mahāpuriso kira uttarāsāḷhanakkhatteneva mātukucchiṃ okkami, mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhami ^a^M0.0159^ea^, dhammacakkaṃ pavattesi, yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ akāsi. visākhanakkhattena jāto ca abhisambuddho ca parinibbuto ca, māghanakkhattena tassa sāvakasannipāto ceva āyusaṅkhāravosajjanañca ahosi, assayujanakkhattena devorohaṇanti ettakaṃ āharitvā dīpetabbaṃ. ayaṃ sambahulavāraparicchedo. sesagāthā sauttānā evāti.
[03] iti bhagavā dīpaṅkaro yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā sabbabuddhakiccaṃ katvā anukkamena anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyi.

[03] yasmiṃ kira kappe dīpaṅkaradasabalo udapādi, tasmiṃ aññepi taṇhaṅkaro, medhaṅkaro, saraṇaṅkaroti tayo buddhā ahesuṃ. tesaṃ santike bodhisattassa byākaraṇaṃ natthi. tasmā te idha na dassitā. ^b^aṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ pana tamhā kappā ādito paṭṭhāyuppannuppanne sabbabuddhe dassetuṃ idaṃ vuttaṃ --
[21] ``maṅgalo ^a^V0.0150^ea^ ca sumano ca, revato sobhito muni.
[21] ``tisso phusso ca sambuddho, vipassī sikhi vessabhū.
[22] jalitvā aggikkhandhāva, nibbutā te sasāvakā''ti.. (apa0 aṭṭha0 1ḍūrenidānakathā; cariyā0 aṭṭha0 nidānakathā; jā0 aṭṭha0 1ḍūrenidānakathā).

[03] dīpaṅkare ^a^M0.0160^ea^ ^a^V0.0151^ea^ kira bhagavati parinibbute tassa sāsanaṃ vassasatasahassaṃ pavattittha. atha buddhānubuddhānaṃ sāvakānaṃ antaradhānena sāsanampissa antaradhāyi. athassa aparabhāge ekamasaṅkhyeyyamatikkamitvā ekasmiṃ kappe ^b^koṇḍañño^eb^ nāma satthā udapādi. so pana bhagavā soḷasāsaṅkhyeyyaṃ kappānañca satasahassaṃ pāramiyo pūretvā bodhiñāṇaṃ paripācetvā vessantarattabhāvasadise attabhāve ṭhatvā tato cavitvā tusitapure nibbattitvā tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā devatānaṃ paṭiññaṃ datvā tusitapurato cavitvā rammavatīnagare sunandassa nāma rañño kule sujātāya nāma deviyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ aggahesi. tassapi paṭisandhikkhaṇe dīpaṅkarabuddhavaṃse vuttappakārāni dvattiṃsa pāṭihāriyāni nibbattiṃsu. so devatāhi katārakkhasaṃvidhāno dasannaṃ māsānaṃ accayena mātukucchito nikkhamitvā sabbasattuttaro uttarābhimukho sattapadavītihārena gantvā sabbā ca disā viloketvā āsabhiṃ vācaṃ nicchāresi -- ``aggohamasmi lokassa, jeṭṭhohamasmi lokassa, seṭṭhohamasmi lokassa, ayamantimā jāti, natthi dāni punabbhavo''ti (dī0 ni0 2.31; ma0 ni0 3.207).

[03] tato kumārassa nāmakaraṇadivase nāmaṃ karontā ``koṇḍañño''ti nāmamakaṃsu. so hi bhagavā koṇḍaññagotto ahosi. tassa kira tayo pāsādā ahesuṃ -- rāma, surāma, subhanāmakā paramaramaṇīyā. tesu tīṇi satasahassāni nāṭakitthīnaṃ naccagītavāditakusalānaṃ sabbakālaṃ paccupaṭṭhitāni ahesuṃ. tassa rucidevī nāma ^a^P0.0133^ea^ aggamahesī ahosi. vijitaseno nāmassa putto ahosi. so dasavassasahassāni agāraṃ ajjhāvasi.
